function hn(t) {

        for (var l in t)
            t.hasOwnProperty(l) && (r = t[l], this[l] = r ? r(i) : i[l]);

    }

        preventDefault: function() {
            this.defaultPrevented = !0;

            r && (r.preventDefault ? r.preventDefault() : typeof r.returnValue != "unknown" && (r.returnValue = !1), this.isDefaultPrevented = Lm)
        },

function uE(t) {

function vE(t) {

        r,

            for (s = 0; s < a; s++)

}

                });
                return
            }
            Object.entries(a).forEach(([i, o]) => {
                yv(o, nw(s, i), r, n)
            })
        })
    },
    nw = (t, s) => {
        let r = t;
        return s.split(_j).forEach(n => {
            r.nextPart.has(n) || r.nextPart.set(n, {
                nextPart: new Map,
                validators: []
            }),
            r = r.nextPart.get(n)
        }), r
    },
    L5 = t => t.isThemeGetter,
    F5 = (t, s) => s ? t.map(([r, n]) => {
        const a = n.map(i => typeof i == "string" ? s + i : typeof i == "object" ? Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(i).map(([o, l]) => [s + o, l])) : i);
        return [r, a]
    }) : t,
    z5 = t => {
        if (t < 1)
            return {
                get: () => {},
                set: () => {}
            };
        let s = 0,
            r = new Map,
            n = new Map;
        const a = (i, o) => {
            r.set(i, o),
            s++,
            s > t && (s = 0, n = r, r = new Map)
        };
        return {
            get(i) {
                let o = r.get(i);
                if (o !== void 0)
                    return o;
                if ((o = n.get(i)) !== void 0)
                    return a(i, o), o
            },
            set(i, o) {
                r.has(i) ? r.set(i, o) : a(i, o)
            }
        }
    },
    AE = "!",
    $5 = t => {
        const {separator: s, experimentalParseClassName: r} = t,
            n = s.length === 1,
            a = s[0],
            i = s.length,
            o = l => {
                const c = [];
                let d = 0,
                    u = 0,
                    m;
                for (let b = 0; b < l.length; b++) {
                    let j = l[b];
                    if (d === 0) {
                        if (j === a && (n || l.slice(b, b + i) === s)) {
                            c.push(l.slice(u, b)),
                            u = b + i;
                            continue
                        }
                        if (j === "/") {
                            m = b;
                            continue
                        }
                    }
                    j === "[" ? d++ : j === "]" && d--
                }
                const p = c.length === 0 ? l : l.substring(u),
                    y = p.startsWith(AE),
                    g = y ? p.substring(1) : p,
                    x = m && m > u ? m - u : void 0;
                return {
                    modifiers: c,
                    hasImportantModifier: y,
                    baseClassName: g,
                    maybePostfixModifierPosition: x
                }
            };
        return r ? l => r({
            className: l,
            parseClassName: o
        }) : o
    },
    V5 = t => {
        if (t.length <= 1)
            return t;
        const s = [];
        let r = [];
        return t.forEach(n => {
            n[0] === "[" ? (s.push(...r.sort(), n), r = []) : r.push(n)
        }), s.push(...r.sort()), s
    },
    U5 = t => ({
        cache: z5(t.cacheSize),
        parseClassName: $5(t),
        ...I5(t)
    }),
    B5 = /\s+/,
    q5 = (t, s) => {
        const {parseClassName: r, getClassGroupId: n, getConflictingClassGroupIds: a} = s,
            i = [],
            o = t.trim().split(B5);
        let l = "";
        for (let c = o.length - 1; c >= 0; c -= 1) {
            const d = o[c],
                {modifiers: u, hasImportantModifier: m, baseClassName: p, maybePostfixModifierPosition: y} = r(d);
            let g = !!y,
                x = n(g ? p.substring(0, y) : p);
            if (!x) {
                if (!g) {
                    l = d + (l.length > 0 ? " " + l : l);
                    continue
                }
                if (x = n(p), !x) {
                    l = d + (l.length > 0 ? " " + l : l);
                    continue
                }
                g = !1
            }
            const b = V5(u).join(":"),
                j = m ? b + AE : b,
                h = j + x;
            if (i.includes(h))
                continue;
            i.push(h);
            const v = a(x, g);
            for (let N = 0; N < v.length; ++N) {
                const w = v[N];
                i.push(j + w)
            }
            l = d + (l.length > 0 ? " " + l : l)
        }
        return l
    };
function H5() {
    let t = 0,
        s,
        r,
        n = "";
    for (; t < arguments.length;)
        (s = arguments[t++]) && (r = ME(s)) && (n && (n += " "), n += r);
    return n
}
const ME = t => {
    if (typeof t == "string")
        return t;
    let s,
        r = "";
    for (let n = 0; n < t.length; n++)
        t[n] && (s = ME(t[n])) && (r && (r += " "), r += s);
    return r
};
function W5(t, ...s) {
    let r,
        n,
        a,
        i = o;
    function o(c) {
        const d = s.reduce((u, m) => m(u), t());
        return r = U5(d), n = r.cache.get, a = r.cache.set, i = l, l(c)
    }
    function l(c) {
        const d = n(c);
        if (d)
            return d;
        const u = q5(c, r);
        return a(c, u), u
    }
    return function() {
        return i(H5.apply(null, arguments))
    }
}
const qt = t => {
        const s = r => r[t] || [];
        return s.isThemeGetter = !0, s

const gp = .21;
function DE(t) {
    return t * (1 + gp)
}
function bt(t, s=!0) {
    if (t == null || t === "")
        return "0,00 €";
    let r;
    return typeof t == "string" ? r = parseFloat(t.replace(",", ".")) : r = t, isNaN(r) || r < 0 ? "0,00 €" : (s && (r = DE(r)), new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
        style: "currency",
        currency: "EUR",
        minimumFractionDigits: 2
    }).format(r))
}
function mL(t) {
    if (t == null || t === "")
        return {
            basePrice: "0,00 €",
            iva: "0,00 €",
            totalPrice: "0,00 €",
            basePriceNum: 0,
            ivaNum: 0,
            totalPriceNum: 0
        };
    let s;
    if (typeof t == "string" ? s = parseFloat(t.replace(",", ".")) : s = t, isNaN(s) || s < 0)
        return {
            basePrice: "0,00 €",
            iva: "0,00 €",
            totalPrice: "0,00 €",
            basePriceNum: 0,
            ivaNum: 0,
            totalPriceNum: 0
        };
    const r = s * gp,
        n = s + r;
    return {
        basePrice: new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
            style: "currency",
            currency: "EUR",
            minimumFractionDigits: 2
        }).format(s),
        iva: new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
            style: "currency",
            currency: "EUR",
            minimumFractionDigits: 2
        }).format(r),
        totalPrice: new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
            style: "currency",
            currency: "EUR",
            minimumFractionDigits: 2
        }).format(n),
        basePriceNum: s,
        ivaNum: r,
        totalPriceNum: n
    }
}
function hL(t) {
    if (t == null || t === "")
        return "N/A";
    const s = typeof t == "string" ? parseFloat(t) : t;
    return isNaN(s) || s <= 0 ? "N/A" : `${(s / 100).toFixed(2)} kg`
}
function fL(t) {
    const s = typeof t == "string" ? new Date(t) : t;
    return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("es-ES", {
        day: "2-digit",
        month: "2-digit",
        year: "numeric"
    }).format(s)
}
function zn(t) {
    const s = typeof t == "string" ? new Date(t) : t;
    return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("es-ES", {
        day: "2-digit",
        month: "2-digit",
        year: "numeric",
        hour: "2-digit",
        minute: "2-digit"
    }).format(s)
}
function Wd(t) {
    if (!t || t === null || t === void 0 || t === "")
        return "N/A";
    const s = String(t).trim();
    if (!s)
        return "N/A";
    const r = s.toLowerCase();
    return {
            diesel: "Diésel",
            gasolina: "Gasolina",
            hibrido: "Híbrido",
            electrico: "Eléctrico",
            gas: "Gas",
            "sin plomo 95": "Gasolina Sin Plomo 95",
            "sin plomo 98": "Gasolina Sin Plomo 98",
            "sin plomo 91": "Gasolina Sin Plomo 91",
            "gas natural": "Gas Natural",
            "gasolina/eléctrico (combinado)": "Híbrido",
            el: "Eléctrico"
        }[r] || s
}

function vL() {

                        children: r

                    })]

var yL = M2[" useId ".trim().toString()] || (() => {}),
    jL = 0;
function an(t) {
    const [s, r] = f.useState(yL());
    return ys(() => {
        t || r(n => n ?? String(jL++))
    }, [t]), t || (s ? `radix-${s}` : "")

const bL = ["top", "right", "bottom", "left"],
    lo = Math.min,
    Jr = Math.max,
    mf = Math.round,
    Ym = Math.floor,
    Na = t => ({
        x: t,
        y: t
    }),
    NL = {
        left: "right",
        right: "left",
        bottom: "top",
        top: "bottom"
    },
    wL = {
        start: "end",
        end: "start"
    };
function jv(t, s, r) {
    return Jr(t, lo(s, r))
}
function fi(t, s) {
    return typeof t == "function" ? t(s) : t
}
function pi(t) {
    return t.split("-")[0]
}
function Zc(t) {
    return t.split("-")[1]
}
function Tj(t) {
    return t === "x" ? "y" : "x"
}
function Aj(t) {
    return t === "y" ? "height" : "width"
}
function co(t) {
    return ["top", "bottom"].includes(pi(t)) ? "y" : "x"
}
function Mj(t) {
    return Tj(co(t))
}
function CL(t, s, r) {
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const n = Zc(t),
        a = Mj(t),
        i = Aj(a);
    let o = a === "x" ? n === (r ? "end" : "start") ? "right" : "left" : n === "start" ? "bottom" : "top";
    return s.reference[i] > s.floating[i] && (o = hf(o)), [o, hf(o)]
}
function SL(t) {
    const s = hf(t);
    return [bv(t), s, bv(s)]
}
function bv(t) {
    return t.replace(/start|end/g, s => wL[s])
}
function EL(t, s, r) {
    const n = ["left", "right"],
        a = ["right", "left"],
        i = ["top", "bottom"],
        o = ["bottom", "top"];
    switch (t) {
    case "top":
    case "bottom":
        return r ? s ? a : n : s ? n : a;
    case "left":
    case "right":
        return s ? i : o;
    default:
        return []
    }
}
function kL(t, s, r, n) {
    const a = Zc(t);
    let i = EL(pi(t), r === "start", n);
    return a && (i = i.map(o => o + "-" + a), s && (i = i.concat(i.map(bv)))), i
}
function hf(t) {
    return t.replace(/left|right|bottom|top/g, s => NL[s])
}
function PL(t) {
    return {
        top: 0,
        right: 0,
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        ...t
    }
}
function VE(t) {
    return typeof t != "number" ? PL(t) : {
        top: t,
        right: t,
        bottom: t,
        left: t
    }
}
function ff(t) {
    const {x: s, y: r, width: n, height: a} = t;
    return {
        width: n,
        height: a,
        top: r,
        left: s,
        right: s + n,
        bottom: r + a,
        x: s,
        y: r
    }
}
function aw(t, s, r) {
    let {reference: n, floating: a} = t;
    const i = co(s),
        o = Mj(s),
        l = Aj(o),
        c = pi(s),
        d = i === "y",
        u = n.x + n.width / 2 - a.width / 2,
        m = n.y + n.height / 2 - a.height / 2,
        p = n[l] / 2 - a[l] / 2;
    let y;
    switch (c) {
    case "top":
        y = {
            x: u,
            y: n.y - a.height
        };
        break;
    case "bottom":
        y = {
            x: u,
            y: n.y + n.height
        };
        break;
    case "right":
        y = {
            x: n.x + n.width,
            y: m
        };
        break;
    case "left":
        y = {
            x: n.x - a.width,
            y: m
        };
        break;
    default:
        y = {
            x: n.x,
            y: n.y
        }
    }
    switch (Zc(s)) {
    case "start":
        y[o] -= p * (r && d ? -1 : 1);
        break;
    case "end":
        y[o] += p * (r && d ? -1 : 1);
        break
    }
    return y
}
const _L = async (t, s, r) => {
    const {placement: n="bottom", strategy: a="absolute", middleware: i=[], platform: o} = r,
        l = i.filter(Boolean),
        c = await (o.isRTL == null ? void 0 : o.isRTL(s));
    let d = await o.getElementRects({
            reference: t,
            floating: s,
            strategy: a
        }),
        {x: u, y: m} = aw(d, n, c),
        p = n,
        y = {},
        g = 0;
    for (let x = 0; x < l.length; x++) {
        const {name: b, fn: j} = l[x],
            {x: h, y: v, data: N, reset: w} = await j({
                x: u,
                y: m,
                initialPlacement: n,
                placement: p,
                strategy: a,
                middlewareData: y,
                rects: d,
                platform: o,
                elements: {
                    reference: t,
                    floating: s
                }
            });
        u = h ?? u,
        m = v ?? m,
        y = {
            ...y,
            [b]: {
                ...y[b],
                ...N
            }
        },
        w && g <= 50 && (g++, typeof w == "object" && (w.placement && (p = w.placement), w.rects && (d = w.rects === !0 ? await o.getElementRects({
            reference: t,
            floating: s,
            strategy: a
        }) : w.rects), {x: u, y: m} = aw(d, p, c)), x = -1)
    }
    return {
        x: u,
        y: m,
        placement: p,
        strategy: a,
        middlewareData: y
    }
};
async function xu(t, s) {
    var r;
    s === void 0 && (s = {});
    const {x: n, y: a, platform: i, rects: o, elements: l, strategy: c} = t,
        {boundary: d="clippingAncestors", rootBoundary: u="viewport", elementContext: m="floating", altBoundary: p=!1, padding: y=0} = fi(s, t),
        g = VE(y),
        b = l[p ? m === "floating" ? "reference" : "floating" : m],
        j = ff(await i.getClippingRect({
            element: (r = await (i.isElement == null ? void 0 : i.isElement(b))) == null || r ? b : b.contextElement || await (i.getDocumentElement == null ? void 0 : i.getDocumentElement(l.floating)),
            boundary: d,
            rootBoundary: u,
            strategy: c
        })),
        h = m === "floating" ? {
            x: n,
            y: a,
            width: o.floating.width,
            height: o.floating.height
        } : o.reference,
        v = await (i.getOffsetParent == null ? void 0 : i.getOffsetParent(l.floating)),
        N = await (i.isElement == null ? void 0 : i.isElement(v)) ? await (i.getScale == null ? void 0 : i.getScale(v)) || {
            x: 1,
            y: 1
        } : {
            x: 1,
            y: 1
        },
        w = ff(i.convertOffsetParentRelativeRectToViewportRelativeRect ? await i.convertOffsetParentRelativeRectToViewportRelativeRect({
            elements: l,
            rect: h,
            offsetParent: v,
            strategy: c
        }) : h);
    return {
        top: (j.top - w.top + g.top) / N.y,
        bottom: (w.bottom - j.bottom + g.bottom) / N.y,
        left: (j.left - w.left + g.left) / N.x,
        right: (w.right - j.right + g.right) / N.x
    }
}
const TL = t => ({
        name: "arrow",
        options: t,
        async fn(s) {
            const {x: r, y: n, placement: a, rects: i, platform: o, elements: l, middlewareData: c} = s,
                {element: d, padding: u=0} = fi(t, s) || {};
            if (d == null)
                return {};
            const m = VE(u),
                p = {
                    x: r,
                    y: n
                },
                y = Mj(a),
                g = Aj(y),
                x = await o.getDimensions(d),
                b = y === "y",
                j = b ? "top" : "left",
                h = b ? "bottom" : "right",
                v = b ? "clientHeight" : "clientWidth",

                w = p[y] - i.reference[y],

            let S = C ? C[v] : 0;
            (!S || !await (o.isElement == null ? void 0 : o.isElement(C))) && (S = l.floating[v] || i.floating[g]);
            const _ = N / 2 - w / 2,
                T = S / 2 - x[g] / 2 - 1,
                B = lo(m[j], T),
                z = lo(m[h], T),
                A = B,
                O = S - x[g] - z,
                H = S / 2 - x[g] / 2 + _,
                D = jv(A, H, O),
                R = !c.arrow && Zc(a) != null && H !== D && i.reference[g] / 2 - (H < A ? B : z) - x[g] / 2 < 0,
                E = R ? H < A ? H - A : H - O : 0;
            return {
                [y]: p[y] + E,
                data: {
                    [y]: D,
                    centerOffset: H - D - E,
                    ...R && {
                        alignmentOffset: E
                    }
                },
                reset: R
            }
        }
    }),
    AL = function(t) {
        return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
            name: "flip",

                if ((r = i.arrow) != null && r.alignmentOffset)

                            break
                        }

                            reset: {

            }
        }
    };
function iw(t, s) {
    return {
        top: t.top - s.height,
        right: t.right - s.width,
        bottom: t.bottom - s.height,
        left: t.left - s.width
    }
}
function ow(t) {
    return bL.some(s => t[s] >= 0)
}
const ML = function(t) {
    return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
        name: "hide",
        options: t,
        async fn(s) {
            const {rects: r} = s,
                {strategy: n="referenceHidden", ...a} = fi(t, s);
            switch (n) {
            case "referenceHidden":
                {
                    const i = await xu(s, {
                            ...a,
                            elementContext: "reference"
                        }),
                        o = iw(i, r.reference);

                        data: {
                            referenceHiddenOffsets: o,
                            referenceHidden: ow(o)
                        }
                    }

                {
                    const i = await xu(s, {
                            ...a,
                            altBoundary: !0
                        }),
                        o = iw(i, r.floating);
                    return {
                        data: {
                            escapedOffsets: o,
                            escaped: ow(o)
                        }
                    }
                }default:
                return {}
            }
        }
    }
};
async function RL(t, s) {
    const {placement: r, platform: n, elements: a} = t,
        i = await (n.isRTL == null ? void 0 : n.isRTL(a.floating)),

        m = fi(s, t);

        mainAxis: m,
        crossAxis: 0,
        alignmentAxis: null
    } : {
        mainAxis: m.mainAxis || 0,
        crossAxis: m.crossAxis || 0,
        alignmentAxis: m.alignmentAxis
    };
    return l && typeof g == "number" && (y = l === "end" ? g * -1 : g), c ? {
        x: y * u,
        y: p * d
    } : {
        x: p * d,
        y: y * u
    }
}

    LL = function(t) {

function vp() {
    return typeof window < "u"
}
function Qc(t) {
    return UE(t) ? (t.nodeName || "").toLowerCase() : "#document"
}
function on(t) {
    var s;
    return (t == null || (s = t.ownerDocument) == null ? void 0 : s.defaultView) || window
}
function Aa(t) {
    var s;
    return (s = (UE(t) ? t.ownerDocument : t.document) || window.document) == null ? void 0 : s.documentElement
}
function UE(t) {
    return vp() ? t instanceof Node || t instanceof on(t).Node : !1
}
function Yn(t) {
    return vp() ? t instanceof Element || t instanceof on(t).Element : !1
}
function Ea(t) {
    return vp() ? t instanceof HTMLElement || t instanceof on(t).HTMLElement : !1
}
function lw(t) {
    return !vp() || typeof ShadowRoot > "u" ? !1 : t instanceof ShadowRoot || t instanceof on(t).ShadowRoot
}
function rm(t) {
    const {overflow: s, overflowX: r, overflowY: n, display: a} = Zn(t);
    return /auto|scroll|overlay|hidden|clip/.test(s + n + r) && !["inline", "contents"].includes(a)
}
function FL(t) {
    return ["table", "td", "th"].includes(Qc(t))
}
function yp(t) {
    return [":popover-open", ":modal"].some(s => {
        try {
            return t.matches(s)
        } catch {
            return !1
        }
    })
}
function Rj(t) {
    const s = Ij(),
        r = Yn(t) ? Zn(t) : t;
    return ["transform", "translate", "scale", "rotate", "perspective"].some(n => r[n] ? r[n] !== "none" : !1) || (r.containerType ? r.containerType !== "normal" : !1) || !s && (r.backdropFilter ? r.backdropFilter !== "none" : !1) || !s && (r.filter ? r.filter !== "none" : !1) || ["transform", "translate", "scale", "rotate", "perspective", "filter"].some(n => (r.willChange || "").includes(n)) || ["paint", "layout", "strict", "content"].some(n => (r.contain || "").includes(n))
}
function zL(t) {
    let s = uo(t);
    for (; Ea(s) && !Ec(s);) {
        if (Rj(s))
            return s;
        if (yp(s))
            return null;
        s = uo(s)
    }
    return null
}
function Ij() {
    return typeof CSS > "u" || !CSS.supports ? !1 : CSS.supports("-webkit-backdrop-filter", "none")
}
function Ec(t) {
    return ["html", "body", "#document"].includes(Qc(t))
}
function Zn(t) {
    return on(t).getComputedStyle(t)
}
function jp(t) {
    return Yn(t) ? {
        scrollLeft: t.scrollLeft,
        scrollTop: t.scrollTop
    } : {
        scrollLeft: t.scrollX,
        scrollTop: t.scrollY
    }
}
function uo(t) {
    if (Qc(t) === "html")
        return t;
    const s = t.assignedSlot || t.parentNode || lw(t) && t.host || Aa(t);
    return lw(s) ? s.host : s
}
function BE(t) {
    const s = uo(t);
    return Ec(s) ? t.ownerDocument ? t.ownerDocument.body : t.body : Ea(s) && rm(s) ? s : BE(s)
}
function gu(t, s, r) {
    var n;
    s === void 0 && (s = []),
    r === void 0 && (r = !0);
    const a = BE(t),
        i = a === ((n = t.ownerDocument) == null ? void 0 : n.body),
        o = on(a);
    if (i) {
        const l = Nv(o);
        return s.concat(o, o.visualViewport || [], rm(a) ? a : [], l && r ? gu(l) : [])
    }
    return s.concat(a, gu(a, [], r))
}
function Nv(t) {
    return t.parent && Object.getPrototypeOf(t.parent) ? t.frameElement : null
}
function qE(t) {
    const s = Zn(t);
    let r = parseFloat(s.width) || 0,
        n = parseFloat(s.height) || 0;
    const a = Ea(t),
        i = a ? t.offsetWidth : r,
        o = a ? t.offsetHeight : n,
        l = mf(r) !== i || mf(n) !== o;
    return l && (r = i, n = o), {
        width: r,
        height: n,
        $: l
    }
}
function Dj(t) {
    return Yn(t) ? t : t.contextElement
}
function Xl(t) {
    const s = Dj(t);
    if (!Ea(s))
        return Na(1);
    const r = s.getBoundingClientRect(),
        {width: n, height: a, $: i} = qE(s);
    let o = (i ? mf(r.width) : r.width) / n,
        l = (i ? mf(r.height) : r.height) / a;
    return (!o || !Number.isFinite(o)) && (o = 1), (!l || !Number.isFinite(l)) && (l = 1), {
        x: o,
        y: l
    }
}
const $L = Na(0);
function HE(t) {
    const s = on(t);
    return !Ij() || !s.visualViewport ? $L : {
        x: s.visualViewport.offsetLeft,
        y: s.visualViewport.offsetTop
    }
}
function VL(t, s, r) {
    return s === void 0 && (s = !1), !r || s && r !== on(t) ? !1 : s
}
function sl(t, s, r, n) {
    s === void 0 && (s = !1),
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const a = t.getBoundingClientRect(),
        i = Dj(t);
    let o = Na(1);
    s && (n ? Yn(n) && (o = Xl(n)) : o = Xl(t));
    const l = VL(i, r, n) ? HE(i) : Na(0);
    let c = (a.left + l.x) / o.x,
        d = (a.top + l.y) / o.y,
        u = a.width / o.x,
        m = a.height / o.y;
    if (i) {
        const p = on(i),
            y = n && Yn(n) ? on(n) : n;
        let g = p,
            x = Nv(g);
        for (; x && n && y !== g;) {
            const b = Xl(x),
                j = x.getBoundingClientRect(),
                h = Zn(x),
                v = j.left + (x.clientLeft + parseFloat(h.paddingLeft)) * b.x,
                N = j.top + (x.clientTop + parseFloat(h.paddingTop)) * b.y;
            c *= b.x,
            d *= b.y,
            u *= b.x,
            m *= b.y,
            c += v,
            d += N,
            g = on(x),
            x = Nv(g)
        }
    }
    return ff({
        width: u,
        height: m,
        x: c,
        y: d
    })
}
function Oj(t, s) {
    const r = jp(t).scrollLeft;
    return s ? s.left + r : sl(Aa(t)).left + r
}
function WE(t, s, r) {
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const n = t.getBoundingClientRect(),
        a = n.left + s.scrollLeft - (r ? 0 : Oj(t, n)),
        i = n.top + s.scrollTop;
    return {
        x: a,
        y: i
    }
}
function UL(t) {
    let {elements: s, rect: r, offsetParent: n, strategy: a} = t;
    const i = a === "fixed",
        o = Aa(n),
        l = s ? yp(s.floating) : !1;
    if (n === o || l && i)
        return r;
    let c = {
            scrollLeft: 0,
            scrollTop: 0
        },
        d = Na(1);
    const u = Na(0),
        m = Ea(n);
    if ((m || !m && !i) && ((Qc(n) !== "body" || rm(o)) && (c = jp(n)), Ea(n))) {
        const y = sl(n);
        d = Xl(n),
        u.x = y.x + n.clientLeft,
        u.y = y.y + n.clientTop
    }
    const p = o && !m && !i ? WE(o, c, !0) : Na(0);
    return {
        width: r.width * d.x,
        height: r.height * d.y,
        x: r.x * d.x - c.scrollLeft * d.x + u.x + p.x,
        y: r.y * d.y - c.scrollTop * d.y + u.y + p.y
    }
}
function BL(t) {
    return Array.from(t.getClientRects())
}
function qL(t) {
    const s = Aa(t),
        r = jp(t),
        n = t.ownerDocument.body,
        a = Jr(s.scrollWidth, s.clientWidth, n.scrollWidth, n.clientWidth),
        i = Jr(s.scrollHeight, s.clientHeight, n.scrollHeight, n.clientHeight);
    let o = -r.scrollLeft + Oj(t);
    const l = -r.scrollTop;

function pf(t, s) {

        return !0;

        return !1;

        return !0;

        n,
        a;

                return !1;

                    return !1;

            return !1;

                return !1;

            const i = a[n];

                return !1
        }
        return !0
    }
    return t !== t && s !== s
}

function O3(t, s) {
    const r = Math.abs(s.top - t.y),
        n = Math.abs(s.bottom - t.y),
        a = Math.abs(s.right - t.x),
        i = Math.abs(s.left - t.x);
    switch (Math.min(r, n, a, i)) {
    case i:
        return "left";
    case a:
        return "right";
    case r:
        return "top";
    case n:
        return "bottom";
    default:
        throw new Error("unreachable")
    }
}
function L3(t, s, r=5) {
    const n = [];
    switch (s) {
    case "top":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y + r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break;
    case "bottom":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y - r
        });
        break;
    case "left":
        n.push({
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break;
    case "right":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break
    }
    return n
}
function F3(t) {
    const {top: s, right: r, bottom: n, left: a} = t;

        x: a,
        y: s
    }, {
        x: r,
        y: s
    }, {
        x: r,
        y: n
    }, {
        x: a,
        y: n
    }]
}
function z3(t, s) {
    const {x: r, y: n} = t;

            c = s[i].y,
            d = s[o].x,
            u = s[o].y;
        c > n != u > n && r < (d - l) * (n - c) / (u - c) + l && (a = !a)
    }
    return a
}
function $3(t) {

function V3(t) {
    if (t.length <= 1)
        return t.slice();
    const s = [];
    for (let n = 0; n < t.length; n++) {
        const a = t[n];
        for (; s.length >= 2;) {
            const i = s[s.length - 1],
                o = s[s.length - 2];
            if ((i.x - o.x) * (a.y - o.y) >= (i.y - o.y) * (a.x - o.x))
                s.pop();
            else
                break
        }
        s.push(a)
    }
    s.pop();
    const r = [];
    for (let n = t.length - 1; n >= 0; n--) {
        const a = t[n];
        for (; r.length >= 2;) {
            const i = r[r.length - 1],
                o = r[r.length - 2];
            if ((i.x - o.x) * (a.y - o.y) >= (i.y - o.y) * (a.x - o.x))
                r.pop();

                break
        }

    }

}

function fw(t, s) {

}

function kv() {

            let x;

            try {
                x = b ?? t.fn()
            } catch (j) {
                x = Promise.reject(j)
            }
            Promise.resolve(x).then(m).catch(j => {
                var C;
                if (n)
                    return;
                const h = t.retry ?? (rl ? 0 : 3),
                    v = t.retryDelay ?? Q3,

                    w = h === !0 || typeof h == "number" && r < h || typeof h == "function" && h(r, j);
                if (s || !w) {
                    p(j);
                    return
                }
                r++,

                W3(N).then(() => d() ? void 0 : y()).then(() => {
                    s ? p(j) : g()
                })
            })
        };

        promise: i,
        cancel: o,
        continue: () => (a == null || a(), i),
        cancelRetry: l,
        continueRetry: c,
        canStart: u,
        start: () => (u() ? g() : y().then(g), i)
    }
}
function X3() {

        s = 0,
        r = l => {
            l()
        },
        n = l => {
            l()
        },
        a = l => setTimeout(l, 0);

            s ? t.push(l) : a(() => {
                r(l)
            })
        },

            const l = t;
            t = [],
            l.length && a(() => {
                n(() => {
                    l.forEach(c => {
                        r(c)
                    })
                })
            })
        };

        batch: l => {
            let c;
            s++;
            try {
                c = l()

                s--,

            }

            r = l
        },
        setBatchNotifyFunction: l => {
            n = l
        },

            a = l
        }
    }

function vw(t) {
    return {
        onFetch: (s, r) => {
            var u,
                m,
                p,
                y,
                g;
            const n = s.options,
                a = (p = (m = (u = s.fetchOptions) == null ? void 0 : u.meta) == null ? void 0 : m.fetchMore) == null ? void 0 : p.direction,
                i = ((y = s.state.data) == null ? void 0 : y.pages) || [],
                o = ((g = s.state.data) == null ? void 0 : g.pageParams) || [];

                    pages: [],
                    pageParams: []
                },
                c = 0;
            const d = async () => {
                let x = !1;
                const b = v => {
                        Object.defineProperty(v, "signal", {
                            enumerable: !0,
                            get: () => (s.signal.aborted ? x = !0 : s.signal.addEventListener("abort", () => {
                                x = !0
                            }), s.signal)
                        })
                    },

                    h = async (v, N, w) => {
                        if (x)
                            return Promise.reject();
                        if (N == null && v.pages.length)
                            return Promise.resolve(v);
                        const C = {
                            queryKey: s.queryKey,
                            pageParam: N,

                            meta: s.options.meta
                        };

                        const S = await j(C),

                            T = w ? K3 : G3;

                        }

                        N = v ? n6 : yw,

                            pages: i,
                            pageParams: o
                        },
                        C = N(n, w);

                        if (c > 0 && N == null)
                            break;

                }
                return l
            };

                    b;

                    queryKey: s.queryKey,

                }, r)
            } : s.fetchFn = d
        }
    }
}

async function Pk(t) {

async function Me(t, s, r) {

        a;

            credentials: "include"
        }
    } else
        n = t,
        a = {
            credentials: "include",
            ...s
        };
    const i = await fetch(n, a);
    return await Pk(i), i
}

function Hj() {
    const t = navigator.userAgent,
        s = [];
    let r = "Unknown",
        n = "Unknown",
        a = !0;
    if (t.indexOf("Chrome") > -1) {
        r = "Chrome";
        const i = t.match(/Chrome\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown",
        parseInt(n.split(".")[0]) < 70 && s.push("Chrome version is outdated. Some features may not work correctly.")
    } else if (t.indexOf("Firefox") > -1) {
        r = "Firefox";
        const i = t.match(/Firefox\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    } else if (t.indexOf("Safari") > -1 && t.indexOf("Chrome") === -1) {
        r = "Safari";
        const i = t.match(/Version\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    } else if (t.indexOf("Edg") > -1) {
        r = "Edge";
        const i = t.match(/Edg\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    }
    return {
        name: r,
        version: n,
        isSupported: a,
        warnings: s
    }
}
function w6(t, s) {
    try {
        t.scrollBy && typeof t.scrollBy == "function" ? t.scrollBy(s) : t.scrollLeft += s.left
    } catch (r) {
        console.warn("Error scrolling element:", r),
        t.scrollLeft += s.left
    }
}
function Tk(t, s, r, n) {
    try {
        t.addEventListener(s, r, n)
    } catch (a) {
        console.warn("Error adding event listener:", a),
        "on" + s in t && (t["on" + s] = r)
    }
}
function Ak(t, s, r, n) {
    try {
        t.removeEventListener(s, r, n)
    } catch (a) {
        console.warn("Error removing event listener:", a),
        "on" + s in t && (t["on" + s] = null)
    }
}
function Mk(t, s, r) {
    try {
        window.history && window.history.pushState ? window.history.pushState(t, s, r) : window.location.href = r
    } catch (n) {
        console.warn("Error with history.pushState:", n),
        window.location.href = r
    }
}
function Rk(t) {
    try {
        window.dispatchEvent(t)
    } catch (s) {
        console.warn("Error dispatching event:", s)
    }
}

var Sl = zv ? {
        passive: !1
    } : !1,
    rF = function(t) {
        return t.tagName === "TEXTAREA"
    },
    Uk = function(t, s) {
        if (!(t instanceof Element))
            return !1;
        var r = window.getComputedStyle(t);
        return r[s] !== "hidden" && !(r.overflowY === r.overflowX && !rF(t) && r[s] === "visible")
    },
    nF = function(t) {
        return Uk(t, "overflowY")
    },
    aF = function(t) {
        return Uk(t, "overflowX")
    },
    Tw = function(t, s) {
        var r = s.ownerDocument,
            n = s;
        do {
            typeof ShadowRoot < "u" && n instanceof ShadowRoot && (n = n.host);
            var a = Bk(t, n);
            if (a) {
                var i = qk(t, n),
                    o = i[1],
                    l = i[2];
                if (o > l)
                    return !0
            }
            n = n.parentNode
        } while (n && n !== r.body);
        return !1
    },
    iF = function(t) {
        var s = t.scrollTop,
            r = t.scrollHeight,
            n = t.clientHeight;
        return [s, r, n]
    },
    oF = function(t) {
        var s = t.scrollLeft,
            r = t.scrollWidth,
            n = t.clientWidth;
        return [s, r, n]
    },
    Bk = function(t, s) {
        return t === "v" ? nF(s) : aF(s)
    },
    qk = function(t, s) {
        return t === "v" ? iF(s) : oF(s)
    },
    lF = function(t, s) {
        return t === "h" && s === "rtl" ? -1 : 1
    },
    cF = function(t, s, r, n, a) {

            o = i * n,
            l = r.target,
            c = s.contains(l),

            p = 0;

                g = y[0],

        } while (!c && l !== document.body || c && (s.contains(l) || s === l));
        return (u && (Math.abs(m) < 1 || !a) || !u && (Math.abs(p) < 1 || !a)) && (d = !0), d
    },
    Xm = function(t) {
        return "changedTouches" in t ? [t.changedTouches[0].clientX, t.changedTouches[0].clientY] : [0, 0]
    },
    Aw = function(t) {
        return [t.deltaX, t.deltaY]
    },
    Mw = function(t) {
        return t && "current" in t ? t.current : t
    },
    dF = function(t, s) {
        return t[0] === s[0] && t[1] === s[1]
    },

        ).concat(t, ` {pointer-events: all;}

    },

function hF(t) {

    }, [t]),

            }), function() {

                })

        }, []),

var GF = {
    ArrowLeft: "prev",
    ArrowUp: "prev",
    ArrowRight: "next",
    ArrowDown: "next",
    PageUp: "first",
    Home: "first",
    PageDown: "last",
    End: "last"
};
function KF(t, s) {
    return s !== "rtl" ? t : t === "ArrowLeft" ? "ArrowRight" : t === "ArrowRight" ? "ArrowLeft" : t
}
function YF(t, s, r) {
    const n = KF(t.key, r);
    if (!(s === "vertical" && ["ArrowLeft", "ArrowRight"].includes(n)) && !(s === "horizontal" && ["ArrowUp", "ArrowDown"].includes(n)))
        return GF[n]
}
function w4(t, s=!1) {
    const r = document.activeElement;
    for (const n of t)
        if (n === r || (n.focus({
            preventScroll: s
        }), document.activeElement !== r))
            return
}
function ZF(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}

function W4(t) {
    return t ? "open" : "closed"
}
function Nf(t) {
    return t === "indeterminate"
}
function m0(t) {
    return Nf(t) ? "indeterminate" : t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}
function jz(t) {
    const s = document.activeElement;
    for (const r of t)
        if (r === s || (r.focus(), document.activeElement !== s))
            return
}
function bz(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}
function Nz(t, s, r) {
    const a = s.length > 1 && Array.from(s).every(d => d === s[0]) ? s[0] : s,
        i = r ? t.indexOf(r) : -1;
    let o = bz(t, Math.max(i, 0));
    a.length === 1 && (o = o.filter(d => d !== r));
    const c = o.find(d => d.toLowerCase().startsWith(a.toLowerCase()));
    return c !== r ? c : void 0
}
function wz(t, s) {
    const {x: r, y: n} = t;
    let a = !1;
    for (let i = 0, o = s.length - 1; i < s.length; o = i++) {
        const l = s[i].x,
            c = s[i].y,
            d = s[o].x,
            u = s[o].y;
        c > n != u > n && r < (d - l) * (n - c) / (u - c) + l && (a = !a)
    }
    return a
}
function Cz(t, s) {
    if (!s)
        return !1;
    const r = {
        x: t.clientX,
        y: t.clientY
    };
    return wz(r, s)
}
function ju(t) {
    return s => s.pointerType === "mouse" ? t(s) : void 0
}

function Iw(t, s) {
    return t ? s ? (t.src !== s && (t.src = s), t.complete && t.naturalWidth > 0 ? "loaded" : "loading") : "error" : "idle"
}
function m8(t, {referrerPolicy: s, crossOrigin: r}) {
    const n = f8(),
        a = f.useRef(null),
        i = n ? (a.current || (a.current = new window.Image), a.current) : null,
        [o, l] = f.useState(() => Iw(i, t));
    return ys(() => {
        l(Iw(i, t))
    }, [i, t]), ys(() => {
        const c = m => () => {
            l(m)
        };
        if (!i)
            return;
        const d = c("loaded"),
            u = c("error");
        return i.addEventListener("load", d), i.addEventListener("error", u), s && (i.referrerPolicy = s), typeof r == "string" && (i.crossOrigin = r), () => {
            i.removeEventListener("load", d),
            i.removeEventListener("error", u)
        }
    }, [i, r, s]), o
}

    y8 = () => {
        const [t] = ft(),
            [s, r] = f.useState(!1),
            {user: n, isLoading: a} = Es(),
            {toast: i} = st(),
            {data: o} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const p = await fetch("/api/cms/site-settings");
                    if (!p.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar configuraciones");
                    return p.json()
                }
            }),
            l = async () => {
                try {
                    (await Me("POST", "/api/auth/logout")).ok ? (i({
                        title: "Sesión cerrada",
                        description: "Has cerrado sesión correctamente"
                    }), window.location.href = "/") : i({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Hubo un problema al cerrar sesión",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } catch (p) {
                    console.error("Error al cerrar sesión:", p),
                    i({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo cerrar sesión",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            c = p => t === p,
            d = () => n ? n.firstName ? n.firstName.substring(0, 2).toUpperCase() : n.email ? n.email.substring(0, 2).toUpperCase() : "DM" : "DM",
            u = () => {
                if (!o)
                    return "Lun-Vie: 9AM-7PM, Sáb: 9AM-2PM";
                const p = o.find(y => y.key === "business_hours");
                if (!p)
                    return "Lun-Vie: 9AM-7PM, Sáb: 9AM-2PM";
                try {
                    const y = JSON.parse(p.value),
                        g = j => j === "closed" || j === "Cerrado" ? "Cerrado" : j,
                        x = g(y.monday || ""),
                        b = g(y.saturday || "");
                    return x && b && b !== "Cerrado" ? `Lun-Vie: ${x}, Sáb: ${b}` : x ? `Lun-Vie: ${x}` : "Lun-Vie: 9AM-7PM, Sáb: 9AM-2PM"
                } catch {
                    return "Lun-Vie: 9AM-7PM, Sáb: 9AM-2PM"
                }
            },
            m = () => {

function Eu() {

        passive: !0

function I8(t, s, r, n) {

function il(t=0, s=0) {

    }

    }

    }

    }

function O8(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c, d, u, m, p, y, g, x, b, j, h) {

            passive: !1

function L8(t, s) {

function V8(t, s, r, n, a, i) {

function U8(t, s, r, n, a) {

    }

    }

    }

    }

function B8(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const i = il(-s + t, 0),
        o = m(),
        l = u(),
        c = p();
    function d(g, x) {
        return Gd(g, x) <= 1
    }
    function u() {
        const g = o[0],
            x = Hn(o),
            b = o.lastIndexOf(g),
            j = o.indexOf(x) + 1;
        return il(b, j)
    }
    function m() {
        return r.map((g, x) => {
            const {min: b, max: j} = i,
                h = i.constrain(g),
                v = !x,
                N = j0(r, x);
            return v ? j : N || d(b, h) ? b : d(j, h) ? j : h
        }).map(g => parseFloat(g.toFixed(3)))
    }
    function p() {
        if (s <= t + a)
            return [i.max];
        if (n === "keepSnaps")
            return o;
        const {min: g, max: x} = l;
        return o.slice(g, x)
    }
    return {
        snapsContained: c,
        scrollContainLimit: l
    }
}
function q8(t, s, r) {

function H8(t, s, r, n) {

    }

        n.forEach(g => g.add(y))
    }

function G8(t, s, r, n, a) {

function K8(t, s, r, n, a, i) {

    }

function Y8(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const {reachedAny: i, removeOffset: o, constrain: l} = n;

        return g.concat().sort((x, b) => ns(x) - ns(b))[0]
    }
    function d(g) {
        const x = t ? o(g) : l(g),
            b = s.map((h, v) => ({
                diff: u(h - x, 0),
                index: v
            })).sort((h, v) => ns(h.diff) - ns(v.diff)),
            {index: j} = b[0];
        return {
            index: j,
            distance: x
        }
    }
    function u(g, x) {
        const b = [g, g + r, g - r];
        if (!t)
            return g;
        if (!x)
            return c(b);
        const j = b.filter(h => y0(h) === x);
        return j.length ? c(j) : Hn(b) - r
    }
    function m(g, x) {
        const b = s[g] - a.get(),
            j = u(b, x);
        return {
            index: g,
            distance: j
        }
    }
    function p(g, x) {
        const b = a.get() + g,
            {index: j, distance: h} = d(b),
            v = !t && i(b);
        if (!x || v)
            return {
                index: j,
                distance: g
            };
        const N = s[j] - h,
            w = g + u(N, 0);
        return {
            index: j,
            distance: w
        }
    }
    return {
        byDistance: p,
        byIndex: m,
        shortcut: u
    }
}
function Z8(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {

    }

function Md(t) {

function BP(t, s) {

function X8(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c) {

function Sf(t, s, r) {

        }

    };

function b0(t={}, s=[]) {

        n = f.useRef(s),
        [a, i] = f.useState(),
        [o, l] = f.useState(),
        c = f.useCallback(() => {
            a && a.reInit(r.current, n.current)
        }, [a]);
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        g0(r.current, t) || (r.current = t, c())
    }, [t, c]), f.useEffect(() => {
        T8(n.current, s) || (n.current = s, c())
    }, [s, c]), f.useEffect(() => {

            Sf.globalOptions = b0.globalOptions;
            const d = Sf(o, r.current, n.current);

        } else
            i(void 0)
    }, [o, i]), [l, a]
}
b0.globalOptions = void 0;
const qP = f.createContext(null);
function Op() {
    const t = f.useContext(qP);
    if (!t)
        throw new Error("useCarousel must be used within a <Carousel />");
    return t
}
const _c = f.forwardRef(({orientation: t="horizontal", opts: s, setApi: r, plugins: n, className: a, children: i, ...o}, l) => {
    const [c, d] = b0({
            ...s,
            axis: t === "horizontal" ? "x" : "y"
        }, n),
        [u, m] = f.useState(!1),
        [p, y] = f.useState(!1),
        g = f.useCallback(h => {
            h && (m(h.canScrollPrev()), y(h.canScrollNext()))
        }, []),
        x = f.useCallback(() => {
            d == null || d.scrollPrev()
        }, [d]),
        b = f.useCallback(() => {
            d == null || d.scrollNext()
        }, [d]),
        j = f.useCallback(h => {
            h.key === "ArrowLeft" ? (h.preventDefault(), x()) : h.key === "ArrowRight" && (h.preventDefault(), b())
        }, [x, b]);
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        !d || !r || r(d)
    }, [d, r]), f.useEffect(() => {
        if (d)
            return g(d), d.on("reInit", g), d.on("select", g), () => {
                d == null || d.off("select", g)
            }
    }, [d, g]), e.jsx(qP.Provider, {
        value: {
            carouselRef: c,
            api: d,
            opts: s,
            orientation: t || ((s == null ? void 0 : s.axis) === "y" ? "vertical" : "horizontal"),
            scrollPrev: x,
            scrollNext: b,
            canScrollPrev: u,
            canScrollNext: p
        },
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            ref: l,
            onKeyDownCapture: j,
            className: me("relative", a),
            role: "region",
            "aria-roledescription": "carousel",
            ...o,
            children: i
        })
    })
});

            console.log("🔧 Llamando a updateConfig con:", t);

                const s = await fetch("/api/config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(t)

                    status: s.status,
                    data: r
                }), !s.ok)
                    throw console.error("❌ Error HTTP:", s.status, r), new Error(r.error || r.details || `Error HTTP ${s.status}`);
                if (!r.success)
                    throw console.error("❌ Respuesta no exitosa:", r), new Error(r.error || "La operación no fue exitosa");
                return console.log("✅ Configuración actualizada exitosamente:", r), r
            } catch (s) {
                throw console.error("❌ Error en updateConfig:", s), s.name === "TypeError" && s.message.includes("fetch") ? new Error("Error de conexión con el servidor") : s
            }

        async deleteImportFromHistory(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/import/${t}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok) {
                const n = await s.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(n.message || "Error al eliminar importación del historial")
            }
            const r = await s.text();
            if (!r || r.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Importación eliminada correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(r)
            } catch (n) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", n, "Response text:", r), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Importación eliminada correctamente"
                }
            }
        },
        async deleteAllImportHistory() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/import/clear-all", {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!t.ok) {
                const r = await t.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(r.message || "Error al eliminar todo el historial de importaciones")
            }

                    success: !0,
                    message: "Historial eliminado correctamente"
                };

            } catch (r) {

                    success: !0,
                    message: "Historial eliminado correctamente"
                }

function Wv(t, [s, r]) {
    return Math.min(r, Math.max(s, t))
}
var l$ = [" ", "Enter", "ArrowUp", "ArrowDown"],
    c$ = [" ", "Enter"],
    fm = "Select",
    [Fp, zp, d$] = em(fm),
    [ed, lZ] = bs(fm, [d$, jo]),
    $p = jo(),
    [u$, bo] = ed(fm),
    [m$, h$] = ed(fm),
    HP = t => {
        const {__scopeSelect: s, children: r, open: n, defaultOpen: a, onOpenChange: i, value: o, defaultValue: l, onValueChange: c, dir: d, name: u, autoComplete: m, disabled: p, required: y, form: g} = t,
            x = $p(s),
            [b, j] = f.useState(null),
            [h, v] = f.useState(null),
            [N, w] = f.useState(!1),
            C = vl(d),
            [S=!1, _] = Wr({
                prop: n,
                defaultProp: a,
                onChange: i
            }),
            [T, B] = Wr({
                prop: o,
                defaultProp: l,
                onChange: c
            }),
            z = f.useRef(null),
            A = b ? g || !!b.closest("form") : !0,
            [O, H] = f.useState(new Set),
            D = Array.from(O).map(R => R.props.value).join(";");
        return e.jsx(zj, {
            ...x,
            children: e.jsxs(u$, {
                required: y,
                scope: s,
                trigger: b,
                onTriggerChange: j,
                valueNode: h,
                onValueNodeChange: v,
                valueNodeHasChildren: N,
                onValueNodeHasChildrenChange: w,
                contentId: an(),
                value: T,
                onValueChange: B,
                open: S,
                onOpenChange: _,
                dir: C,
                triggerPointerDownPosRef: z,
                disabled: p,
                children: [e.jsx(Fp.Provider, {
                    scope: s,
                    children: e.jsx(m$, {
                        scope: t.__scopeSelect,
                        onNativeOptionAdd: f.useCallback(R => {
                            H(E => new Set(E).add(R))
                        }, []),
                        onNativeOptionRemove: f.useCallback(R => {
                            H(E => {
                                const I = new Set(E);
                                return I.delete(R), I
                            })
                        }, []),
                        children: r
                    })
                }), A ? e.jsxs(x_, {
                    "aria-hidden": !0,
                    required: y,
                    tabIndex: -1,
                    name: u,
                    autoComplete: m,
                    value: T,
                    onChange: R => B(R.target.value),
                    disabled: p,
                    form: g,
                    children: [T === void 0 ? e.jsx("option", {
                        value: ""
                    }) : null, Array.from(O)]
                }, D) : null]
            })
        })
    };
HP.displayName = fm;
var WP = "SelectTrigger",
    GP = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeSelect: r, disabled: n=!1, ...a} = t,
            i = $p(r),
            o = bo(WP, r),
            l = o.disabled || n,
            c = ot(s, o.onTriggerChange),
            d = zp(r),

}

function Q$({category: t}) {
    const {data: s, isLoading: r, error: n} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["category-parts", t],
            queryFn: async () => {
                console.log(`🔍 Buscando piezas para categoría: "${t}"`);
                const i = new URLSearchParams;
                i.set("familia", t),
                i.set("activo", "true"),
                i.set("limit", "8"),
                i.set("offset", "0"),
                i.set("getTotalCount", "true"),
                i.set("orden", "newest");
                const o = `/api/search-parts?${i.toString()}`;
                console.log(`🔎 Usando endpoint: ${o}`);
                const l = await fetch(o);
                if (!l.ok)
                    throw new Error(`Error ${l.status}: ${l.statusText}`);
                const c = await l.json(),
                    d = (c == null ? void 0 : c.data) || [];
                return console.log(`✅ Piezas encontradas para "${t}": ${d.length}`), d.length > 0 ? console.log(`📦 Primera pieza de "${t}":`, {
                    descripcion: d[0].descripcionArticulo,
                    familia: d[0].descripcionFamilia
                }) : console.log(`🚨 No se encontraron piezas para "${t}"`), d
            },
            staleTime: 18e4,
            retry: 1
        }),
        a = s || [];
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4",
        children: [r ? [...Array(8)].map((i, o) => e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-4 animate-pulse",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "h-40 bg-gray-200 rounded mb-4"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-3",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-3/4"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-3 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/2"
                })]
            })]
        }, o)) : n ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "col-span-4 text-center py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-6",
                children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                    className: "text-lg font-medium text-red-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Error al cargar piezas"
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-red-700",
                    children: ["No se pudieron cargar las piezas de ", t]
                })]
            })
        }) : a.length > 0 ? a.map(i => e.jsx(Ic, {
            part: i
        }, i.id || i.refLocal)) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "col-span-4 text-center py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("h3", {
                    className: "text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: ["No hay piezas disponibles en ", t]
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: "Esta categoría no tiene piezas disponibles en este momento."
                }), e.jsx(Re, {
                    href: `/piezas?familia=${encodeURIComponent(t)}`,
                    children: e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        size: "sm",
                        children: "Buscar en catálogo completo"
                    })
                })]
            })
        }), a.length > 0 && e.jsx("div", {
            className: "col-span-4 text-center mt-8",
            children: e.jsx(Re, {
                href: `/piezas?familia=${encodeURIComponent(t)}`,
                children: e.jsxs(P, {
                    variant: "outline",
                    className: "bg-white hover:bg-gray-50",
                    children: ["Ver todas las piezas de ", t]
                })
            })
        })]
    })
}
function X$() {
    const {data: t} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["optimized-vehicles"],
            queryFn: () => fetch("/api/optimized/vehicles?limit=10&withPartCounts=true&orden=fecha_desc").then(u => u.json()),
            staleTime: 3e4
        }),
        {data: s} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["parts-categories"],
            queryFn: () => fetch("/api/parts/families").then(u => u.json()),
            staleTime: 3e4
        }),
        {data: r, isLoading: n} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/homepage-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const u = await fetch("/api/cms/homepage-blocks");
                if (!u.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return u.json()
            },
            staleTime: 3e5,
            retry: 1
        }),
        a = (t == null ? void 0 : t.data) || [],
        i = s || [],
        {data: o, isLoading: l, error: c} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["parts-for-home"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                var u,
                    m;
                try {
                    console.log("🔍 Iniciando carga de piezas para home...");
                    const p = new URLSearchParams;
                    p.set("activo", "true"),
                    p.set("limit", "50"),
                    p.set("offset", "0"),
                    p.set("getTotalCount", "true"),
                    p.set("orden", "newest");
                    const y = `/api/search-parts?${p.toString()}`;
                    console.log(`🔎 Usando endpoint optimizado: ${y}`);
                    const g = await fetch(y);
                    if (console.log("📡 Respuesta del endpoint:", {
                        status: g.status,
                        statusText: g.statusText,
                        ok: g.ok
                    }), !g.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error ${g.status}: ${g.statusText}`);
                    const x = await g.json();
                    console.log("✅ Datos recibidos:", {
                        dataStructure: Object.keys(x),
                        partsLength: ((u = x == null ? void 0 : x.data) == null ? void 0 : u.length) || 0,
                        pagination: x == null ? void 0 : x.pagination,
                        firstPart: ((m = x == null ? void 0 : x.data) == null ? void 0 : m[0]) || "no parts"
                    });
                    const b = (x == null ? void 0 : x.data) || [];
                    return console.log(`📊 Piezas procesadas para home: ${b.length} piezas encontradas`), b.length > 0 && console.log("✨ Primera pieza:", b[0]), b
                } catch (p) {
                    throw console.error("💥 Error loading parts for home:", p), p
                }
            },
            staleTime: 18e4,
            refetchOnMount: !0,
            retry: 1
        }),
        d = o || [];
    return console.log("🔍 Estado de piezas en Home:", {
        allPartsLength: d.length,
        categoriesLength: i.length,
        isLoadingParts: l
    }), e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
        children: [e.jsx(L$, {}), e.jsx("section", {
            className: "py-16 bg-gradient-to-b from-primary/5 to-background w-full",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "w-full max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mb-6 text-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-2",
                        children: "Catálogo de Vehículos"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                        children: "Encuentra las piezas que necesitas para tu vehículo"
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(_c, {
                    className: "w-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-0",
                    children: [e.jsx(Tc, {
                        children: a && a.length > 0 ? [...a].sort((u, m) => u.fechaActualizacion && m.fechaActualizacion ? new Date(m.fechaActualizacion).getTime() - new Date(u.fechaActualizacion).getTime() : u.fechaCreacion && m.fechaCreacion ? new Date(m.fechaCreacion).getTime() - new Date(u.fechaCreacion).getTime() : (m.id || 0) - (u.id || 0)).map(u => e.jsx(Go, {
                            className: "md:basis-1/2 lg:basis-1/4",
                            children: e.jsx(C0, {
                                vehicle: u
                            })
                        }, u.id)) : e.jsx(Go, {
                            className: "flex justify-center w-full",
                            children: e.jsx($, {
                                className: "w-full p-6 text-center",
                                children: e.jsx(V, {
                                    children: e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: "Cargando vehículos..."
                                    })
                                })
                            })
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(Ac, {}), e.jsx(Mc, {})]
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "text-center mt-8",
                    children: e.jsx(Re, {
                        href: "/vehiculos",
                        children: e.jsx(P, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "bg-white hover:bg-gray-50",
                            children: "Ver todos los vehículos"
                        })
                    })
                })]
            })
        }), r && !n && e.jsx(B$, {
            blocks: r

                            })
                        })]
                    }), i.filter(u => u !== "GENERICO" && u !== "GENÉRICO" && u !== "MOTOS").map(u => {
                        const m = u.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, "-").replace(/[/]/g, "-");
                        return e.jsx(ze, {
                            value: m,
                            children: e.jsx(Q$, {
                                category: u
                            })
                        }, u)
                    })]
                }) : e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-center",
                    children: e.jsx($, {
                        className: "w-full max-w-md p-6 text-center",
                        children: e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                children: "Cargando categorías de piezas..."
                            })
                        })
                    })
                })]
            })
        }), e.jsx("section", {
            className: "py-16 bg-white w-full",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "w-full max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6",
                children: e.jsxs(_c, {
                    className: "w-full max-w-7xl mx-auto",
                    children: [e.jsx(Tc, {
                        children: [{
                            name: "AUDI",
                            logo: q$
                        }, {
                            name: "BMW",
                            logo: H$
                        }, {
                            name: "MERCEDES-BENZ",
                            logo: W$
                        }, {
                            name: "VOLKSWAGEN",
                            logo: G$
                        }, {
                            name: "TOYOTA",
                            logo: K$
                        }, {
                            name: "RENAULT",
                            logo: Y$
                        }, {
                            name: "SEAT",
                            logo: Z$
                        }].map(u => e.jsx(Go, {
                            className: "md:basis-1/4 lg:basis-1/4",
                            children: e.jsx(Re, {
                                href: `/piezas?marca=${encodeURIComponent(u.name)}`,
                                className: "flex items-center justify-center p-6 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors h-full",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "text-center",
                                    children: [e.jsx("img", {
                                        src: u.logo,
                                        alt: `${u.name} logo`,
                                        className: "object-contain mx-auto mb-4 w-20 h-20"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium text-sm",
                                        children: u.name
                                    })]
                                })
                            })
                        }, u.name))
                    }), e.jsx(Ac, {}), e.jsx(Mc, {})]
                })
            })
        }), e.jsx(z$, {}), e.jsx(V$, {})]
    })
}
const S0 = ({title: t, description: s, keywords: r, image: n, url: a, type: i="website", price: o, availability: l="in stock", brand: c, category: d}) => (f.useEffect(() => {
    document.title = t,
    Rr("description", s),
    r && Rr("keywords", r),
    Rr("og:title", t, "property"),
    Rr("og:description", s, "property"),
    Rr("og:type", i, "property"),
    Rr("og:site_name", "Desguace Murcia", "property"),
    Rr("og:locale", "es_ES", "property"),
    n && (Rr("og:image", n, "property"), Rr("og:image:alt", t, "property")),
    a && Rr("og:url", a, "property"),
    Rr("twitter:card", "summary_large_image"),
    Rr("twitter:title", t),
    Rr("twitter:description", s),
    n && Rr("twitter:image", n),
    i === "product" && o && Bw("product-schema", {
        "@context": "https://schema.org/",
        "@type": "Product",
        name: t,
        description: s,
        image: n,
        brand: c || "Desguace Murcia",
        category: d || "Recambios de Automóvil",
        offers: {
            "@type": "Offer",
            price: o,
            priceCurrency: "EUR",
            availability: l === "in stock" ? "https://schema.org/InStock" : "https://schema.org/OutOfStock",
            seller: {
                "@type": "Organization",
                name: "Desguace Murcia"
            }
        }
    }),
    i === "article" && d === "vehicle" && Bw("vehicle-schema", {
        "@context": "https://schema.org/",
        "@type": "Car",
        name: t,
        description: s,
        image: n,
        brand: c,
        category: "Vehículo para Desguace"
    })
}, [t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c, d]), null);
function Rr(t, s, r="name") {
    let n = document.querySelector(`meta[${r}="${t}"]`);
    n || (n = document.createElement("meta"), n.setAttribute(r, t), document.head.appendChild(n)),
    n.setAttribute("content", s)
}
function Bw(t, s) {
    let r = document.getElementById(t);
    r || (r = document.createElement("script"), r.id = t, r.type = "application/ld+json", document.head.appendChild(r)),
    r.textContent = JSON.stringify(s)
}

const eV = () => {
        var se;
        const [, t] = ft();
        vj();

            [n, a] = f.useState(""),
            [i, o] = f.useState(""),
            [l, c] = f.useState(""),
            [d, u] = f.useState("newest"),
            [m, p] = f.useState(""),
            [y, g] = f.useState("grid"),
            [x, b] = f.useState(1),
            [j, h] = f.useState(12);
        f.useState(!1);
        const [v, N] = f.useState(!1),
            w = L => {
                b(L),
                dp(!0)
            };
        f.useEffect(() => {
            const L = () => {
                const te = window.innerWidth < 768;
                N(te),
                te && g("grid")
            };
            return L(), window.addEventListener("resize", L), () => window.removeEventListener("resize", L)
        }, []),
        f.useEffect(() => {
            const L = new URLSearchParams;
            s && L.set("marca", s),
            n && L.set("modelo", n),
            i && L.set("anyo", i),

        }, [s, n, i, l, d, m]);

                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles", s, n, i, l, d, x, j, m],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    var ye,
                        Ke;
                    const L = new URLSearchParams;
                    L.append("limit", j.toString()),
                    L.append("offset", ((x - 1) * j).toString()),
                    L.append("withPartCounts", "true"),
                    L.append("getTotalCount", "true"),
                    L.append("orden", d),

                    n && n !== "all-models" && L.append("modelo", n),

                    l && l !== "all-fuels" && L.append("combustible", l),
                    m && L.append("search", m);
                    const te = await fetch(`/api/optimized/vehicles?${L.toString()}`);
                    if (!te.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error: ${te.statusText}`);
                    const ue = await te.json();
                    return {
                        data: ue.data || [],
                        pagination: {
                            total: ((ye = ue.pagination) == null ? void 0 : ye.total) || 0,
                            hasMore: (x - 1) * j + j < (((Ke = ue.pagination) == null ? void 0 : Ke.total) || 0)
                        }
                    }
                },
                staleTime: 12e4
            }),
            {data: _} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/parts/brands-models"],

                    if (!L.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar marcas y modelos");
                    return await L.json()
                }
            }),
            {data: T} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/vehicles-filter/years", s, n],
                queryFn: async () => {

                    if (!te.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar años");
                    return await te.json()
                }
            }),
            {data: B} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/vehicles-filter/fuels", s, n, i],
                queryFn: async () => {

    tV = () => {
        const s = Ju().id || "0",
            r = parseInt(s);
        f.useEffect(() => {
            window.scrollTo({
                top: 0,
                behavior: "smooth"
            })
        }, [r]);
        const [n, a] = f.useState(0),
            [i, o] = f.useState(""),
            [l, c] = f.useState("grid"),
            {data: d, isLoading: u, error: m} = Pe({
                queryKey: [`vehicle-detail-${r}`],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        console.log(`🔍 Cargando detalles del vehículo ${r}...`);
                        const h = await Lp.getVehicleById(r, {
                            soloActivas: !0
                        });
                        return console.log("✅ Detalles del vehículo cargados:", h), h
                    } catch (h) {
                        throw console.error(`❌ Error cargando vehículo ${r}:`, h), h
                    }
                },
                enabled: !isNaN(r) && r > 0,
                retry: 3,
                staleTime: 3e4
            }),
            p = f.useMemo(() => {
                if (!(d != null && d.parts) || d.parts.length === 0)
                    return [];
                const h = new Set;
                return d.parts.forEach(v => {
                    v.descripcionFamilia && h.add(v.descripcionFamilia)
                }), Array.from(h)
            }, [d == null ? void 0 : d.parts]),
            y = f.useMemo(() => {
                if (!(d != null && d.parts) || d.parts.length === 0 || !(d != null && d.vehicle))
                    return [];
                let h = d.parts;
                if (i.trim()) {
                    const v = i.toLowerCase();
                    h = d.parts.filter(N => N.descripcionArticulo.toLowerCase().includes(v) || N.descripcionFamilia && N.descripcionFamilia.toLowerCase().includes(v) || N.codArticulo.toLowerCase().includes(v) || N.refPrincipal && N.refPrincipal.toLowerCase().includes(v))
                }
                return h.map(v => ({
                    ...v,
                    refLocal: v.refLocal.toString(),
                    vehicleId: d.vehicle.id,
                    vehicleMarca: d.vehicle.marca,
                    vehicleModelo: d.vehicle.modelo,
                    vehicleVersion: d.vehicle.version || "",
                    vehicleAnyo: d.vehicle.anyo,

                        id: d.vehicle.id,
                        marca: d.vehicle.marca,
                        modelo: d.vehicle.modelo,
                        version: d.vehicle.version || "",
                        anyo: d.vehicle.anyo,
                        combustible: d.vehicle.combustible
                    }
                }))
            }, [d == null ? void 0 : d.parts, d == null ? void 0 : d.vehicle, i]);
        if (isNaN(r))
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-12 text-center",

                })]
            });
        if (m)
            return console.error("❌ Error en VehicleDetail:", m), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-12 text-center",

                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"

                })]
            });
        if (!d || !d.vehicle)
            return u ? null : (console.log("⚠️ No hay datos del vehículo, pero no está cargando"), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-12 text-center",

                category: "vehicle"
            }
        })();

var iV = t => {
    const {control: s, checked: r, bubbles: n=!0, defaultChecked: a, ...i} = t,
        o = f.useRef(null),
        l = Tp(r),
        c = bp(s);
    f.useEffect(() => {
        const u = o.current,
            m = window.HTMLInputElement.prototype,
            y = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(m, "checked").set;
        if (l !== r && y) {
            const g = new Event("click", {
                bubbles: n
            });
            u.indeterminate = ro(r),
            y.call(u, ro(r) ? !1 : r),
            u.dispatchEvent(g)
        }
    }, [l, r, n]);
    const d = f.useRef(ro(r) ? !1 : r);
    return e.jsx("input", {
        type: "checkbox",
        "aria-hidden": !0,
        defaultChecked: a ?? d.current,
        ...i,
        tabIndex: -1,
        ref: o,
        style: {
            ...t.style,
            ...c,
            position: "absolute",
            pointerEvents: "none",
            opacity: 0,
            margin: 0
        }
    })
};
function ro(t) {
    return t === "indeterminate"
}
function M_(t) {
    return ro(t) ? "indeterminate" : t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}
var R_ = __,
    oV = A_;
const xi = f.forwardRef(({className: t, ...s}, r) => e.jsx(R_, {

        children: e.jsx(pp, {
            className: "h-4 w-4"
        })
    })
}));

function qw(t) {
    if (t.vehicles && t.vehicles.length > 0) {
        const s = t.vehicles[0];
        return {
            id: s.id,
            marca: s.marca,
            modelo: s.modelo,
            version: s.version || "",
            anyo: s.anyo,
            combustible: s.combustible,
            hasValidId: !!s.id
        }
    }
    return t.vehicleId || t.vehicleMarca || t.vehicleModelo ? {
        id: t.vehicleId,
        marca: t.vehicleMarca || "",
        modelo: t.vehicleModelo || "",
        version: t.vehicleVersion || "",
        anyo: t.vehicleAnyo,
        hasValidId: !!t.vehicleId
    } : t.idVehiculo && (t.vehicleMarca || t.vehicleModelo) ? {
        id: void 0,
        marca: t.vehicleMarca || "",
        modelo: t.vehicleModelo || "",
        version: t.vehicleVersion || "",
        anyo: t.vehicleAnyo,
        hasValidId: !1
    } : {
        id: void 0,
        marca: t.marcaVehiculo || "",
        modelo: t.modeloVehiculo || "",
        version: t.versionVehiculo || "",
        anyo: t.anyoVehiculo,
        hasValidId: !1
    }
}
function lV(t, s={}) {
    const {includeYear: r=!1, uppercase: n=!1, includeId: a=!1} = s,
        i = [t.marca, t.modelo, t.version].filter(Boolean);
    r && t.anyo && i.push(`(${t.anyo})`),
    a && t.id && i.push(`ID: ${t.id}`);
    let o = i.join(" ");
    return n ? o.toUpperCase() : o
}
function Hw(t, s={}) {
    const {hideLinks: r=!1, contextVehicleId: n, includeYear: a=!1, uppercase: i=!1, showId: o=!1} = s,
        l = lV(t, {
            includeYear: a,
            uppercase: i
        }),
        c = !r && t.hasValidId && t.id !== n;
    return {
        vehicleText: l,
        shouldShowLink: c,
        vehicleId: t.id,
        linkTo: t.id ? `/vehiculos/${t.id}` : void 0,
        displayText: o && t.id ? `${l} (ID: ${t.id})` : l
    }
}
