    },
    o7 = Te.object({
        name: Te.string().min(2, {
            message: "El nombre debe tener al menos 2 caracteres"
        }),
        email: Te.string().email({
            message: "Ingrese un correo electrónico válido"
        }),
        phone: Te.string().min(9, {
            message: "Ingrese un número de teléfono válido"
        }),
        subject: Te.string().min(3, {
            message: "El asunto debe tener al menos 3 caracteres"
        }),
        message: Te.string().min(10, {
            message: "El mensaje debe tener al menos 10 caracteres"
        })
    }),
    l7 = () => {
        const {toast: t} = st(),
            {data: s, isLoading: r} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/cms/pages/contacto"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const i = await fetch("/api/cms/pages/contacto");
                    if (!i.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar página de contacto");
                    return i.json()
                }
            }),
            n = cn({
                resolver: Cn(o7),
                defaultValues: {
                    name: "",
                    email: "",
                    phone: "",
                    subject: "",
                    message: ""
                }
            }),
            a = async i => {
                try {
                    console.log("📤 [Contact Form] Enviando datos:", i);
                    const o = await fetch("/api/contact", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(i)
                    });
                    if (console.log("📤 [Contact Form] Respuesta del servidor:", o.status, o.statusText), o.ok) {
                        const l = await o.json();
                        console.log("✅ [Contact Form] Respuesta exitosa:", l),
                        t({
                            title: "Mensaje enviado",
                            description: "Hemos recibido su mensaje. Nos pondremos en contacto con usted lo antes posible.",
                            variant: "default"
                        }),
                        n.reset()
                    } else {
                        const l = await o.json().catch(() => ({}));
                        throw console.error("❌ [Contact Form] Error del servidor:", l), new Error(l.error || "Error al enviar mensaje")
                    }
                } catch (o) {
                    console.error("❌ [Contact Form] Error completo:", o),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: o instanceof Error ? o.message : "No se pudo enviar el mensaje. Inténtelo de nuevo.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            };
        return r ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6 py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "animate-pulse space-y-4",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-8 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/3"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-2/3"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-5/6"
                    })]
                })]
            })
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6 py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-2",
                    children: e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "p-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "mb-6 text-center",
                                children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                                    className: "text-2xl font-montserrat font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-2",
                                    children: (s == null ? void 0 : s.title) || "Contacto"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4",
                                    children: (s == null ? void 0 : s.metaDescription) || "¿Tiene alguna pregunta? ¡Estamos aquí para ayudarle!"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("h2", {
                                className: "text-xl font-montserrat font-semibold mb-6",
                                children: "Envíenos un mensaje"
                            }), e.jsx(kn, {
                                ...n,
                                children: e.jsxs("form", {
                                    onSubmit: n.handleSubmit(a),
                                    className: "space-y-6",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Je, {
                                            control: n.control,
                                            name: "name",
                                            render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                    children: "Nombre completo"
                                                }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                                    children: e.jsx(J, {
                                                        placeholder: "Su nombre",
                                                        ...i
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                            control: n.control,
                                            name: "email",
                                            render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                    children: "Correo electrónico"
                                                }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                                    children: e.jsx(J, {
                                                        placeholder: "ejemplo@correo.com",
                                                        ...i
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                            control: n.control,
                                            name: "phone",
                                            render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                    children: "Teléfono"
                                                }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                                    children: e.jsx(J, {
                                                        placeholder: "600 123 456",
                                                        ...i
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                            control: n.control,
                                            name: "subject",
                                            render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                    children: "Asunto"
                                                }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                                    children: e.jsx(J, {
                                                        placeholder: "Asunto de su mensaje",
                                                        ...i
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                        control: n.control,
                                        name: "message",
                                        render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                            children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                children: "Mensaje"
                                            }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                                children: e.jsx($t, {
                                                    placeholder: "Escriba su mensaje aquí...",
                                                    className: "min-h-[150px]",
                                                    ...i
                                                })
                                            }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                                        type: "submit",
                                        className: "w-full bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90",
                                        disabled: n.formState.isSubmitting,
                                        children: n.formState.isSubmitting ? "Enviando..." : "Enviar mensaje"
                                    })]
                                })
                            })]

function lt(t) {
    const s = Object.prototype.toString.call(t);
    return t instanceof Date || typeof t == "object" && s === "[object Date]" ? new t.constructor(+t) : typeof t == "number" || s === "[object Number]" || typeof t == "string" || s === "[object String]" ? new Date(t) : new Date(NaN)
}
function Gr(t, s) {
    return t instanceof Date ? new t.constructor(s) : new Date(s)
}
function vr(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t);
    return isNaN(s) ? Gr(t, NaN) : (s && r.setDate(r.getDate() + s), r)
}
function Xn(t, s) {

    if (isNaN(s))
        return Gr(t, NaN);
    if (!s)
        return r;
    const n = r.getDate(),
        a = Gr(t, r.getTime());
    a.setMonth(r.getMonth() + s + 1, 0);
    const i = a.getDate();
    return n >= i ? a : (r.setFullYear(a.getFullYear(), a.getMonth(), n), r)
}

const Ei = {
        y(t, s) {

        },
        M(t, s) {

            return s === "M" ? String(r + 1) : It(r + 1, 2)
        },

            case "EEE":
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "EEEEE":
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "EEEEEE":
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "short",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "EEEE":
            default:
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "formatting"
                })
            }
        },
        e: function(t, s, r, n) {
            const a = t.getDay(),
                i = (a - n.weekStartsOn + 8) % 7 || 7;
            switch (s) {
            case "e":
                return String(i);
            case "ee":
                return It(i, 2);
            case "eo":
                return r.ordinalNumber(i, {
                    unit: "day"
                });
            case "eee":
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "eeeee":
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "eeeeee":
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "short",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "eeee":
            default:
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "formatting"
                })
            }
        },
        c: function(t, s, r, n) {
            const a = t.getDay(),
                i = (a - n.weekStartsOn + 8) % 7 || 7;
            switch (s) {
            case "c":
                return String(i);
            case "cc":
                return It(i, s.length);
            case "co":
                return r.ordinalNumber(i, {
                    unit: "day"
                });
            case "ccc":
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "standalone"
                });
            case "ccccc":
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "standalone"
                });
            case "cccccc":
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "short",
                    context: "standalone"
                });
            case "cccc":
            default:
                return r.day(a, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "standalone"
                })
            }
        },
        i: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getDay(),
                a = n === 0 ? 7 : n;
            switch (s) {
            case "i":
                return String(a);
            case "ii":
                return It(a, s.length);
            case "io":
                return r.ordinalNumber(a, {
                    unit: "day"
                });
            case "iii":
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "iiiii":
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "iiiiii":
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "short",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "iiii":
            default:
                return r.day(n, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "formatting"
                })
            }
        },
        a: function(t, s, r) {
            const a = t.getHours() / 12 >= 1 ? "pm" : "am";
            switch (s) {
            case "a":
            case "aa":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "aaa":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                }).toLowerCase();
            case "aaaaa":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "aaaa":
            default:
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "formatting"
                })
            }
        },
        b: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getHours();
            let a;
            switch (n === 12 ? a = _l.noon : n === 0 ? a = _l.midnight : a = n / 12 >= 1 ? "pm" : "am", s) {
            case "b":
            case "bb":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "bbb":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                }).toLowerCase();
            case "bbbbb":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "bbbb":
            default:
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "formatting"
                })
            }
        },
        B: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getHours();
            let a;
            switch (n >= 17 ? a = _l.evening : n >= 12 ? a = _l.afternoon : n >= 4 ? a = _l.morning : a = _l.night, s) {
            case "B":
            case "BB":
            case "BBB":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "abbreviated",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "BBBBB":
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "narrow",
                    context: "formatting"
                });
            case "BBBB":
            default:
                return r.dayPeriod(a, {
                    width: "wide",
                    context: "formatting"
                })
            }
        },
        h: function(t, s, r) {
            if (s === "ho") {
                let n = t.getHours() % 12;
                return n === 0 && (n = 12), r.ordinalNumber(n, {
                    unit: "hour"
                })
            }
            return Ei.h(t, s)
        },
        H: function(t, s, r) {
            return s === "Ho" ? r.ordinalNumber(t.getHours(), {
                unit: "hour"
            }) : Ei.H(t, s)
        },
        K: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getHours() % 12;
            return s === "Ko" ? r.ordinalNumber(n, {
                unit: "hour"
            }) : It(n, s.length)
        },
        k: function(t, s, r) {
            let n = t.getHours();
            return n === 0 && (n = 24), s === "ko" ? r.ordinalNumber(n, {
                unit: "hour"
            }) : It(n, s.length)
        },
        m: function(t, s, r) {
            return s === "mo" ? r.ordinalNumber(t.getMinutes(), {
                unit: "minute"
            }) : Ei.m(t, s)
        },
        s: function(t, s, r) {
            return s === "so" ? r.ordinalNumber(t.getSeconds(), {
                unit: "second"
            }) : Ei.s(t, s)
        },
        S: function(t, s) {
            return Ei.S(t, s)
        },
        X: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getTimezoneOffset();
            if (n === 0)
                return "Z";
            switch (s) {
            case "X":
                return f1(n);
            case "XXXX":
            case "XX":
                return Po(n);
            case "XXXXX":
            case "XXX":
            default:
                return Po(n, ":")
            }
        },
        x: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getTimezoneOffset();
            switch (s) {
            case "x":
                return f1(n);
            case "xxxx":
            case "xx":
                return Po(n);
            case "xxxxx":
            case "xxx":
            default:
                return Po(n, ":")
            }
        },
        O: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getTimezoneOffset();
            switch (s) {
            case "O":
            case "OO":
            case "OOO":
                return "GMT" + h1(n, ":");
            case "OOOO":
            default:
                return "GMT" + Po(n, ":")
            }
        },
        z: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getTimezoneOffset();
            switch (s) {
            case "z":
            case "zz":
            case "zzz":
                return "GMT" + h1(n, ":");
            case "zzzz":
            default:
                return "GMT" + Po(n, ":")
            }
        },
        t: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = Math.trunc(t.getTime() / 1e3);
            return It(n, s.length)
        },
        T: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getTime();
            return It(n, s.length)
        }
    };
function h1(t, s="") {
    const r = t > 0 ? "-" : "+",
        n = Math.abs(t),
        a = Math.trunc(n / 60),
        i = n % 60;
    return i === 0 ? r + String(a) : r + String(a) + s + It(i, 2)
}
function f1(t, s) {
    return t % 60 === 0 ? (t > 0 ? "-" : "+") + It(Math.abs(t) / 60, 2) : Po(t, s)
}
function Po(t, s="") {
    const r = t > 0 ? "-" : "+",
        n = Math.abs(t),
        a = It(Math.trunc(n / 60), 2),
        i = It(n % 60, 2);
    return r + a + s + i
}
const p1 = (t, s) => {
        switch (t) {
        case "P":
            return s.date({
                width: "short"
            });
        case "PP":
            return s.date({
                width: "medium"
            });
        case "PPP":
            return s.date({
                width: "long"
            });
        case "PPPP":
        default:
            return s.date({
                width: "full"
            })
        }
    },
    FT = (t, s) => {
        switch (t) {
        case "p":
            return s.time({
                width: "short"
            });
        case "pp":
            return s.time({
                width: "medium"
            });
        case "ppp":
            return s.time({
                width: "long"
            });
        case "pppp":
        default:
            return s.time({
                width: "full"
            })
        }
    },
    fU = (t, s) => {
        const r = t.match(/(P+)(p+)?/) || [],
            n = r[1],
            a = r[2];
        if (!a)
            return p1(t, s);
        let i;
        switch (n) {
        case "P":
            i = s.dateTime({
                width: "short"
            });
            break;
        case "PP":
            i = s.dateTime({
                width: "medium"
            });
            break;
        case "PPP":
            i = s.dateTime({
                width: "long"
            });
            break;
        case "PPPP":
        default:
            i = s.dateTime({
                width: "full"
            });
            break
        }
        return i.replace("{{date}}", p1(n, s)).replace("{{time}}", FT(a, s))
    },
    pU = {
        p: FT,
        P: fU
    },
    xU = /^D+$/,
    gU = /^Y+$/,
    vU = ["D", "DD", "YY", "YYYY"];
function yU(t) {
    return xU.test(t)
}
function jU(t) {
    return gU.test(t)
}
function bU(t, s, r) {
    const n = NU(t, s, r);
    if (console.warn(n), vU.includes(t))
        throw new RangeError(n)
}
function NU(t, s, r) {
    const n = t[0] === "Y" ? "years" : "days of the month";
    return `Use \`${t.toLowerCase()}\` instead of \`${t}\` (in \`${s}\`) for formatting ${n} to the input \`${r}\`; see: https://github.com/date-fns/date-fns/blob/master/docs/unicodeTokens.md`
}
const wU = /[yYQqMLwIdDecihHKkms]o|(\w)\1*|''|'(''|[^'])+('|$)|./g,
    CU = /P+p+|P+|p+|''|'(''|[^'])+('|$)|./g,
    SU = /^'([^]*?)'?$/,
    EU = /''/g,
    kU = /[a-zA-Z]/;
function Gt(t, s, r) {
    var u,
        m,
        p,
        y,
        g,
        x,
        b,
        j;
    const n = td(),
        a = (r == null ? void 0 : r.locale) ?? n.locale ?? G0,
        i = (r == null ? void 0 : r.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? ((m = (u = r == null ? void 0 : r.locale) == null ? void 0 : u.options) == null ? void 0 : m.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? n.firstWeekContainsDate ?? ((y = (p = n.locale) == null ? void 0 : p.options) == null ? void 0 : y.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? 1,
        o = (r == null ? void 0 : r.weekStartsOn) ?? ((x = (g = r == null ? void 0 : r.locale) == null ? void 0 : g.options) == null ? void 0 : x.weekStartsOn) ?? n.weekStartsOn ?? ((j = (b = n.locale) == null ? void 0 : b.options) == null ? void 0 : j.weekStartsOn) ?? 0,
        l = lt(t);
    if (!k7(l))
        throw new RangeError("Invalid time value");
    let c = s.match(CU).map(h => {
        const v = h[0];
        if (v === "p" || v === "P") {
            const N = pU[v];
            return N(h, a.formatLong)
        }
        return h
    }).join("").match(wU).map(h => {
        if (h === "''")
            return {
                isToken: !1,
                value: "'"
            };
        const v = h[0];
        if (v === "'")
            return {
                isToken: !1,
                value: PU(h)
            };
        if (m1[v])
            return {
                isToken: !0,
                value: h
            };
        if (v.match(kU))
            throw new RangeError("Format string contains an unescaped latin alphabet character `" + v + "`");
        return {
            isToken: !1,
            value: h
        }
    });
    a.localize.preprocessor && (c = a.localize.preprocessor(l, c));
    const d = {
        firstWeekContainsDate: i,
        weekStartsOn: o,
        locale: a
    };
    return c.map(h => {
        if (!h.isToken)
            return h.value;
        const v = h.value;
        (!(r != null && r.useAdditionalWeekYearTokens) && jU(v) || !(r != null && r.useAdditionalDayOfYearTokens) && yU(v)) && bU(v, s, String(t));
        const N = m1[v[0]];
        return N(l, v, a.localize, d)
    }).join("")
}
function PU(t) {
    const s = t.match(SU);
    return s ? s[1].replace(EU, "'") : t
}
function _U(t, s, r) {
    const n = td(),
        a = (r == null ? void 0 : r.locale) ?? n.locale ?? G0,
        i = 2520,
        o = _h(t, s);
    if (isNaN(o))
        throw new RangeError("Invalid time value");
    const l = Object.assign({}, r, {
        addSuffix: r == null ? void 0 : r.addSuffix,
        comparison: o
    });
    let c,
        d;
    o > 0 ? (c = lt(s), d = lt(t)) : (c = lt(t), d = lt(s));
    const u = I7(d, c),
        m = (zc(d) - zc(c)) / 1e3,
        p = Math.round((u - m) / 60);
    let y;
    if (p < 2)
        return r != null && r.includeSeconds ? u < 5 ? a.formatDistance("lessThanXSeconds", 5, l) : u < 10 ? a.formatDistance("lessThanXSeconds", 10, l) : u < 20 ? a.formatDistance("lessThanXSeconds", 20, l) : u < 40 ? a.formatDistance("halfAMinute", 0, l) : u < 60 ? a.formatDistance("lessThanXMinutes", 1, l) : a.formatDistance("xMinutes", 1, l) : p === 0 ? a.formatDistance("lessThanXMinutes", 1, l) : a.formatDistance("xMinutes", p, l);
    if (p < 45)
        return a.formatDistance("xMinutes", p, l);
    if (p < 90)
        return a.formatDistance("aboutXHours", 1, l);
    if (p < u1) {
        const g = Math.round(p / 60);
        return a.formatDistance("aboutXHours", g, l)
    } else {
        if (p < i)
            return a.formatDistance("xDays", 1, l);
        if (p < rh) {
            const g = Math.round(p / u1);
            return a.formatDistance("xDays", g, l)
        } else if (p < rh * 2)
            return y = Math.round(p / rh), a.formatDistance("aboutXMonths", y, l)
    }
    if (y = R7(d, c), y < 12) {
        const g = Math.round(p / rh);
        return a.formatDistance("xMonths", g, l)
    } else {
        const g = y % 12,
            x = Math.trunc(y / 12);
        return g < 3 ? a.formatDistance("aboutXYears", x, l) : g < 9 ? a.formatDistance("overXYears", x, l) : a.formatDistance("almostXYears", x + 1, l)
    }
}
function TU(t, s) {
    return _U(t, E7(t), s)
}
function AU(t) {
    const s = lt(t),
        r = s.getFullYear(),
        n = s.getMonth(),
        a = Gr(t, 0);
    return a.setFullYear(r, n + 1, 0), a.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), a.getDate()
}
function MU(t) {
    return Math.trunc(+lt(t) / 1e3)
}
function RU(t) {
    const s = lt(t),
        r = s.getMonth();
    return s.setFullYear(s.getFullYear(), r + 1, 0), s.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), s
}
function IU(t, s) {
    return P7(RU(t), Br(t), s) + 1
}
function ay(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t),
        n = lt(s);
    return r.getTime() > n.getTime()
}
function zT(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t),
        n = lt(s);
    return +r < +n
}
function K0(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t),
        n = lt(s);
    return r.getFullYear() === n.getFullYear() && r.getMonth() === n.getMonth()
}
function DU(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t),
        n = lt(s);
    return r.getFullYear() === n.getFullYear()
}
function sg(t, s) {
    return vr(t, -s)
}
function rg(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t),
        n = r.getFullYear(),
        a = r.getDate(),
        i = Gr(t, 0);
    i.setFullYear(n, s, 15),
    i.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
    const o = AU(i);
    return r.setMonth(s, Math.min(a, o)), r
}
function x1(t, s) {
    const r = lt(t);
    return isNaN(+r) ? Gr(t, NaN) : (r.setFullYear(s), r)
}
const OU = {
        lessThanXSeconds: {
            one: "menos de un segundo",
            other: "menos de {{count}} segundos"
        },
        xSeconds: {
            one: "1 segundo",
            other: "{{count}} segundos"
        },
        halfAMinute: "medio minuto",
        lessThanXMinutes: {
            one: "menos de un minuto",
            other: "menos de {{count}} minutos"
        },
        xMinutes: {
            one: "1 minuto",
            other: "{{count}} minutos"
        },
        aboutXHours: {
            one: "alrededor de 1 hora",
            other: "alrededor de {{count}} horas"
        },
        xHours: {
            one: "1 hora",
            other: "{{count}} horas"
        },
        xDays: {
            one: "1 día",
            other: "{{count}} días"
        },
        aboutXWeeks: {
            one: "alrededor de 1 semana",
            other: "alrededor de {{count}} semanas"
        },
        xWeeks: {
            one: "1 semana",
            other: "{{count}} semanas"
        },

            other: "alrededor de {{count}} meses"
        },

            other: "{{count}} meses"
        },

            other: "alrededor de {{count}} años"

            other: "{{count}} años"
        },

            other: "más de {{count}} años"
        },

            other: "casi {{count}} años"
        }
    },

        let n;

        return typeof a == "string" ? n = a : s === 1 ? n = a.one : n = a.other.replace("{{count}}", s.toString()), r != null && r.addSuffix ? r.comparison && r.comparison > 0 ? "en " + n : "hace " + n : n
    },
    FU = {
        full: "EEEE, d 'de' MMMM 'de' y",

    },
    zU = {
        full: "HH:mm:ss zzzz",

        short: "HH:mm"
    },
    $U = {
        full: "{{date}} 'a las' {{time}}",
        long: "{{date}} 'a las' {{time}}",
        medium: "{{date}}, {{time}}",
        short: "{{date}}, {{time}}"
    },
    VU = {
        date: sc({
            formats: FU,
            defaultWidth: "full"
        }),

        }),

        })
    },
    UU = {

    },

    HU = {

    },
    WU = {
        narrow: ["1", "2", "3", "4"],

    },
    GU = {

    ZU = {
        narrow: {
            am: "a",
            pm: "p",
            midnight: "mn",
            noon: "md",
            morning: "de la mañana",
            afternoon: "de la tarde",
            evening: "de la tarde",
            night: "de la noche"
        },
        abbreviated: {
            am: "AM",
            pm: "PM",
            midnight: "medianoche",
            noon: "mediodia",
            morning: "de la mañana",
            afternoon: "de la tarde",
            evening: "de la tarde",
            night: "de la noche"
        },
        wide: {
            am: "a.m.",
            pm: "p.m.",
            midnight: "medianoche",
            noon: "mediodia",
            morning: "de la mañana",
            afternoon: "de la tarde",
            evening: "de la tarde",
            night: "de la noche"
        }
    },
    QU = (t, s) => Number(t) + "º",
    XU = {
        ordinalNumber: QU,
        era: fa({
            values: HU,
            defaultWidth: "wide"
        }),
        quarter: fa({
            values: WU,
            defaultWidth: "wide",
            argumentCallback: t => Number(t) - 1
        }),
        month: fa({
            values: GU,
            defaultWidth: "wide"
        }),
        day: fa({
            values: KU,
            defaultWidth: "wide"
        }),
        dayPeriod: fa({
            values: YU,
            defaultWidth: "wide",
            formattingValues: ZU,
            defaultFormattingWidth: "wide"
        })
    },
    JU = /^(\d+)(º)?/i,
    eB = /\d+/i,
    tB = {
        narrow: /^(ac|dc|a|d)/i,
        abbreviated: /^(a\.?\s?c\.?|a\.?\s?e\.?\s?c\.?|d\.?\s?c\.?|e\.?\s?c\.?)/i,
        wide: /^(antes de cristo|antes de la era com[uú]n|despu[eé]s de cristo|era com[uú]n)/i
    },
    sB = {
        any: [/^ac/i, /^dc/i],
        wide: [/^(antes de cristo|antes de la era com[uú]n)/i, /^(despu[eé]s de cristo|era com[uú]n)/i]
    },
    rB = {
        narrow: /^[1234]/i,
        abbreviated: /^T[1234]/i,
        wide: /^[1234](º)? trimestre/i
    },
    nB = {
        any: [/1/i, /2/i, /3/i, /4/i]
    },
    aB = {
        narrow: /^[efmajsond]/i,
        abbreviated: /^(ene|feb|mar|abr|may|jun|jul|ago|sep|oct|nov|dic)/i,
        wide: /^(enero|febrero|marzo|abril|mayo|junio|julio|agosto|septiembre|octubre|noviembre|diciembre)/i
    },
    iB = {
        narrow: [/^e/i, /^f/i, /^m/i, /^a/i, /^m/i, /^j/i, /^j/i, /^a/i, /^s/i, /^o/i, /^n/i, /^d/i],
        any: [/^en/i, /^feb/i, /^mar/i, /^abr/i, /^may/i, /^jun/i, /^jul/i, /^ago/i, /^sep/i, /^oct/i, /^nov/i, /^dic/i]
    },
    oB = {
        narrow: /^[dlmjvs]/i,
        short: /^(do|lu|ma|mi|ju|vi|s[áa])/i,
        abbreviated: /^(dom|lun|mar|mi[ée]|jue|vie|s[áa]b)/i,
        wide: /^(domingo|lunes|martes|mi[ée]rcoles|jueves|viernes|s[áa]bado)/i
    },
    lB = {
        narrow: [/^d/i, /^l/i, /^m/i, /^m/i, /^j/i, /^v/i, /^s/i],
        any: [/^do/i, /^lu/i, /^ma/i, /^mi/i, /^ju/i, /^vi/i, /^sa/i]
    },
    cB = {
        narrow: /^(a|p|mn|md|(de la|a las) (mañana|tarde|noche))/i,
        any: /^([ap]\.?\s?m\.?|medianoche|mediodia|(de la|a las) (mañana|tarde|noche))/i
    },
    dB = {
        any: {
            am: /^a/i,
            pm: /^p/i,
            midnight: /^mn/i,
            noon: /^md/i,
            morning: /mañana/i,
            afternoon: /tarde/i,
            evening: /tarde/i,
            night: /noche/i
        }
    },
    uB = {
        ordinalNumber: IT({
            matchPattern: JU,
            parsePattern: eB,
            valueCallback: function(t) {
                return parseInt(t, 10)
            }
        }),
        era: pa({
            matchPatterns: tB,
            defaultMatchWidth: "wide",
            parsePatterns: sB,
            defaultParseWidth: "any"
        }),
        quarter: pa({
            matchPatterns: rB,
            defaultMatchWidth: "wide",
            parsePatterns: nB,
            defaultParseWidth: "any",
            valueCallback: t => t + 1
        }),
        month: pa({
            matchPatterns: aB,
            defaultMatchWidth: "wide",
            parsePatterns: iB,
            defaultParseWidth: "any"
        }),
        day: pa({
            matchPatterns: oB,
            defaultMatchWidth: "wide",
            parsePatterns: lB,
            defaultParseWidth: "any"
        }),
        dayPeriod: pa({
            matchPatterns: cB,
            defaultMatchWidth: "any",
            parsePatterns: dB,
            defaultParseWidth: "any"
        })
    },
    Ds = {
        code: "es",
        formatDistance: LU,
        formatLong: VU,
        formatRelative: qU,
        localize: XU,
        match: uB,
        options: {
            weekStartsOn: 1,
            firstWeekContainsDate: 1
        }
    },
    mB = () => {
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {data: s, isLoading: r} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const l = await fetch("/api/admin/orders?limit=10");
                    if (!l.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar pedidos");
                    return l.json()
                },
                refetchInterval: 6e4
            }),
            n = l => {
                switch (l) {
                case "pending":
                    return e.jsx(lr, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500"
                    });
                case "processing":
                    return e.jsx(Gs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500"
                    });
                case "shipped":
                    return e.jsx(Ot, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-purple-500"
                    });
                case "delivered":
                    return e.jsx(xv, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                    });
                case "cancelled":
                    return e.jsx(Gs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(lr, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                    })
                }
            },
            a = l => {
                switch (l) {
                case "pending":
                    return "secondary";
                case "processing":
                    return "default";
                case "shipped":
                    return "secondary";
                case "delivered":
                    return "default";
                case "cancelled":
                    return "destructive";
                default:
                    return "secondary"
                }
            },
            i = l => {
                switch (l) {
                case "pending":
                    return "Pendiente";
                case "processing":
                    return "Procesando";
                case "shipped":
                    return "Enviado";
                case "delivered":
                    return "Entregado";
                case "cancelled":
                    return "Cancelado";
                default:
                    return l
                }
            },
            o = (s == null ? void 0 : s.slice(0, 5)) || [];
        return e.jsxs($, {
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(rn, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5"
                            }), "Últimos Pedidos"]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Pedidos más recientes del sistema"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "flex gap-2",
                        children: e.jsx(P, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            size: "sm",
                            onClick: () => t("/admin/orders"),
                            children: "Ver todos"
                        })
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                children: r ? e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-center py-8",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                    })
                }) : o.length === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "text-center py-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(Ot, {
                        className: "h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "No hay pedidos recientes"
                    })]
                }) : e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: o.map(l => e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-between p-3 border rounded-lg",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                            children: [n(l.status), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: ["Pedido #", l.orderNumber]
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: l.customerName
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: l.customerEmail
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: bt(l.total, !1)
                                }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                    variant: a(l.orderStatus || l.status),
                                    children: i(l.orderStatus || l.status)
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }, l.id))
                })
            })]
        })
    },
    hB = () => {
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {data: s, isLoading: r} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/clients/recent"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const a = await fetch("/api/clients/recent");
                    if (!a.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar clientes");
                    return a.json()
                },
                refetchInterval: 12e4
            }),
            n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.slice(0, 5)) || [];
        return e.jsxs($, {
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                className: "h-5 w-5"
                            }), "Últimos Clientes"]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {

                            children: "Clientes registrados recientemente"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => t("/admin/clients"),
                        children: "Ver todos"
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                children: r ? e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-center py-8",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                    })
                }) : n.length === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "text-center py-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(ii, {
                        className: "h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "No hay clientes recientes"
                    })]
                }) : e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: n.map(a => e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-between p-3 border rounded-lg",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "w-10 h-10 bg-primary/10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center",
                                children: e.jsx(ii, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 text-primary"
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: [a.firstName, " ", a.lastName]
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: a.email
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-right",
                            children: [e.jsx(ve, {
                                variant: "secondary",
                                className: "capitalize",
                                children: a.role
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1",
                                children: new Date(a.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()
                            })]
                        })]
                    }, a.id))
                })
            })]
        })
    },
    g1 = () => {
        const [, t] = ft();
        st();
        const {user: s, logout: r} = Es(),
            {data: n, isLoading: a, refetch: i} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/config"],
                queryFn: () => Rc.getConfig(),
                enabled: ql(s)
            }),
            o = async () => {
                try {
                    await r(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (l) {
                    console.error("Error al cerrar sesión:", l)
                }
            };
        return a && ql(s) ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
            })
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Panel Principal"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Resumen de datos y estadísticas"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: o,
                        children: [e.jsx(LogOut, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                        }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                    })]
                }), ql(s) && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-full",
                        children: e.jsx($0, {})
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-full",
                        children: e.jsx(B0, {
                            refreshInterval: 2e4
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(mB, {}), e.jsx(hB, {})]
                }), ql(s) && e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 gap-8 mb-8",
                    children: e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "p-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                        className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                        children: "Importaciones Automáticas"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: "Configurar horarios de sincronización"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => t("/admin/import-optimized"),
                                    children: [e.jsx(bE, {
                                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                    }), "Configurar"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                children: "Desde aquí puedes acceder a la configuración completa de importaciones programadas, historial de sincronizaciones y herramientas de mantenimiento."
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    v1 = t => {
        switch (t.toLowerCase()) {
        case "completed":
            return "bg-green-100 text-green-800 dark:bg-green-900 dark:text-green-100";
        case "failed":
            return "bg-red-100 text-red-800 dark:bg-red-900 dark:text-red-100";
        case "partial":
            return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 dark:bg-yellow-900 dark:text-yellow-100";
        case "processing":
            return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 dark:bg-blue-900 dark:text-blue-100";
        default:
            return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300"
        }
    },
    y1 = t => {
        switch (t) {
        case "vehicles":
            return "Vehículos";
        case "parts":
            return "Piezas";
        case "all":
            return "Vehículos y Piezas";
        default:
            return t
        }
    },
    j1 = t => {
        switch (t.toLowerCase()) {
        case "completed":
            return "Completado";
        case "failed":
            return "Fallido";
        case "partial":
            return "Parcial";
        case "processing":
        case "in_progress":
            return "En progreso";
        case "paused":
            return "Pausado";
        case "cancelled":
            return "Cancelado";
        default:
            return t
        }
    },
    fB = t => (t.status === "failed" || t.status === "partial" || t.status === "paused") && t.details && (t.details.lastId || t.details.vehicles && t.details.vehicles.lastId || t.details.parts && t.details.parts.lastId),
    pB = t => t.status === "processing" || t.status === "in_progress",
    xB = t => t.status === "processing" || t.status === "in_progress" || t.status === "paused",
    gB = ({history: t, isLoading: s, onDelete: r, onResume: n, onPause: a, onCancel: i, pageSize: o=10, onDeleteAll: l, onPauseAll: c}) => {
        const [d, u] = f.useState(!1),
            [m, p] = f.useState(null),
            [y, g] = f.useState([]),
            [x, b] = f.useState(!1),
            [j, h] = f.useState(null),
            {toast: v} = st(),
            N = dr(),
            [w, C] = f.useState(1),
            S = (w - 1) * o,
            _ = S + o,
            T = t.slice(S, _),
            B = Math.ceil(t.length / o),
            z = async () => {
                if (j !== "delete-all") {
                    h("delete-all");
                    try {
                        const F = t.filter(le => le.status === "in_progress" || le.status === "processing");
                        for (const le of F)
                            try {
                                await ts.cancelImport(le.id)
                            } catch (we) {
                                console.error(`Error al cancelar importación ${le.id}:`, we)
                            }
                        const M = await fetch("/api/import/history", {
                            method: "DELETE",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            credentials: "include"
                        });
                        if (!M.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al eliminar historial");
                        const Q = await M.json();
                        v({
                            title: "Eliminado correctamente",
                            description: Q.message
                        }),
                        l && l()
                    } catch (F) {
                        console.error("Error al eliminar todas las importaciones:", F),
                        v({
                            title: "Error",
                            description: "No se pudo eliminar el historial de importaciones",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        })
                    }
                    h(null)
                }
            },
            A = async () => {
                if (j !== "pause-all") {
                    h("pause-all");
                    try {
                        const F = await fetch("/api/import/history/pause-all", {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            }
                        });
                        if (!F.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al pausar importaciones");
                        const M = await F.json();
                        v({
                            title: "Pausado correctamente",
                            description: M.message
                        }),
                        c && c()
                    } catch (F) {
                        console.error("Error al pausar todas las importaciones:", F),
                        v({
                            title: "Error",
                            description: "No se pudieron pausar las importaciones",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        })
                    }
                    h(null)
                }
            },
            O = F => {
                g(M => M.includes(F) ? M.filter(Q => Q !== F) : [...M, F])
            },
            H = () => {
                y.length === t.length ? g([]) : g(t.map(F => F.id))
            },
            D = async () => {
                h("bulk-delete");
                let F = 0,
                    M = 0;
                for (const Q of y)
                    try {
                        await ts.deleteHistoryItem(Q),
                        r && r(Q),
                        F++
                    } catch (le) {
                        console.error(`Error al eliminar registro ${Q}:`, le),
                        M++
                    }
                v({
                    title: "Eliminación masiva completada",
                    description: `${F} registros eliminados. ${M} errores.`,
                    variant: M > 0 ? "destructive" : "default"
                }),
                g([]),
                b(!1),
                h(null)
            },
            R = F => {
                p(F),
                u(!0)
            },
            E = async () => {
                if (m !== null) {
                    try {
                        await ts.deleteHistoryItem(m),
                        r && r(m),
                        v({
                            title: "Eliminado correctamente",
                            description: "El registro ha sido eliminado del historial"
                        })
                    } catch (F) {
                        console.error("Error al eliminar registro:", F),
                        v({
                            title: "Error al eliminar",
                            description: "No se pudo eliminar el registro. Intente nuevamente.",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        })
                    }
                    u(!1),
                    p(null)
                }
            },
            I = async F => {
                h(`resume-${F}`);
                try {
                    const M = await fetch(`/api/import/history/${F}/resume`, {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            }
                        }),
                        Q = await M.json();
                    if (M.ok && Q.success)
                        v({
                            title: "Importación reanudada",
                            description: Q.message || "La importación se ha reanudado correctamente"
                        }),
                        await N.invalidateQueries({
                            queryKey: ["/api/import/history"]
                        });
                    else
                        throw new Error(Q.message || "Error al reanudar la importación")
                } catch (M) {
                    console.error("Error reanudando importación:", M),
                    v({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M instanceof Error ? M.message : "No se pudo reanudar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    h(null)
                }
            },
            U = async F => {
                h(`pause-${F}`);
                try {
                    const M = await fetch(`/api/import/history/${F}/pause`, {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            }
                        }),
                        Q = await M.json();
                    if (M.ok && Q.success)
                        v({
                            title: "Importación pausada",
                            description: Q.message || "La importación se ha pausado correctamente"
                        }),
                        await N.invalidateQueries({
                            queryKey: ["/api/import/history"]
                        });
                    else
                        throw new Error(Q.message || "Error al pausar la importación")
                } catch (M) {
                    console.error("Error pausando importación:", M),
                    v({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M instanceof Error ? M.message : "No se pudo pausar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    h(null)
                }
            },
            ie = async F => {
                if (j !== `cancel-${F}`) {
                    h(`cancel-${F}`);
                    try {
                        await ts.cancelImport(F),
                        v({
                            title: "Importación cancelada",
                            description: "La importación se ha cancelado correctamente"
                        }),
                        i && i(F)
                    } catch (M) {
                        console.error("Error al cancelar importación:", M),
                        v({
                            title: "Error al cancelar",
                            description: "No se pudo cancelar la importación. Intente nuevamente.",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        })
                    }
                    h(null)
                }
            };
        return s ? e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "text-center py-8",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto mb-4"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                children: "Cargando historial de importaciones..."
            })]
        }) : t.length === 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center py-8 border rounded-md",
            children: e.jsx("p", {
                className: "text-muted-foreground",
                children: "No hay registros de importación todavía"
            })
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "relative",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "mb-4 flex justify-between items-center",

                    className: "flex gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "destructive",
                        onClick: z,
                        disabled: j === "delete-all" || t.length === 0,
                        className: "flex items-center",
                        children: j === "delete-all" ? e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "animate-spin h-4 w-4 mr-2 border-2 border-t-transparent border-white rounded-full"
                            }), "Eliminando..."]
                        }) : e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx(Xt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                            }), "Eliminar todas"]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "secondary",
                        onClick: A,
                        disabled: j === "pause-all" || !t.some(F => F.status === "in_progress" || F.status === "processing"),
                        className: "flex items-center",
                        children: j === "pause-all" ? e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "animate-spin h-4 w-4 mr-2 border-2 border-t-transparent border-secondary rounded-full"
                            }), "Pausando..."]
                        }) : e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx(YN, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                            }), "Pausar todas"]
                        })
                    })]
                }), y.length > 0 && e.jsx(P, {
                    variant: "destructive",
                    size: "sm",
                    onClick: () => b(!0),
                    disabled: j === "bulk-delete",
                    children: j === "bulk-delete" ? e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {

var EB = ({contentRef: t}) => {
        const s = `\`${rc}\` requires a description for the component to be accessible for screen reader users.

You can add a description to the \`${
        rc}\` by passing a \`${KT}\` component as a child, which also benefits sighted users by adding visible context to the dialog.

Alternatively, you can use your own component as a description by assigning it an \`id\` and passing the same value to the \`aria-describedby\` prop in \`${
        rc}\`. If the description is confusing or duplicative for sighted users, you can use the \`@radix-ui/react-visually-hidden\` primitive as a wrapper around your description component.

For more information, see https://radix-ui.com/primitives/docs/components/alert-dialog`

            buttonProps: N,
            divProps: j
        };
    return w
}

function w1(t, s, r) {
    for (var n = r != null && r.ISOWeek ? RT(s) : W0(s, r), a = r != null && r.ISOWeek ? ul(t) : Ta(t, r), i = va(n, a), o = [], l = 0; l <= i; l++)
        o.push(vr(a, l));
    var c = o.reduce(function(d, u) {
        var m = r != null && r.ISOWeek ? DT(u) : LT(u, r),
            p = d.find(function(y) {
                return y.weekNumber === m
            });
        return p ? (p.dates.push(u), d) : (d.push({
            weekNumber: m,
            dates: [u]
        }), d)
    }, []);
    return c
}
function Xq(t, s) {
    var r = w1(Br(t), Gp(t), s);
    if (s != null && s.useFixedWeeks) {
        var n = IU(t, s);
        if (n < 6) {
            var a = r[r.length - 1],
                i = a.dates[a.dates.length - 1],
                o = ny(i, 6 - n),
                l = w1(ny(i, 1), o, s);
            r.push.apply(r, l)
        }
    }
    return r
}

const CH = ({onSuccess: t}) => {
        const {toast: s} = st(),
            [r, n] = f.useState(!1),
            [a, i] = f.useState(!1),
            [o, l] = f.useState(!1),
            [c, d] = f.useState(!1),
            [u, m] = f.useState(!1),
            [p, y] = f.useState(void 0),
            g = async (x, b=!1) => {
                let j;
                x === "vehicles" ? j = b ? d : n : x === "parts" ? j = b ? m : i : j = l;
                try {
                    j(!0);
                    let h,
                        v;
                    if (x === "all" ? v = "/api/metasync-optimized/import/all" : v = `/api/metasync-optimized/import/${x}`, h = await fetch(v, {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            fullImport: b,
                            fromDate: p == null ? void 0 : p.toISOString()
                        })
                    }), !h.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error en la importación: ${h.statusText}`);
                    const N = x === "vehicles" ? "vehículos" : x === "parts" ? "piezas" : "vehículos y piezas",
                        w = b ? "completa" : p ? `desde ${Gt(p, "dd/MM/yyyy", {locale: Ds})}` : "incremental (desde última sincronización)";
                    s({
                        title: "Importación iniciada",
                        description: `La importación ${w} de ${N} ha sido iniciada correctamente.`
                    }),
                    t && t()
                } catch (h) {
                    console.error(`Error al iniciar importación de ${x}:`, h),
                    s({
                        title: "Error al iniciar importación",
                        description: "No se pudo iniciar la importación. Por favor, intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    j(!1)
                }
            };
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-4",
            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                className: "mb-4 text-muted-foreground",
                children: "Inicie una importación manual de vehículos y/o piezas desde la API de Metasync."
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-md space-y-4 mb-4 border border-slate-200",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between mb-2",

                }), e.jsx("p", {

                    children: "Desactiva automáticamente piezas con precio cero o inválido que no deberían aparecer en el catálogo."
