                    onClick: async () => {
                        try {
                            const b = await (await fetch("/api/admin/cleanup-invalid-parts", {
                                method: "POST",
                                headers: {
                                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                                }
                            })).json();
                            b.success ? s({
                                title: "Limpieza completada",
                                description: `${b.deactivated} piezas desactivadas`
                            }) : s({
                                title: "Error",
                                description: b.error || "No se pudo limpiar las piezas.",
                                variant: "destructive"
                            })
                        } catch (x) {
                            s({
                                title: "Error",
                                description: x instanceof Error ? x.message : "Error desconocido",
                                variant: "destructive"
                            })
                        }
                    },
                    variant: "outline",
                    size: "sm",
                    className: "bg-orange-50 hover:bg-orange-100 border-orange-300",
                    children: "🔧 Limpiar Piezas con Precio Inválido"
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    SH = ({schedules: t, onSuccess: s}) => {
        const {toast: r} = st(),
            [n, a] = f.useState(!1),
            o = t.find(g => g.type === "all") || t.find(g => g.type === "vehicles") || t[0],
            [l, c] = f.useState((o == null ? void 0 : o.frequency) || "12h"),
            [d, u] = f.useState((o == null ? void 0 : o.active) || !0),
            [m, p] = f.useState((o == null ? void 0 : o.startTime) || "02:00"),
            y = async () => {
                if (o) {
                    a(!0);
                    try {
                        await ts.updateSchedule(o.id, {
                            frequency: l,
                            active: d,
                            startTime: m
                        }),
                        r({
                            title: "Sincronización automática actualizada",
                            description: "La configuración de sincronización ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                        }),
                        s && s()
                    } catch (g) {
                        console.error("Error al actualizar la sincronización:", g),
                        r({
                            title: "Error al actualizar",
                            description: "No se pudo actualizar la configuración de sincronización",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        })
                    } finally {
                        a(!1)
                    }
                }
            };
        return !o || t.length === 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center py-4",
            children: e.jsx("p", {
                className: "text-muted-foreground",
                children: "No hay programación de sincronización configurada"
            })
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "space-y-4",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-md space-y-4 border border-slate-200",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-between mb-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                            className: "font-medium text-primary",
                            children: "Sincronización automática"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Ha, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-600"
                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "text-sm text-green-600 font-medium",
                                children: "Optimizada"
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                children: "Estado actual"
                            }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                variant: o.active ? "success" : "secondary",
                                children: o.active ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                            })]
                        }), o.lastRun && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground mb-1",
                            children: ["Última sincronización: ", zn(o.lastRun)]
                        }), o.nextRun && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground flex items-center",
                            children: [e.jsx(lr, {
                                className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1"
                            }), "Próxima sincronización: ", zn(o.nextRun)]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex flex-col space-y-1.5",
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: "frequency-select",
                            children: "Frecuencia de sincronización"
                        }), e.jsxs(We, {
                            value: l,
                            onValueChange: c,
                            children: [e.jsx(qe, {
                                id: "frequency-select",
                                children: e.jsx(Ge, {
                                    placeholder: "Seleccione una frecuencia"
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                position: "popper",
                                children: [e.jsx(Y, {
                                    value: "1h",
                                    children: "Cada hora"
                                }), e.jsx(Y, {
                                    value: "6h",
                                    children: "Cada 6 horas"
                                }), e.jsx(Y, {
                                    value: "12h",
                                    children: "Cada 12 horas"
                                }), e.jsx(Y, {
                                    value: "24h",
                                    children: "Cada 24 horas"
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "La sincronización automática importará vehículos y piezas utilizando el sistema optimizado."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex flex-col space-y-1.5",
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: "start-time-input",
                            children: "Hora de inicio"
                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                            id: "start-time-input",
                            type: "time",
                            value: m,
                            onChange: g => p(g.target.value),
                            className: "w-full"
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Hora específica para iniciar las sincronizaciones programadas (formato 24h)."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(wt, {
                            id: "schedule-active",
                            checked: d,
                            onCheckedChange: g => u(g)
                        }), e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: "schedule-active",
                            children: d ? "Sincronización automática activada" : "Sincronización automática desactivada"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        className: "w-full bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90",
                        onClick: y,
                        disabled: n,
                        children: n ? e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                            }), "Guardando configuración..."]
                        }) : e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx(Nn, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Guardar configuración"]
                        })
                    })]
                })
            })
        })
    };
function EH() {
    const {toast: t} = st(),
        s = dr(),
        [r, n] = f.useState(!1),
        {data: a, isLoading: i, error: o} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/import/history"],
            select: g => g || []
        }),
        l = tt({
            mutationFn: async () => (n(!0), await Me("/api/import/recovery", {
                method: "GET"
            })),
            onSuccess: g => {
                var x;
                t({
                    title: "Importaciones recuperadas",
                    description: g.message || `Se han corregido ${((x = g.recoveredImports) == null ? void 0 : x.length) || 0} importaciones`
                }),
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/import/history"]
                }),
                n(!1)
            },
            onError: g => {
                console.error("Error al recuperar importaciones:", g),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron recuperar las importaciones",
                    variant: "destructive"
                }),
                n(!1)
            }
        }),
        c = tt({
            mutationFn: async g => await Me(`/api/import/recovery/${g}`, {
                method: "POST"
            }),
            onSuccess: g => {
                t({
                    title: "Importación completada",
                    description: `La importación ${g.importId} ha sido marcada como completada`
                }),
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/import/history"]
                })
            },
            onError: g => {
                console.error("Error al marcar importación como completada:", g),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo marcar la importación como completada",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        d = g => g ? new Date(g).toLocaleString("es-ES") : "N/A",
        u = (g, x) => {
            if (!g)
                return "N/A";
            const b = new Date(g),
                h = (x ? new Date(x) : new Date).getTime() - b.getTime(),
                v = Math.floor(h / 6e4),
                N = Math.floor(v / 60);
            return N > 0 ? `${N}h ${v % 60}m` : `${v}m`
        },
        m = (a == null ? void 0 : a.filter(g => g.status === "running" && new Date(g.startTime).getTime() < Date.now() - 30 * 60 * 1e3)) || [],
        p = () => {
            l.mutate()
        },
        y = g => {
            c.mutate(g)
        };
    return i ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "flex items-center justify-center p-6",
        children: e.jsx(Qt, {
            className: "h-8 w-8 animate-spin text-primary"
        })
    }) : o ? e.jsxs(br, {
        variant: "destructive",
        children: [e.jsx(Gs, {
            className: "h-4 w-4"
        }), e.jsx(Gi, {
            children: "Error"
        }), e.jsx(Nr, {
            children: "No se pudo cargar el historial de importaciones"
        })]
    }) : e.jsxs($, {
        className: "w-full",
        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
            children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                children: "Recuperación de Importaciones"
            }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                children: 'Gestiona las importaciones que se han quedado en estado "en progreso"'
            })]
        }), e.jsx(V, {
            children: m.length === 0 ? e.jsxs(br, {
                children: [e.jsx(Dt, {
                    className: "h-4 w-4"
                }), e.jsx(Gi, {
                    children: "¡Todo en orden!"
                }), e.jsx(Nr, {
                    children: "No hay importaciones bloqueadas en este momento."
                })]
            }) : e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                children: [e.jsxs(br, {
                    variant: "warning",
                    className: "mb-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(Gs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    }), e.jsx(Gi, {
                        children: "Importaciones bloqueadas"
                    }), e.jsxs(Nr, {
                        children: ["Se han detectado ", m.length, ' importaciones que llevan más de 30 minutos en estado "en progreso"']
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(Ls, {
                    children: [e.jsx(P_, {
                        children: 'Importaciones bloqueadas en estado "en progreso"'
                    }), e.jsx(Fs, {
                        children: e.jsxs(mt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "ID"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Tipo"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Inicio"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Duración"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Estado"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Acciones"
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(zs, {
                        children: m.map(g => e.jsxs(mt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(he, {
                                children: g.id
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: g.type === "vehicles" ? "Vehículos" : g.type === "parts" ? "Piezas" : g.type === "all" ? "Completa" : g.type
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                children: d(g.startTime)
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                children: u(g.startTime, g.endTime)
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                children: e.jsx(ve, {
                                    variant: "secondary",
                                    className: "bg-yellow-500 hover:bg-yellow-600",
                                    children: "En progreso"
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                children: e.jsxs(P, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    onClick: () => y(g.id),
                                    disabled: c.isPending,
                                    children: [c.isPending && c.variables === g.id ? e.jsx(Qt, {
                                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                    }) : null, "Marcar como completada"]
                                })
                            })]
                        }, g.id))
                    })]
                })]
            })
        }), e.jsxs(ka, {
            className: "flex justify-between",
            children: [e.jsx(P, {
                variant: "outline",
                onClick: () => s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/import/history"]
                }),
                children: "Actualizar lista"
            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                onClick: p,
                disabled: r || m.length === 0,
                children: [r ? e.jsx(Qt, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                }) : null, "Recuperar todas"]
            })]
        })]
    })

function AH() {
    f.useState({});
    const [t, s] = f.useState(null),
        [r, n] = f.useState(!1),
        {data: a, isLoading: i, isError: o, error: l, refetch: c} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/diagnostic"],
            queryFn: Kd.runDiagnostic
        }),
        d = () => {
            c()
        },
        u = async () => {
            try {
                n(!0);
                const p = await Kd.checkCounts();
                s(p)
            } catch (p) {
                console.error("Error al verificar conteos:", p)
            } finally {
                n(!1)
            }
        };
    if (i)
        return e.jsxs($, {
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(Vx, {
                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                    }), "Diagnóstico de API"]
                })
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(sw, {
                        className: "h-8 w-8 animate-spin text-blue-500"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "mt-4 text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Ejecutando diagnóstico..."
                    })]
                })
            })]
        });
    if (o)
        return e.jsxs($, {
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(Vx, {
                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                    }), "Diagnóstico de API"]
                })
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(Qs, {
                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-red-500"
                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                        className: "mt-4 text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                        children: ["Error al ejecutar diagnóstico: ", l instanceof Error ? l.message : "Error desconocido"]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(ka, {
                children: e.jsxs(P, {
                    variant: "outline",
                    onClick: d,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: [e.jsx(tw, {
                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Reintentar"]
                })
            })]
        });
    const m = a != null && a.timestamp ? Gt(new Date(a.timestamp), "dd MMMM yyyy HH:mm:ss", {
        locale: Ds
    }) : "";
    return e.jsxs($, {
        className: "w-full",
        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
            children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                children: [e.jsx(Vx, {
                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                }), "Diagnóstico de API"]
            }), e.jsxs(Ft, {
                children: ["Fecha: ", m]
            })]
        }), e.jsxs(V, {
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "mb-3 text-xs text-amber-600 bg-amber-50 p-2 rounded border border-amber-200",
                children: e.jsxs("p", {
                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                        children: "Nota:"
                    }), " Los vehículos se obtienen a través del endpoint RecuperarCambiosCanalEmpresa, ya que el endpoint específico RecuperarCambiosVehiculosCanalEmpresa no responde correctamente."]
                })
            }), a && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mb-6 flex flex-col space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Estado general:"
                        }), a.success ? e.jsxs(ve, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200",
                            children: [e.jsx(xv, {
                                className: "mr-1 h-3 w-3"
                            }), "Conexión correcta"]
                        }) : e.jsxs(ve, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "bg-red-50 text-red-700 border-red-200",
                            children: [e.jsx(Qs, {
                                className: "mr-1 h-3 w-3"
                            }), "Con errores"]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Total endpoints:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm",
                            children: a.diagnostics.length
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Endpoints correctos:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm text-green-600",
                            children: a.diagnostics.filter(p => p.success).length
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Endpoints con error:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm text-red-600",
                            children: a.diagnostics.filter(p => !p.success).length
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Estado del sistema:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm",
                            children: a.success ? "Funcionando" : "Con problemas"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Última actualización:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm",
                            children: Gt(new Date(a.timestamp), "HH:mm:ss", {
                                locale: Ds
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(I0, {
                    type: "single",
                    collapsible: !0,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: a.diagnostics.map((p, y) => e.jsxs(ku, {
                        value: `item-${y}`,
                        children: [e.jsx(Pu, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2 w-full justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [p.success ? e.jsx(xv, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                                    }) : e.jsx(Sa, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: p.endpoint
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [p.success && p.responseData && p.responseData.summary && e.jsx(ve, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        className: "bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200 whitespace-nowrap",
                                        children: p.responseData.summary
                                    }), !p.success && p.status && e.jsxs(ve, {
                                        variant: "destructive",
                                        className: "ml-2",
                                        children: ["Error ", p.status]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(_u, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-3 p-2 text-sm",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "URL:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-mono text-xs break-all",
                                        children: p.url
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Método:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: p.method
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Estado:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: p.status || "N/A"
                                    })]
                                }), p.success && p.responseData && p.responseData.summary && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Datos:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-xs font-semibold text-green-700",
                                        children: p.responseData.summary
                                    })]
                                }), p.success && p.responseData && p.responseData.itemCount && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "mt-2 p-2 bg-green-50 rounded-md border border-green-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-green-700 font-medium mb-1",
                                        children: "Detalle de datos:"
                                    }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                        className: "list-disc list-inside text-xs text-green-700",
                                        children: [p.responseData.itemCount.piezas > 0 && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Piezas: ", p.responseData.itemCount.piezas]
                                        }), p.responseData.itemCount.vehiculos > 0 && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Vehículos: ", p.responseData.itemCount.vehiculos]
                                        }), p.responseData.pagination && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Último ID: ", p.responseData.pagination.lastId]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Mensaje:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-xs",
                                        children: p.message
                                    })]
                                }), !p.success && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-red-50 rounded-md border border-red-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-red-700 font-medium",
                                        children: "Sugerencia de solución:"
                                    }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                        className: "list-disc list-inside text-xs text-red-700 mt-1",
                                        children: [p.status === 404 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar que la URL del endpoint es correcta"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Comprobar que el API key tiene acceso a este endpoint"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "La respuesta 404 indica que el recurso no fue encontrado"
                                            })]
                                        }), p.status === 401 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El API key proporcionado no es válido o ha expirado"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar las credenciales en la configuración"
                                            })]
                                        }), p.status === 403 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El API key no tiene permisos suficientes"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Contactar con el proveedor de la API"
                                            })]
                                        }), !p.status && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar la conexión a internet"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El servidor de la API podría estar caído"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Contactar con el proveedor de la API"
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }, y))
                })]
            })]
        }), e.jsx(V, {
            className: "pt-5",
            children: t && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200 rounded-md p-4 mb-5",
                children: [e.jsxs("h3", {
                    className: "text-sm font-medium flex items-center gap-2 mb-3",
                    children: [e.jsx(bn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500"
                    }), "Validación de conteos y recuperación de datos", e.jsx(ve, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        className: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200 ml-2",
                        children: new Date(t.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString()
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(Ls, {
                    children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
                        children: e.jsxs(mt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Métrica"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Conteo API"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Recuperados"
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(zs, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(mt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Vehículos"
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.vehicleCount
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.vehiclesRetrieved > 0 ? e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-green-600",
                                    children: t.vehiclesRetrieved
                                }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-red-600",
                                    children: "0"
                                })
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(mt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Piezas"
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.partCount
                            }), e.jsx(he, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.partsRetrieved > 0 ? e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-green-600",
                                    children: t.partsRetrieved
                                }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-red-600",
                                    children: "0"
                                })
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), t.vehiclesInPartsResponse > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mt-3 text-xs text-blue-700 bg-blue-100 p-2 rounded",
                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                        className: "font-medium",
                        children: "Nota:"
                    }), " Se encontraron ", t.vehiclesInPartsResponse, " vehículos asociados en la respuesta de piezas."]
                }), t.vehicleCount > 0 && t.vehiclesRetrieved === 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mt-3 text-xs text-amber-700 bg-amber-100 p-2 rounded",
                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                        className: "font-medium",
                        children: "Sugerencia:"
                    }), " Los conteos muestran vehículos disponibles pero no se pudieron recuperar directamente. Intente recuperar vehículos a través de la API de piezas, donde aparecen como elementos asociados."]
                })]
            })
        }), e.jsxs(ka, {
            className: "flex gap-2",
            children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                variant: "outline",
                onClick: d,
                className: "w-full",
                children: [e.jsx(tw, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                }), "Actualizar diagnóstico"]
            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                variant: "secondary",
                onClick: u,
                className: "w-full",
                disabled: r,
                children: [r ? e.jsx(sw, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                }) : e.jsx(bE, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                }), "Verificar conteos"]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function MH(t, s) {
    return f.useReducer((r, n) => s[r][n] ?? r, t)
}
var ab = "ScrollArea",
    [_A, fZ] = bs(ab),
    [RH, Tn] = _A(ab),
    TA = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeScrollArea: r, type: n="hover", dir: a, scrollHideDelay: i=600, ...o} = t,
            [l, c] = f.useState(null),
            [d, u] = f.useState(null),
            [m, p] = f.useState(null),
            [y, g] = f.useState(null),
            [x, b] = f.useState(null),
            [j, h] = f.useState(0),
            [v, N] = f.useState(0),
            [w, C] = f.useState(!1),
            [S, _] = f.useState(!1),
            T = ot(s, z => c(z)),
            B = vl(a);
        return e.jsx(RH, {
            scope: r,
            type: n,
            dir: B,
            scrollHideDelay: i,
            scrollArea: l,
            viewport: d,
            onViewportChange: u,
            content: m,
            onContentChange: p,
            scrollbarX: y,
            onScrollbarXChange: g,
            scrollbarXEnabled: w,
            onScrollbarXEnabledChange: C,
            scrollbarY: x,
            onScrollbarYChange: b,
            scrollbarYEnabled: S,
            onScrollbarYEnabledChange: _,
            onCornerWidthChange: h,
            onCornerHeightChange: N,
            children: e.jsx(De.div, {
                dir: B,
                ...o,
                ref: T,
                style: {
                    position: "relative",
                    "--radix-scroll-area-corner-width": j + "px",
                    "--radix-scroll-area-corner-height": v + "px",
                    ...t.style
                }
            })
        })
    });
TA.displayName = ab;
var AA = "ScrollAreaViewport",
    MA = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeScrollArea: r, children: n, nonce: a, ...i} = t,
            o = Tn(AA, r),
            l = f.useRef(null),
            c = ot(s, l, o.onViewportChange);
        return e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
            children: [e.jsx("style", {
                dangerouslySetInnerHTML: {
                    __html: "[data-radix-scroll-area-viewport]{scrollbar-width:none;-ms-overflow-style:none;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;}[data-radix-scroll-area-viewport]::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}"
                },
                nonce: a
            }), e.jsx(De.div, {
                "data-radix-scroll-area-viewport": "",
                ...i,
                ref: c,
                style: {
                    overflowX: o.scrollbarXEnabled ? "scroll" : "hidden",
                    overflowY: o.scrollbarYEnabled ? "scroll" : "hidden",
                    ...t.style
                },
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    ref: o.onContentChange,
                    style: {
                        minWidth: "100%",
                        display: "table"
                    },
                    children: n
                })
            })]
        })
    });
MA.displayName = AA;
var Ma = "ScrollAreaScrollbar",
    ib = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ma, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            {onScrollbarXEnabledChange: i, onScrollbarYEnabledChange: o} = a,
            l = t.orientation === "horizontal";
        return f.useEffect(() => (l ? i(!0) : o(!0), () => {
            l ? i(!1) : o(!1)
        }), [l, i, o]), a.type === "hover" ? e.jsx(IH, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "scroll" ? e.jsx(DH, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "auto" ? e.jsx(RA, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "always" ? e.jsx(ob, {
            ...n,
            ref: s
        }) : null
    });
ib.displayName = Ma;
var IH = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ma, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            [i, o] = f.useState(!1);
        return f.useEffect(() => {
            const l = a.scrollArea;
            let c = 0;
            if (l) {
                const d = () => {
                        window.clearTimeout(c),
                        o(!0)
                    },
                    u = () => {
                        c = window.setTimeout(() => o(!1), a.scrollHideDelay)
                    };
                return l.addEventListener("pointerenter", d), l.addEventListener("pointerleave", u), () => {
                    window.clearTimeout(c),
                    l.removeEventListener("pointerenter", d),
                    l.removeEventListener("pointerleave", u)
                }
            }
        }, [a.scrollArea, a.scrollHideDelay]), e.jsx(Ss, {
            present: r || i,
            children: e.jsx(RA, {
                "data-state": i ? "visible" : "hidden",
                ...n,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    }),
    DH = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ma, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            i = t.orientation === "horizontal",
            o = Zp(() => c("SCROLL_END"), 100),
            [l, c] = MH("hidden", {
                hidden: {
                    SCROLL: "scrolling"
                },
                scrolling: {
                    SCROLL_END: "idle",
                    POINTER_ENTER: "interacting"
                },
                interacting: {
                    SCROLL: "interacting",
                    POINTER_LEAVE: "idle"
                },
                idle: {
                    HIDE: "hidden",
                    SCROLL: "scrolling",
                    POINTER_ENTER: "interacting"
                }
            });
        return f.useEffect(() => {
            if (l === "idle") {
                const d = window.setTimeout(() => c("HIDE"), a.scrollHideDelay);
                return () => window.clearTimeout(d)
            }
        }, [l, a.scrollHideDelay, c]), f.useEffect(() => {
            const d = a.viewport,
                u = i ? "scrollLeft" : "scrollTop";
            if (d) {
                let m = d[u];
                const p = () => {
                    const y = d[u];
                    m !== y && (c("SCROLL"), o()),
                    m = y
                };
                return d.addEventListener("scroll", p), () => d.removeEventListener("scroll", p)
            }
        }, [a.viewport, i, c, o]), e.jsx(Ss, {
            present: r || l !== "hidden",
            children: e.jsx(ob, {
                "data-state": l === "hidden" ? "hidden" : "visible",
                ...n,
                ref: s,
                onPointerEnter: be(t.onPointerEnter, () => c("POINTER_ENTER")),
                onPointerLeave: be(t.onPointerLeave, () => c("POINTER_LEAVE"))
            })
        })
    }),
    RA = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const r = Tn(Ma, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            {forceMount: n, ...a} = t,
            [i, o] = f.useState(!1),
            l = t.orientation === "horizontal",
            c = Zp(() => {
                if (r.viewport) {
                    const d = r.viewport.offsetWidth < r.viewport.scrollWidth,
                        u = r.viewport.offsetHeight < r.viewport.scrollHeight;
                    o(l ? d : u)
                }
            }, 10);
        return Uc(r.viewport, c), Uc(r.content, c), e.jsx(Ss, {
            present: n || i,
            children: e.jsx(ob, {
                "data-state": i ? "visible" : "hidden",
                ...a,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    }),
    ob = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {orientation: r="vertical", ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ma, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            i = f.useRef(null),
            o = f.useRef(0),
            [l, c] = f.useState({
                content: 0,
                viewport: 0,
                scrollbar: {
                    size: 0,
                    paddingStart: 0,
                    paddingEnd: 0
                }
            }),
            d = FA(l.viewport, l.content),
            u = {
                ...n,
                sizes: l,
                onSizesChange: c,
                hasThumb: d > 0 && d < 1,
                onThumbChange: p => i.current = p,
                onThumbPointerUp: () => o.current = 0,
                onThumbPointerDown: p => o.current = p
            };
        function m(p, y) {
            return VH(p, o.current, l, y)
        }
        return r === "horizontal" ? e.jsx(OH, {
            ...u,
            ref: s,
            onThumbPositionChange: () => {
                if (a.viewport && i.current) {
                    const p = a.viewport.scrollLeft,
                        y = S1(p, l, a.dir);
                    i.current.style.transform = `translate3d(${y}px, 0, 0)`
                }
            },
            onWheelScroll: p => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollLeft = p)
            },
            onDragScroll: p => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollLeft = m(p, a.dir))
            }
        }) : r === "vertical" ? e.jsx(LH, {
            ...u,
            ref: s,
            onThumbPositionChange: () => {
                if (a.viewport && i.current) {
                    const p = a.viewport.scrollTop,
                        y = S1(p, l);
                    i.current.style.transform = `translate3d(0, ${y}px, 0)`
                }
            },
            onWheelScroll: p => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollTop = p)
            },
            onDragScroll: p => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollTop = m(p))
            }
        }) : null
    }),
    OH = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {sizes: r, onSizesChange: n, ...a} = t,
            i = Tn(Ma, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            [o, l] = f.useState(),
            c = f.useRef(null),
            d = ot(s, c, i.onScrollbarXChange);
        return f.useEffect(() => {
            c.current && l(getComputedStyle(c.current))
        }, [c]), e.jsx(DA, {
            "data-orientation": "horizontal",
            ...a,
            ref: d,
            sizes: r,
            style: {
                bottom: 0,
                left: i.dir === "rtl" ? "var(--radix-scroll-area-corner-width)" : 0,
                right: i.dir === "ltr" ? "var(--radix-scroll-area-corner-width)" : 0,
                "--radix-scroll-area-thumb-width": Yp(r) + "px",
                ...t.style
            },
            onThumbPointerDown: u => t.onThumbPointerDown(u.x),
            onDragScroll: u => t.onDragScroll(u.x),
            onWheelScroll: (u, m) => {
                if (i.viewport) {
                    const p = i.viewport.scrollLeft + u.deltaX;
                    t.onWheelScroll(p),
                    $A(p, m) && u.preventDefault()
                }
            },
            onResize: () => {
                c.current && i.viewport && o && n({
                    content: i.viewport.scrollWidth,
                    viewport: i.viewport.offsetWidth,
                    scrollbar: {
                        size: c.current.clientWidth,
                        paddingStart: Bf(o.paddingLeft),
                        paddingEnd: Bf(o.paddingRight)
                    }
                })
            }
        })
    }),
    LH = f.forwardRef((t, s) => {

function Bf(t) {
    return t ? parseInt(t, 10) : 0
}
function FA(t, s) {
    const r = t / s;
    return isNaN(r) ? 0 : r
}
function Yp(t) {
    const s = FA(t.viewport, t.content),
        r = t.scrollbar.paddingStart + t.scrollbar.paddingEnd,
        n = (t.scrollbar.size - r) * s;
    return Math.max(n, 18)
}
function VH(t, s, r, n="ltr") {
    const a = Yp(r),
        i = a / 2,
        o = s || i,
        l = a - o,
        c = r.scrollbar.paddingStart + o,
        d = r.scrollbar.size - r.scrollbar.paddingEnd - l,
        u = r.content - r.viewport,
        m = n === "ltr" ? [0, u] : [u * -1, 0];
    return zA([c, d], m)(t)
}
function S1(t, s, r="ltr") {
    const n = Yp(s),
        a = s.scrollbar.paddingStart + s.scrollbar.paddingEnd,
        i = s.scrollbar.size - a,
        o = s.content - s.viewport,
        l = i - n,
        c = r === "ltr" ? [0, o] : [o * -1, 0],
        d = Wv(t, c);
    return zA([0, o], [0, l])(d)
}
function zA(t, s) {
    return r => {
        if (t[0] === t[1] || s[0] === s[1])
            return s[0];
        const n = (s[1] - s[0]) / (t[1] - t[0]);
        return s[0] + n * (r - t[0])
    }
}
function $A(t, s) {
    return t > 0 && t < s
}
var UH = (t, s=() => {}) => {
    let r = {
            left: t.scrollLeft,
            top: t.scrollTop
        },
        n = 0;
    return function a() {
        const i = {
                left: t.scrollLeft,
                top: t.scrollTop
            },
            o = r.left !== i.left,
            l = r.top !== i.top;
        (o || l) && s(),
        r = i,
        n = window.requestAnimationFrame(a)
    }(), () => window.cancelAnimationFrame(n)
};
function Zp(t, s) {
    const r = Zt(t),
        n = f.useRef(0);
    return f.useEffect(() => () => window.clearTimeout(n.current), []), f.useCallback(() => {
        window.clearTimeout(n.current),
        n.current = window.setTimeout(r, s)
    }, [r, s])
}
function Uc(t, s) {
    const r = Zt(s);
    ys(() => {
        let n = 0;
        if (t) {
            const a = new ResizeObserver(() => {
                cancelAnimationFrame(n),
                n = window.requestAnimationFrame(r)
            });
            return a.observe(t), () => {
                window.cancelAnimationFrame(n),
                a.unobserve(t)
            }
        }
    }, [t, r])
}

    KH = () => {
        const {toast: t} = st(),
            s = dr(),
            [r, n] = f.useState(!1),
            [a, i] = f.useState(""),

                queryKey: ["/api/maintenance/config"],
                onSuccess: y => {
                    n(y.maintenanceMode || !1),
                    i(y.maintenanceMessage || ""),
                    l(y.estimatedTime || "")
                }
            }),
            {mutate: u, isPending: m} = tt({
                mutationFn: async y => {
                    const g = await fetch("/api/maintenance/config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(y)
                    });
                    if (!g.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar la configuración de mantenimiento");
                    return g.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/maintenance/config"]
                    }),
                    t({
                        title: r ? "Modo mantenimiento activado" : "Modo mantenimiento desactivado",
                        description: "La configuración se ha actualizado correctamente",
                        variant: "default"
                    })
                },
                onError: y => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Ha ocurrido un error al actualizar la configuración",

                        throw new Error("Error al generar el feed");

                        y = window.URL.createObjectURL(p),
                        g = document.createElement("a");

                    g.download = `google-merchant-feed-${new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0]}.xml`,
                    document.body.appendChild(g),
                    g.click(),
                    document.body.removeChild(g),

                mutationFn: async D => {

                        method: "POST",

                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },

    QH = () => {
        var b,
            j;
        const [t, s] = f.useState("");
        f.useState(null);
        const {toast: r} = st(),
            n = dr(),
            {data: a, isLoading: i} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const h = await fetch("/api/backup/list", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!h.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error obteniendo backups");
                    return h.json()
                }
            }),
            o = tt({
                mutationFn: async h => {
                    const v = await fetch("/api/backup/create/database", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: h || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup de base de datos");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: h => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: h.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: h => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: h.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            l = tt({
                mutationFn: async h => {
                    const v = await fetch("/api/backup/create/files", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: h || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup de archivos");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: h => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: h.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: h => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: h.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            c = tt({
                mutationFn: async h => {
                    const v = await fetch("/api/backup/create/complete", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: h || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup completo");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: h => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: h.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: h => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: h.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            d = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({backupId: h, type: v}) => {
                    const N = await fetch(`/api/backup/restore/${v}/${h}`, {
                        method: "POST",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!N.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error restaurando ${v}`);
                    return N.json()
                },
                onSuccess: h => {
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: h.message
                    })
                },
                onError: h => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: h.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            u = tt({
                mutationFn: async h => {
                    const v = await fetch(`/api/backup/${h}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error eliminando backup");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: h => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: h.message
                    })
                },
                onError: h => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: h.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            m = (h, v) => {
                const N = `¿Estás seguro de que quieres restaurar ${v === "database" ? "la base de datos" : v === "files" ? "los archivos" : "el sistema completo"} desde el backup "${h.name}"? Esta acción sobrescribirá los datos actuales.`;
                window.confirm(N) && d.mutate({
                    backupId: h.id,
                    type: v
                })
            },
            p = h => {
                window.confirm(`¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar el backup "${h.name}"?`) && u.mutate(h.id)
            },
            y = h => {
                switch (h) {
                case "database":
                    return e.jsx(bn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    });
                case "files":
                    return e.jsx(yn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(Ot, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    })
                }
            },
            g = h => {
                switch (h) {
                case "database":
                    return "Base de Datos";
                case "files":
                    return "Archivos";
                case "complete":
                    return "Completo";
                default:
                    return h
                }
            },
            x = h => {

                case "database":

                case "files":

                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                            onClick: () => o.mutate(t),

    XH = () => {
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {logout: s} = Es(),

                queryKey: ["/api/config"],
                queryFn: () => Rc.getConfig()

            {data: i, isLoading: o, refetch: l} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/config/chatbot"],
                queryFn: () => Rc.getChatbotConfig()
            }),
            c = async () => {
                try {
                    await s(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (d) {
                    console.error("Error al cerrar sesión:", d)
                }
            };
        return n || o ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",

                            }), "API"]
                        }), e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "chatbot",

                            }), "Google Reviews"]
                        })]

                        value: "maintenance",

    lg = () => {
        var dt,
            St;
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {toast: s} = st(),
            {user: r} = Es(),
            [n, a] = f.useState(""),
            [i, o] = f.useState(1),
            [l, c] = f.useState(JH),
            [d, u] = f.useState(null),
            [m, p] = f.useState(!1),
            [y, g] = f.useState(!1),
            [x, b] = f.useState("fechaActualizacion"),
            [j, h] = f.useState("desc"),
            [v, N] = f.useState(""),
            [w, C] = f.useState(""),
            [S, _] = f.useState(""),
            [T, B] = f.useState(!1),
            [z, A] = f.useState(!1),
            [O, H] = f.useState(null),
            [D, R] = f.useState(!1),
            [E, I] = f.useState(null),
            [U, ie] = f.useState(0);
        of("/admin/vehicles/edit/:id"),
        of("/admin/vehicles/new"),
        r && !r.isAdmin && t("/");
        const {data: F, isLoading: M, refetch: Q} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles", i, n, v, w, S, x, j, l],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const ge = new URLSearchParams;
                        ge.append("limit", l.toString()),
                        ge.append("offset", ((i - 1) * l).toString()),
                        ge.append("getTotalCount", "true"),
                        n && ge.append("search", n),
                        v && ge.append("marca", v),
                        w && ge.append("combustible", w),
                        S && ge.append("anyo", S),
                        x && ge.append("orden", `${x}_${j}`);
                        const Et = await fetch(`/api/optimized/vehicles?${ge.toString()}`);
                        if (!Et.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al cargar vehículos");
                        return await Et.json()
                    } catch (ge) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de vehículos:", ge), ge
                    }
                },
                enabled: !T && !z,
                staleTime: 12e4,
                refetchOnWindowFocus: !1
            }),
            le = (F == null ? void 0 : F.data) || [],
            we = ((dt = F == null ? void 0 : F.pagination) == null ? void 0 : dt.total) || 0,
            Se = Math.ceil(we / l);
        console.log("🚗 AdminVehicles Data:", {
            vehiclesCount: le.length,
            totalItems: we,
            itemsPerPage: l,
            totalPages: Se,
            currentPage: i,
            pagination: F == null ? void 0 : F.pagination,
            fullResponse: F
        }),
        F != null && F.pagination && (console.log("📊 Pagination details:", {

        }), F.pagination.total < 1e3 && console.warn("⚠️ Conteo sospechosamente bajo en AdminVehicles:", F.pagination.total));
        const k = tt({
                mutationFn: async ge => {
                    const Et = await fetch("/api/vehicles", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(ge)
                    });
                    if (!Et.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al crear vehículo");
                    return Et.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo creado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido creado correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    A(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/vehicles")
                },
                onError: ge => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al crear vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo crear el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            ee = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: ge, data: Et}) => {
                    const At = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${ge}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(Et)
                    });
                    if (!At.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar vehículo");
                    return At.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo actualizado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    B(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/vehicles")
                },
                onError: ge => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al actualizar vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            G = tt({
                mutationFn: async ge => {
                    const Et = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${ge}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!Et.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar vehículo");
                    return Et.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo eliminado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    Q()
                },
                onError: ge => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            se = tt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const ge = await fetch("/api/vehicles/delete-all", {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!ge.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar todos los vehículos");
                    return ge.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Todos los vehículos eliminados",
                        description: "Se han eliminado todos los vehículos correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    Q()
                },
                onError: ge => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar todos los vehículos",
                        description: "No se pudieron eliminar todos los vehículos. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            L = ge => {
                z ? k.mutate(ge) : O && O.id && ee.mutate({
                    id: O.id,
                    data: ge
                })
            },
            te = () => {
                B(!1),
                A(!1),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/vehicles")
            },
            ue = () => {
                A(!0),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/vehicles/new")
            },
            ye = ge => {
                B(!0),
                H(ge),
                t(`/admin/vehicles/edit/${ge.id}`)
            },
            Ke = ge => {
                u(ge),
                p(!0)
            },
            X = () => {
                d && G.mutate(d),
                p(!1),
                u(null)
            },
            Ie = () => {
                g(!0)
            },
            ct = () => {
                se.mutate(),
                g(!1)
            },
            Tt = ge => {
                I(ge),
                ie(0),
                R(!0)
            },
            Ut = () => {
                E != null && E.imagenes && E.imagenes.length > 0 && ie(ge => ge === E.imagenes.length - 1 ? 0 : ge + 1)
            },
            Bt = () => {
                E != null && E.imagenes && E.imagenes.length > 0 && ie(ge => ge === 0 ? E.imagenes.length - 1 : ge - 1)
            },
            q = ge => {
                ge.preventDefault(),
                o(1),
                Q()
            },
            re = ge => {
                x === ge ? h(j === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc") : (b(ge), h("asc")),
                o(1)
            },
            de = ge => {
                c(ge),
                o(1)
            },
            oe = Array.from(new Set(le.map(ge => ge.marca))).sort(),
            je = Array.from(new Set(le.map(ge => ge.combustible).filter(Boolean))).sort(),
            xe = (i - 1) * l + 1,
            Oe = Math.min(i * l, we);
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {
                activeTab: "admin_vehicles"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsxs("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: [z ? "Nuevo Vehículo" : T ? "Editar Vehículo" : "Gestión de Vehículos", !z && !T && e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "text-lg font-normal text-primary ml-2",
                                children: ["(", we > 0 ? we.toLocaleString() : "0", " total)"]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: z ? "Complete los datos del nuevo vehículo" : T ? "Modifique los datos del vehículo y guarde los cambios" : `Gestione todos los vehículos del sistema${we > 0 ? ` - ${we.toLocaleString()} vehículos disponibles` : ""}`
