    cg = () => {
        var re,
            de;
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {toast: s} = st(),
            {user: r} = Es(),
            [n, a] = f.useState(""),
            [i, o] = f.useState(1),
            [l, c] = f.useState(null),
            [d, u] = f.useState(!1),
            [m, p] = f.useState(!1),
            [y, g] = f.useState("fechaActualizacion"),
            [x, b] = f.useState("desc"),
            [j, h] = f.useState(""),
            [v, N] = f.useState("all"),
            [w, C] = f.useState("all"),
            [S, _] = f.useState({
                min: "",
                max: ""
            }),
            [T, B] = f.useState(!1),
            [z, A] = f.useState(!1),
            [O, H] = f.useState(null),
            [D, R] = f.useState(!1),
            [E, I] = f.useState(null);
        of("/admin/parts/edit/:id"),
        of("/admin/parts/new"),
        r && !r.isAdmin && t("/");
        const {data: U, isLoading: ie, refetch: F} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/search-parts", i, n, j, v, w, S, y, x],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        let oe = `/api/search-parts?limit=${gd}&offset=${(i - 1) * gd}&isAdmin=true&getTotalCount=true`;
                        n && (oe += `&q=${encodeURIComponent(n)}`),
                        j && (oe += `&familia=${encodeURIComponent(j)}`),
                        v !== "all" && (oe += `&activo=${v === "active"}`),
                        w !== "all" && (w === "processed" ? oe += "&vehicleType=processed" : w === "associated" && (oe += "&vehicleType=associated")),
                        S.min && (oe += `&precioMin=${S.min}`),
                        S.max && (oe += `&precioMax=${S.max}`),
                        y && (oe += `&orden=${y}_${x}`),
                        console.log("Admin parts query URL:", oe);
                        const je = await fetch(oe, {
                            credentials: "include"
                        });
                        if (!je.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al cargar piezas");
                        const xe = await je.json();
                        return console.log("Admin parts response:", xe), xe
                    } catch (oe) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de piezas:", oe), oe
                    }
                },
                enabled: !T && !z
            }),
            {data: M} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/parts/families"],
                queryFn: async () => (await fetch("/api/optimized/parts/families")).json()
            }),
            Q = (U == null ? void 0 : U.data) || [],
            le = ((re = U == null ? void 0 : U.pagination) == null ? void 0 : re.total) || 0,
            we = ((de = U == null ? void 0 : U.pagination) == null ? void 0 : de.filtered) || le,
            Se = Math.ceil(we / gd),
            k = M || [],
            ee = tt({
                mutationFn: async oe => {
                    const je = await fetch("/api/parts", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(oe)
                    });
                    if (!je.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al crear pieza");
                    return je.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza creada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido creada correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    A(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/parts")
                },
                onError: oe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al crear pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo crear la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            G = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: oe, data: je}) => {
                    const xe = await fetch(`/api/parts/${oe}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(je)
                    });
                    if (!xe.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar pieza");
                    return xe.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza actualizada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    B(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/parts")
                },
                onError: oe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al actualizar pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            se = tt({
                mutationFn: async oe => {
                    const je = await fetch(`/api/parts/${oe}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!je.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar pieza");
                    return je.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza eliminada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido eliminada correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    F()
                },
                onError: oe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            L = tt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const oe = await fetch("/api/parts/delete-all", {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!oe.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar todas las piezas");
                    return oe.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Todas las piezas eliminadas",
                        description: "Se han eliminado todas las piezas correctamente"
                    }),
                    xa.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    F()
                },
                onError: oe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar todas las piezas",
                        description: "No se pudieron eliminar todas las piezas. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            te = oe => {
                z ? ee.mutate(oe) : O && O.id && G.mutate({
                    id: O.id,
                    data: oe
                })
            },
            ue = () => {
                B(!1),
                A(!1),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/parts")
            },
            ye = () => {
                A(!0),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/parts/new")
            },
            Ke = oe => {
                B(!0),
                H(oe),
                t(`/admin/parts/edit/${oe.id}`)
            },
            X = async oe => {
                I(oe),
                R(!0)
            },
            Ie = oe => {
                c(oe),
                u(!0)
            },
            ct = () => {
                l && se.mutate(l),
                u(!1),
                c(null)
            },
            Tt = () => {
                p(!0)
            },
            Ut = () => {
                L.mutate(),
                p(!1)
            },
            Bt = oe => {
                oe.preventDefault(),
                o(1),
                F()
            },
            q = oe => {
                y === oe ? b(x === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc") : (g(oe), b("asc")),
                o(1)
            };
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {
                activeTab: "admin_parts"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: z ? "Nueva Pieza" : T ? "Editar Pieza" : "Gestión de Piezas"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: z ? "Complete los datos de la nueva pieza" : T ? "Modifique los datos de la pieza y guarde los cambios" : "Gestione todas las piezas del sistema"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: () => T || z ? ue() : t("/admin"),
                        children: [e.jsx(mi, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                        }), T || z ? "Volver a piezas" : "Volver al panel"]
                    })]
                }), (T || z) && e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: z ? "Datos de la nueva pieza" : "Editar datos de la pieza"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsx(tW, {
                            part: O || {},
                            onSave: te,
                            onCancel: ue,
                            isNew: z
                        })
                    })]
                }), !T && !z && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                    children: [e.jsx($, {
                        className: "mb-8",
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "p-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex flex-col gap-4 mb-6",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-4 justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("form", {
                                        onSubmit: Bt,
                                        className: "flex w-full md:w-1/2 gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(J, {
                                            placeholder: "Buscar por referencia, artículo, familia...",
                                            value: n,
                                            onChange: oe => a(oe.target.value),
                                            className: "flex-1"
                                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                            type: "submit",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ys, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                            }), "Buscar"]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: ye,
                                            children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                            }), "Nueva pieza"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                            variant: "destructive",
                                            onClick: Tt,
                                            children: [e.jsx(tl, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                            }), "Eliminar todas"]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex flex-wrap gap-4",

                                                    placeholder: "Filtrar por familia"
                                                })

                                            children: ["Página ", i, " de ", Se]
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                                    })]
                                                })

                            })]

                    }), !ie && Se > 1 && e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsx(V, {

                                            })
                                        })]

                                })]
                            })
                        })
                    })]

                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Ur, {

                            }), e.jsx(P, {

                                onClick: ct,
                                children: "Eliminar"
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(ws, {
                    open: m,
                    onOpenChange: p,
                    children: e.jsxs(ps, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(xs, {
                            children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                                children: "Confirmar eliminación masiva"
                            }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                                children: "¿Está seguro que desea eliminar TODAS las piezas? Esta acción eliminará permanentemente todas las piezas del sistema y no se puede deshacer."
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Ur, {
                            children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => p(!1),
                                children: "Cancelar"
                            }), e.jsx(P, {
                                variant: "destructive",
                                onClick: Ut,
                                children: "Eliminar todas las piezas"
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    rW = () => {
        var F;
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {toast: s} = st(),
            {logout: r} = Es(),
            [n, a] = f.useState(!1),
            [i, o] = f.useState(!1),
            [l, c] = f.useState(!1),
            [d, u] = f.useState(null),
            [m, p] = f.useState(""),
            [y, g] = f.useState(""),
            [x, b] = f.useState(""),
            [j, h] = f.useState("manager"),
            [v, N] = f.useState(""),
            [w, C] = f.useState(""),
            [S, _] = f.useState(""),
            [T, B] = f.useState("manager"),
            z = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/users"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const M = await fetch("/api/users");
                        if (!M.ok) {
                            const we = await M.json();
                            throw new Error(we.error || "Error al cargar usuarios")
                        }
                        const Q = await M.json();
                        return console.log("Usuarios cargados:", Q), Q.filter(we => we.role === "manager" || we.role === "admin" || we.isAdmin) || []
                    } catch (M) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de usuarios:", M), M
                    }
                }
            }),
            A = tt({
                mutationFn: async M => {
                    const Q = await fetch("/api/users", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(M)
                    });
                    if (!Q.ok) {
                        const le = await Q.json();
                        throw new Error(le.error || "Error al crear usuario")
                    }
                    return Q.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario creado",
                        description: "El usuario ha sido creado correctamente"
                    }),
                    a(!1),
                    z.refetch(),
                    p(""),
                    g(""),
                    b(""),
                    h("manager")
                },
                onError: M => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M.message || "Error al crear usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            O = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: M, userData: Q}) => {
                    const le = await fetch(`/api/users/${M}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(Q)
                    });
                    if (!le.ok) {
                        const we = await le.json();
                        throw new Error(we.error || "Error al actualizar usuario")
                    }
                    return le.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario actualizado",
                        description: `El usuario ${d == null ? void 0 : d.username} ha sido actualizado correctamente`
                    }),
                    o(!1),
                    z.refetch()
                },
                onError: M => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M.message || "Error al actualizar usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            H = tt({
                mutationFn: async M => {
                    const Q = await fetch(`/api/users/${M}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!Q.ok) {
                        const le = await Q.json();
                        throw new Error(le.error || "Error al eliminar usuario")
                    }
                    return Q.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario eliminado",
                        description: `El usuario ${d == null ? void 0 : d.username} ha sido eliminado correctamente`
                    }),
                    c(!1),
                    z.refetch()
                },
                onError: M => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M.message || "Error al eliminar usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            D = async () => {
                try {
                    await r(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (M) {
                    console.error("Error during logout:", M)
                }
            },
            R = () => {
                if (!m || !x) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Usuario y contraseña son obligatorios",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (x.length < 6) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                A.mutate({
                    username: m,
                    password: x,
                    email: y || void 0,
                    role: j
                })
            },
            E = () => {
                if (!v) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "El nombre de usuario es obligatorio",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (S && S.length < 6) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                const M = {
                    username: v,
                    email: w || void 0,
                    role: T
                };
                S && (M.password = S),
                O.mutate({
                    id: d.id,
                    userData: M
                })
            },
            I = () => {
                H.mutate(d.id)
            },
            U = M => {
                u(M),
                N(M.username || ""),
                C(M.email || ""),
                _(""),
                B(M.role || "manager"),
                o(!0)
            },
            ie = M => {
                u(M),
                c(!0)
            };
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Gestión de Usuarios Administrativos"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Administre los usuarios administrativos del sistema (administradores y gestores)"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                            variant: "default",
                            onClick: () => a(!0),
                            children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Nuevo Usuario Administrativo"]
                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: D,
                            children: [e.jsx(hi, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "p-6",
                        children: z.isLoading ? e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto mb-4"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                children: "Cargando usuarios..."
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsxs(Ls, {
                            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
                                children: e.jsxs(mt, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "ID"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Usuario"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Email"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Rol"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Último acceso"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        className: "text-right",
                                        children: "Acciones"
                                    })]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(zs, {
                                children: !z.data || z.data.length === 0 ? e.jsx(mt, {
                                    children: e.jsx(he, {
                                        colSpan: 6,
                                        className: "text-center h-32",
                                        children: "No se encontraron usuarios"
                                    })
                                }) : (F = z.data) == null ? void 0 : F.map(M => e.jsxs(mt, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(he, {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: M.id
                                    }), e.jsx(he, {
                                        children: M.username
                                    }), e.jsx(he, {
                                        children: M.email || "—"
                                    }), e.jsx(he, {
                                        children: M.isAdmin || M.role === "admin" ? e.jsx(ve, {
                                            className: "bg-primary",
                                            children: "Administrador"
                                        }) : M.role === "manager" ? e.jsx(ve, {
                                            className: "bg-blue-500 text-white",
                                            children: "Gestor"
                                        }) : e.jsx(ve, {
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            children: "Cliente"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(he, {
                                        children: M.updatedAt ? new Date(M.updatedAt).toLocaleString() : "—"
                                    }), e.jsxs(he, {
                                        className: "text-right",
                                        children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                            variant: "ghost",
                                            size: "sm",
                                            onClick: () => U(M),
                                            children: e.jsx(g5, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                                            variant: "ghost",
                                            size: "sm",
                                            onClick: () => ie(M),
                                            children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, M.id))
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ws, {
                open: n,
                onOpenChange: a,
                children: e.jsxs(ps, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(xs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                            children: "Añadir nuevo usuario administrativo"
                        }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                            children: "Complete el formulario para crear un nuevo usuario administrativo del sistema."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid gap-4 py-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                htmlFor: "username",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Usuario"
                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                id: "username",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: m,
                                onChange: M => p(M.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                htmlFor: "email",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Email"
                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                id: "email",
                                type: "email",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: y,
                                onChange: M => g(M.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                htmlFor: "password",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Contraseña"
                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                id: "password",
                                type: "password",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: x,
                                onChange: M => b(M.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",

                                htmlFor: "role",
                                className: "text-right",

                            }), e.jsxs(We, {
                                value: j,
                                onValueChange: h,

                                    className: "col-span-3",

                                    })

                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            onClick: R,
                            children: "Crear usuario"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(ws, {
                open: i,
                onOpenChange: o,
                children: e.jsxs(ps, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(xs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                            children: "Editar usuario"
                        }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                            children: "Actualice la información del usuario."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid gap-4 py-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-username",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Usuario"
                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                id: "edit-username",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: v,
                                onChange: M => N(M.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-email",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Email"
                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                id: "edit-email",
                                type: "email",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: w,
                                onChange: M => C(M.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",

                                htmlFor: "edit-password",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Contraseña"
                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                id: "edit-password",
                                type: "password",
                                placeholder: "Nueva contraseña (dejar en blanco si no cambia)",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: S,
                                onChange: M => _(M.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-role",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Rol"
                            }), e.jsxs(We, {
                                value: T,
                                onValueChange: B,

                                    className: "col-span-3",

                                    })

                            onClick: E,
                            children: "Actualizar usuario"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(ws, {
                open: l,
                onOpenChange: c,
                children: e.jsxs(ps, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(xs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                            children: "Eliminar usuario"
                        }), e.jsxs(Sr, {
                            children: ["¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar al usuario ", d == null ? void 0 : d.username, "? Esta acción no se puede deshacer."]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Ur, {
                        children: [e.jsx(P, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => c(!1),
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            variant: "destructive",
                            onClick: I,
                            children: "Eliminar"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    },
    nW = () => {
        const [t, s] = f.useState(""),
            [r, n] = f.useState("all"),
            [a, i] = f.useState(""),
            [o, l] = f.useState(null),
            [c, d] = f.useState(null),
            [u, m] = f.useState(!1),
            [p, y] = f.useState(!1),
            [g, x] = f.useState(!1),
            [b, j] = f.useState(null),
            [h, v] = f.useState({}),
            {toast: N} = st(),
            w = dr(),
            {data: C, isLoading: S} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const M = await fetch("/api/admin/clients");
                    if (!M.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar clientes");
                    return (await M.json()).filter(le => le.role === "customer" && !le.isAdmin)
                }
            }),
            {data: _, isLoading: T} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/guest-orders"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const M = await fetch("/api/admin/guest-orders");
                    if (!M.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar pedidos de invitados");
                    return M.json()
                }
            }),
            B = (C == null ? void 0 : C.filter(M => {
                const Q = M.firstName.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || M.lastName.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || M.email.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || M.username.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()),
                    le = r === "all" || M.province === r;
                return Q && le
            })) || [],
            z = (_ == null ? void 0 : _.filter(M => M.guestName.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()) || M.guestEmail.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()) || M.orderNumber.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()))) || [],
            A = [...new Set(C == null ? void 0 : C.map(M => M.province).filter(Boolean))],
            O = M => {
                switch (M) {
                case "admin":
                    return "destructive";
                case "manager":
                    return "secondary";
                case "customer":
                    return "default";
                default:
                    return "outline"
                }
            },
            H = M => {
                switch (M) {
                case "admin":
                    return "Administrador";
                case "manager":
                    return "Gestor";
                case "customer":
                    return "Cliente";
                default:
                    return M
                }
            },
            D = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: M, data: Q}) => {
                    const le = {
                            firstName: Q.firstName,
                            lastName: Q.lastName,
                            email: Q.email,
                            phone: Q.phone,
                            address: Q.address,
                            city: Q.city,
                            postalCode: Q.postalCode,
                            province: Q.province,
                            shippingAddress: Q.shippingAddress,
                            shippingCity: Q.shippingCity,
                            shippingPostalCode: Q.shippingPostalCode,
                            shippingProvince: Q.shippingProvince,
                            billingAddress: Q.billingAddress,
                            billingCity: Q.billingCity,
                            billingPostalCode: Q.billingPostalCode,
                            billingProvince: Q.billingProvince
                        },
                        we = await fetch(`/api/admin/users/${M}`, {
                            method: "PUT",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(le)
                        });
                    if (!we.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar cliente");
                    return we.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    w.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"]
                    }),
                    N({
                        title: "Cliente actualizado",
                        description: "Los datos del cliente se han actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    y(!1),
                    d(null),
                    v({})
                },
                onError: M => {
                    N({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar el cliente",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    console.error("Error updating client:", M)
                }
            }),
            R = tt({
                mutationFn: async M => {
                    const Q = await fetch(`/api/admin/users/${M}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!Q.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar cliente");
                    return Q.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    w.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"]
                    }),
                    N({
                        title: "Cliente eliminado",
                        description: "El cliente ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    x(!1),
                    j(null)
                },
                onError: M => {
                    N({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el cliente",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    console.error("Error deleting client:", M)
                }
            }),
            E = M => {
                l(M),
                m(!0)
            },
            I = M => {
                d(M),
                v({
                    firstName: M.firstName,
                    lastName: M.lastName,
                    email: M.email,
                    phone: M.phone,
                    address: M.address,
                    city: M.city,
                    postalCode: M.postalCode,
                    province: M.province,
                    shippingAddress: M.shippingAddress || M.address,
                    shippingCity: M.shippingCity || M.city,
                    shippingPostalCode: M.shippingPostalCode || M.postalCode,
                    shippingProvince: M.shippingProvince || M.province,
                    billingAddress: M.billingAddress || M.address,
                    billingCity: M.billingCity || M.city,
                    billingPostalCode: M.billingPostalCode || M.postalCode,
                    billingProvince: M.billingProvince || M.province
                }),
                y(!0)
            },
            U = M => {
                j(M),
                x(!0)
            },
            ie = () => {
                c && D.mutate({
                    id: c.id,
                    data: h
                })
            },
            F = () => {
                b && R.mutate(b.id)
            };
        return S ? e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-center h-64",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                    })
                })
            })]
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Gestión de Clientes"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Administra los clientes registrados y pedidos de invitados"
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(os, {
                    defaultValue: "customers",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(Jt, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "customers",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(so, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Clientes Registrados (", B.length, ")"]
                        }), e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "guests",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(ii, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Pedidos de Invitados (", z.length, ")"]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                        value: "customers",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Ys, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), "Filtros de búsqueda"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            htmlFor: "search",
                                            children: "Buscar cliente"
                                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                                            id: "search",
                                            placeholder: "Nombre, email o usuario...",
                                            value: t,
                                            onChange: M => s(M.target.value)

                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Último pedido"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-gray-900",
                                            children: new Date(o.lastOrderDate).toLocaleDateString("es-ES")
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Ur, {
                        className: "pt-6 border-t border-gray-200",
                        children: [e.jsx(P, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => m(!1),
                            children: "Cerrar"
                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            onClick: () => {
                                m(!1),
                                o && I(o)
                            },
                            children: "Editar Cliente"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(ws, {
                open: p,
                onOpenChange: y,
                children: e.jsxs(ps, {

                    children: [e.jsxs(xs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                            children: "Editar Cliente"
                        }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                            children: "Modifica la información del cliente"
                        })]
                    }), c && e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                    htmlFor: "editFirstName",
                                    children: "Nombre"
                                }), e.jsx(J, {

                                    value: h.firstName || "",
                                    onChange: M => v(Q => ({
                                        ...Q,

                                    })),

                                    onChange: M => v(Q => ({

                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Teléfono"
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-3",
                                children: "Dirección de Envío"

                            disabled: R.isPending,
                            children: R.isPending ? "Eliminando..." : "Eliminar"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    };
function ri({className: t, ...s}) {
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: me("animate-pulse rounded-md bg-muted", t),
        ...s
    })
}
const ya = ({children: t}) => e.jsxs("div", {
    className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
    children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex-1 p-8",
        children: [e.jsx("div", {
            className: "mb-6"
        }), e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex-1",
            children: t
        })]
    })]
});
function aW({order: t, isOpen: s, onClose: r}) {
    const {toast: n} = st(),
        a = dr(),
        i = f.useRef(null),
        o = f.useRef(null),
        [l, c] = f.useState({
            transportAgency: (t == null ? void 0 : t.transportAgency) || "",
            expeditionNumber: (t == null ? void 0 : t.expeditionNumber) || "",
            adminObservations: (t == null ? void 0 : t.adminObservations) || "",
            documents: (t == null ? void 0 : t.documents) || [],
            invoicePdf: (t == null ? void 0 : t.invoicePdf) || ""
        }),
        [d, u] = f.useState(!1),
        m = tt({
            mutationFn: h => (console.log("🚀 Frontend: Enviando actualización de pedido:", {
                orderId: t.id,
                url: `/api/admin/orders/${t.id}/update-admin-info`,
                data: h
            }), Me("PATCH", `/api/admin/orders/${t.id}/update-admin-info`, h)),
            onSuccess: h => {
                console.log("✅ Frontend: Actualización exitosa:", h),
                n({
                    title: "Pedido actualizado",
                    description: "La información adicional se ha guardado correctamente."
                }),
                a.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                r()
            },
            onError: h => {
                var v,
                    N,
                    w,
                    C;
                console.error("❌ Frontend: Error al actualizar pedido:", h),
                console.error("❌ Frontend: Error details:", {
                    message: h.message,
                    response: (v = h.response) == null ? void 0 : v.data,
                    status: (N = h.response) == null ? void 0 : N.status
                }),
                n({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: ((C = (w = h.response) == null ? void 0 : w.data) == null ? void 0 : C.error) || h.message || "No se pudo actualizar el pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        p = async (h, v) => {
            const N = new FormData;
            N.append("file", h),
            N.append("orderId", t.id.toString()),
            N.append("type", v);
            try {
                const w = await fetch("/api/upload/order-document", {
                    method: "POST",
                    body: N
                });
                if (!w.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al subir archivo");
                return (await w.json()).filePath
            } catch (w) {
                throw w
            }
        },
        y = async h => {
            const v = h.target.files;
            if (v) {
                u(!0);
                try {
                    const N = Array.from(v).map(C => p(C, "document")),
                        w = await Promise.all(N);
                    c(C => ({
                        ...C,
                        documents: [...C.documents, ...w]
                    })),
                    n({
                        title: "Documentos subidos",
                        description: `Se han subido ${v.length} documento(s) correctamente.`
                    })
                } catch {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al subir los documentos.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1),
                    i.current && (i.current.value = "")
                }
            }
        },
        g = async h => {
            var N;
            const v = (N = h.target.files) == null ? void 0 : N[0];
            if (v) {
                if (v.type !== "application/pdf") {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Solo se permiten archivos PDF para la factura.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                u(!0);
                try {
                    const w = await p(v, "invoice");
                    c(C => ({
                        ...C,
                        invoicePdf: w
                    })),
                    n({
                        title: "Factura subida",
                        description: "La factura se ha subido correctamente."
                    })
                } catch {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al subir la factura.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1),
                    o.current && (o.current.value = "")
                }
            }
        },
        x = h => {
            c(v => ({
                ...v,
                documents: v.documents.filter((N, w) => w !== h)
            }))
        },
        b = () => {
            c(h => ({
                ...h,
                invoicePdf: ""
            }))
        },
        j = h => {
            h.preventDefault(),
            m.mutate(l)
        };
    return t ? e.jsx(ws, {
        open: s,
        onOpenChange: r,
        children: e.jsxs(ps, {
            className: "max-w-2xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
            children: [e.jsx(xs, {
                children: e.jsxs(gs, {
                    children: ["Información Adicional - Pedido ", t.orderNumber]
                })
            }), e.jsxs("form", {
                onSubmit: j,
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-lg",
                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                        className: "font-semibold mb-2",
                        children: "Información del Pedido"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 text-sm",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Cliente:"
                            }), " ", t.customerName]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Email:"
                            }), " ", t.customerEmail]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Total:"
                            }), " ", t.total, "€"]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Estado:"
                            }), " ", t.orderStatus]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: "transportAgency",
                            children: "Agencia de Transporte"
                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                            id: "transportAgency",
                            value: l.transportAgency,
                            onChange: h => c(v => ({
                                ...v,
                                transportAgency: h.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Nombre de la agencia de transporte"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: "expeditionNumber",
                            children: "Número de Expedición"
                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                            id: "expeditionNumber",
                            value: l.expeditionNumber,
                            onChange: h => c(v => ({
                                ...v,
                                expeditionNumber: h.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Número de seguimiento o expedición"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: "adminObservations",
                            children: "Observaciones"
                        }), e.jsx($t, {
                            id: "adminObservations",
                            value: l.adminObservations,
                            onChange: h => c(v => ({
                                ...v,
                                adminObservations: h.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Observaciones adicionales para el cliente...",
                            rows: 4
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            children: "Documentos"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "mt-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                type: "button",
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => {
                                    var h;
                                    return (h = i.current) == null ? void 0 : h.click()
                                },
                                disabled: d,
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx(ai, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                }), d ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Documentos"]
                            }), e.jsx("input", {
                                ref: i,
                                type: "file",
                                multiple: !0,
                                accept: ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png",
                                onChange: y,
                                className: "hidden"
                            }), l.documents.length > 0 && e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: l.documents.map((h, v) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-2 rounded",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx(yn, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-sm",
                                            children: h.split("/").pop()
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                                        type: "button",
                                        variant: "ghost",
                                        size: "sm",
                                        onClick: () => x(v),
                                        children: e.jsx(Js, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }, v))
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            children: "Factura PDF"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "mt-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                type: "button",
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => {
                                    var h;
                                    return (h = o.current) == null ? void 0 : h.click()
                                },
                                disabled: d,
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx(ai, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                }), d ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Factura PDF"]
                            }), e.jsx("input", {
                                ref: o,
                                type: "file",
                                accept: ".pdf",
                                onChange: g,
                                className: "hidden"
                            }), l.invoicePdf && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-2 rounded",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center",
                                    children: [e.jsx(yn, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-sm",
                                        children: l.invoicePdf.split("/").pop()
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                    type: "button",
                                    variant: "ghost",
                                    size: "sm",
                                    onClick: b,
                                    children: e.jsx(Js, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-end space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(P, {
                        type: "button",
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: r,
                        children: "Cancelar"
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        type: "submit",
                        disabled: m.isPending || d,
                        children: m.isPending ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Cambios"
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    }) : null
}

function oW({order: t, isOpen: s, onClose: r}) {
    const [n, a] = f.useState(null),
        [i, o] = f.useState(!1),
        l = async () => {
            if (t != null && t.id) {
                o(!0);
                try {
                    const u = await fetch(`/api/admin/orders/${t.id}`);
                    if (!u.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido");
                    const m = await u.json();
                    a(m)
                } catch (u) {
                    console.error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido:", u)
                } finally {
                    o(!1)
                }
            }
        };
    if (f.useEffect(() => {
        s && l()
    }, [s, t == null ? void 0 : t.id]), !t)
        return null;
    const c = E1[n == null ? void 0 : n.paymentStatus] || E1.pendiente,
        d = k1[n == null ? void 0 : n.orderStatus] || iW[n == null ? void 0 : n.status] || k1.pendiente_verificar;
    return e.jsx(ws, {
        open: s,
        onOpenChange: r,

            className: "max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
            children: [e.jsx(xs, {
                children: e.jsxs(gs, {
                    children: ["Detalles del Pedido #", t.orderNumber]
                })
            }), i ? e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex items-center justify-center py-8",

                })

                                })

                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                    })]
                                })]
                            }, m)), e.jsx("div", {

                            }), e.jsx("p", {

                            })]

                    })]
                }), n.notes && e.jsxs($, {

                        })

                            children: n.notes
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            }) : e.jsx("div", {
                className: "text-center py-8",
                children: e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido"
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
const P1 = () => {
    const t = dr(),
        {toast: s} = st(),
        [r, n] = f.useState(""),
        [a, i] = f.useState("all"),
        [o, l] = f.useState("all"),
        [c, d] = f.useState("all"),
        [u, m] = f.useState(null),
        [p, y] = f.useState(!1),
        [g, x] = f.useState(null),
        [b, j] = f.useState(!1),
        {data: h, isLoading: v, error: N} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
        }),
        w = f.useMemo(() => h ? h.filter(O => {
            var I,
                U,
                ie;
            const H = r === "" || ((I = O.customerEmail) == null ? void 0 : I.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())) || ((U = O.customerName) == null ? void 0 : U.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())) || O.id.toString().includes(r) || ((ie = O.orderNumber) == null ? void 0 : ie.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())),
                D = a === "all" || O.paymentStatus === a,
                R = o === "all" || O.orderStatus === o,
                E = (() => {
                    if (c === "all")
                        return !0;
                    const F = new Date(O.createdAt),
                        M = new Date;
                    switch (c) {
                    case "today":
                        return F.toDateString() === M.toDateString();
                    case "week":
                        const Q = new Date(M.getTime() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1e3);
                        return F >= Q;
                    case "month":
                        const le = new Date(M.getTime() - 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1e3);
                        return F >= le;
                    default:
                        return !0
                    }
                })();
            return H && D && R && E
        }) : [], [h, r, a, o, c]),
        C = tt({
            mutationFn: async ({orderId: O, paymentStatus: H}) => Me(`/api/admin/orders/${O}/payment-status`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    paymentStatus: H
                }),
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                }
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Estado actualizado",
                    description: "El estado del pago ha sido actualizado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: O => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: O.message || "Error al actualizar el estado del pago.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        S = tt({
            mutationFn: async ({orderId: O, status: H}) => Me(`/api/admin/orders/${O}/order-status`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    orderStatus: H
                }),
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                }
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Estado actualizado",
                    description: "El estado del pedido ha sido actualizado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: O => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: O.message || "Error al actualizar el estado del pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        _ = tt({
            mutationFn: async O => Me(`/api/admin/orders/${O}`, {
                method: "DELETE"
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Pedido eliminado",
                    description: "El pedido ha sido eliminado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: O => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: O.message || "Error al eliminar el pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        T = (O, H) => {
            C.mutate({
                orderId: O,
                paymentStatus: H
            })
        },
        B = (O, H) => {
            S.mutate({
                orderId: O,
                status: H
            })
        },
        z = () => {
            t.invalidateQueries({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
            }),
            y(!1),
            m(null),
            s({
                title: "Pedido actualizado",
                description: "La información del pedido ha sido actualizada correctamente."
            })
        },
        A = O => {
            window.confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este pedido? Esta acción se puede revertir desde la papelera.") && _.mutate(O)
        };
    return v ? e.jsx(ya, {
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                children: "Gestión de Pedidos"
            }), e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Pedidos Recientes"
                    })

                        className: "h-64 w-full"
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })

                className: "text-3xl font-bold",

            }), e.jsx($, {

                        className: "h-12 w-12 text-red-500 mb-4"
                    }), e.jsx("h2", {

                    }), e.jsx("p", {
