                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                                variant: k.is_active ? "default" : "secondary",
                                                children: k.is_active ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                            })]
                                        })
                                    })
                                }, k.id))
                            })
                        })]
                    }), p && e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        children: ["Tarifas de ", p.name]
                                    }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                                        children: "Configura precios por zona y rango de peso"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        x(null),
                                        j(!0)
                                    },
                                    children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Nueva Tarifa"]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: T ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-center py-8",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "animate-spin w-6 h-6 border-2 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "mt-2 text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Cargando tarifas..."
                                })]
                            }) : e.jsxs(Ls, {
                                children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(mt, {
                                        children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Zona"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Peso Mínimo (g)"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Peso Máximo (g)"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Precio (€)"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Acciones"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(zs, {
                                    children: [_.map(k => e.jsxs(mt, {
                                        children: [e.jsx(he, {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: k.zone_name
                                        }), e.jsx(he, {
                                            children: parseFloat(k.min_weight).toLocaleString()
                                        }), e.jsx(he, {
                                            children: k.max_weight ? parseFloat(k.max_weight).toLocaleString() : "Sin límite"
                                        }), e.jsxs(he, {
                                            children: ["€", parseFloat(k.price).toFixed(2)]
                                        }), e.jsx(he, {
                                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => {
                                                        x(k),
                                                        j(!0)
                                                    },
                                                    children: e.jsx(nn, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => {},
                                                    children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }, k.id)), _.length === 0 && e.jsx(mt, {
                                        children: e.jsxs(he, {
                                            colSpan: 5,
                                            className: "text-center py-8 text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: ["No hay tarifas configuradas para este método de envío.", e.jsx("br", {}), 'Haz clic en "Nueva Tarifa" para agregar una.']
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const xW = () => {
        const {toast: t} = st(),
            s = dr(),
            [r, n] = f.useState(!1),
            [a, i] = f.useState("config"),
            {data: o, isLoading: l} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-config"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const T = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config");
                    if (!T.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar configuración de correos");
                    return T.json()
                }
            }),
            {data: c, isLoading: d, refetch: u} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-logs"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const T = await fetch("/api/admin/email-logs?limit=50");
                    if (!T.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar logs de correos");
                    return T.json()
                },
                enabled: a === "history"
            }),
            {data: m, isLoading: p, refetch: y} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/contact-messages"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const T = await fetch("/api/admin/contact-messages?limit=50");
                    if (!T.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar mensajes de contacto");
                    return T.json()
                },
                enabled: a === "messages"
            }),
            g = tt({
                mutationFn: async T => {
                    const B = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(T)
                    });
                    if (!B.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al guardar configuración");
                    return B.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración de correos se ha guardado correctamente"
                    }),
                    s.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-config"]
                    })
                },
                onError: T => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al guardar la configuración",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            x = tt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const T = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config/test", {
                        method: "POST"
                    });
                    if (!T.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al probar configuración");
                    return T.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Prueba exitosa",
                        description: "El correo de prueba se ha enviado correctamente"
                    }),
                    a === "history" && u()
                },
                onError: T => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error en la prueba",
                        description: "Error al enviar el correo de prueba",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            b = tt({
                mutationFn: async T => {
                    const B = await fetch(`/api/admin/email-logs/${T}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!B.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar log");
                    return B.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Log eliminado",
                        description: "El log se ha eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    u()
                },
                onError: T => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al eliminar el log",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            j = tt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const T = await fetch("/api/admin/email-logs", {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!T.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al limpiar historial");
                    return T.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Historial limpiado",
                        description: "Todo el historial de correos se ha eliminado"
                    }),
                    u()
                },
                onError: T => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al limpiar el historial",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            h = (T, B) => {
                g.mutate({
                    key: T,
                    value: B
                })
            },
            v = async () => {
                n(!0);
                try {
                    await x.mutateAsync()
                } finally {
                    n(!1)
                }
            },
            N = T => {
                const B = o == null ? void 0 : o.find(z => z.key === T);
                return (B == null ? void 0 : B.value) || ""
            },
            w = T => {
                const B = o == null ? void 0 : o.find(z => z.key === T);
                return (B == null ? void 0 : B.isActive) || !1
            },
            C = T => new Date(T).toLocaleString("es-ES", {
                year: "numeric",
                month: "short",
                day: "numeric",
                hour: "2-digit",
                minute: "2-digit"
            }),
            S = T => {
                switch (T) {
                case "sent":
                    return e.jsx(ve, {
                        variant: "default",
                        className: "bg-green-100 text-green-800",
                        children: "Enviado"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(ve, {
                        variant: "destructive",
                        children: "Error"
                    });
                case "pending":
                    return e.jsx(ve, {
                        variant: "secondary",
                        children: "Pendiente"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(ve, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        children: T
                    })
                }
            },
            _ = T => {
                switch (T) {
                case "contact_form":
                    return "Formulario de contacto";
                case "order_confirmation":
                    return "Confirmación de pedido";
                case "order_notification":
                    return "Notificación de pedido";
                case "test":
                    return "Prueba";
                default:
                    return T
                }
            };

                                                    })]

                                                    })]
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })

    gW = () => {
        const {toast: t} = st(),
            [s, r] = f.useState(!1),
            [n, a] = f.useState(!1),
            [i, o] = f.useState({
                id: "1",
                bannerEnabled: !0,
                bannerMessage: "Utilizamos cookies para mejorar tu experiencia en nuestro sitio web. Al continuar navegando, aceptas nuestro uso de cookies.",
                bannerPosition: "bottom",
                bannerStyle: "detailed",
                privacyPolicyUrl: "/politica-privacidad",
                cookiePolicyUrl: "/politica-cookies",
                consentDuration: 365,
                necessaryCookies: {
                    enabled: !0,
                    description: "Cookies esenciales para el funcionamiento básico del sitio web",
                    cookies: ["session", "csrf_token", "cart_data"]
                },
                analyticsCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para análisis y métricas del sitio web",
                    cookies: ["_ga", "_gid", "_gat"],
                    googleAnalyticsId: ""
                },
                marketingCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para publicidad y marketing dirigido",
                    cookies: ["_fb", "_twitter", "advertising_id"]
                },
                preferencesCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para recordar preferencias del usuario",
                    cookies: ["theme", "language", "layout_preferences"]
                }
            }),
            l = async () => {
                a(!0);
                try {
                    await new Promise(m => setTimeout(m, 1e3)),
                    localStorage.setItem("adminCookieConfig", JSON.stringify(i)),
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración de cookies se ha guardado correctamente."
                    })
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error al guardar",
                        description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración de cookies.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    a(!1)
                }
            },
            c = async () => {
                r(!0);
                try {
                    await new Promise(p => setTimeout(p, 500));
                    const m = localStorage.getItem("adminCookieConfig");
                    m && o(JSON.parse(m))
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error al cargar",
                        description: "No se pudo cargar la configuración de cookies.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    r(!1)
                }
            },
            d = () => {
                localStorage.removeItem("cookieConsent"),
                localStorage.removeItem("cookiePreferences"),
                t({
                    title: "Consentimiento restablecido",
                    description: "Se ha eliminado el consentimiento de cookies. Recarga la página para ver el banner nuevamente."
                })
            },
            u = (m, p) => {
                o(y => {
                    const g = {
                            ...y
                        },
                        x = m.split(".");
                    let b = g;
                    for (let j = 0; j < x.length - 1; j++)
                        b = b[x[j]];
                    return b[x[x.length - 1]] = p, g
                })
            };
        return f.useEffect(() => {
            c()
        }, []), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-50",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {
                activeTab: "admin_cookie_settings"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8 space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                            children: "Configuración de Cookies"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Gestiona el consentimiento de cookies y las políticas de privacidad"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: c,
                            disabled: s,
                            children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                                className: `h-4 w-4 mr-2 ${s ? "animate-spin" : ""}`
                            }), "Recargar"]
                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                            onClick: l,
                            disabled: n,
                            children: [e.jsx(Nn, {
                                className: `h-4 w-4 mr-2 ${n ? "animate-spin" : ""}`
                            }), n ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar configuración"]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(os, {
                    defaultValue: "general",
                    className: "w-full",

                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",

                            value: "general",

                            value: "categories",

                                            children: e.jsx(Ge, {})
                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            children: [e.jsx(Y, {
                                                value: "minimal",
                                                children: "Minimalista"
                                            }), e.jsx(Y, {
                                                value: "detailed",
                                                children: "Detallado"
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(ze, {
                        value: "tools",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: "Herramientas de Desarrollo"
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-4 p-4 bg-yellow-50 rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Gs, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5 text-yellow-600"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Restablecer consentimiento"
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: "Elimina el consentimiento guardado para probar el banner nuevamente"
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        onClick: d,
                                        className: "ml-auto",
                                        children: "Restablecer"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-4 p-4 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsx(uf, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5 text-blue-600"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Vista previa"
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: "Los cambios se aplicarán automáticamente en el sitio web"
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    };
function vW() {
    const [, t] = ft(),
        {user: s, logout: r} = Es(),
        n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.isAdmin) || !1,
        a = s !== null,
        {toast: i} = st(),
        o = async () => {
            try {
                await r(),
                t("/admin")
            } catch (O) {
                console.error("Error during logout:", O)
            }
        },
        [l, c] = f.useState("0"),
        [d, u] = f.useState("1000"),
        [m, p] = f.useState(new Date(2e3, 0, 1)),
        [y, g] = f.useState("recovery"),
        [x, b] = f.useState(null),
        [j, h] = f.useState(!0),
        v = async () => {
            try {
                h(!0);
                const O = await Rc.getConfig();
                b(O),
                console.log("Configuración de API cargada:", O),
                i({
                    title: "Configuración cargada",
                    description: `API Key: ${O.apiKey.substring(0, 8)}... | ID Empresa: ${O.companyId}`,
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (O) {
                console.error("Error al cargar la configuración de la API:", O),
                i({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cargar la configuración de la API",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                h(!1)
            }
        };
    f.useEffect(() => {
        a && n && v()
    }, [a, n]),
    f.useEffect(() => {
        if (x) {
            const O = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(_));
            O.forEach(H => {
                H.tests.forEach(D => {
                    "apikey" in D.headers && (D.headers.apikey = x.apiKey),
                    "idempresa" in D.headers && (D.headers.idempresa = x.companyId)
                })
            }),
            T(O)
        }
    }, [x]);
    const N = O => {
            try {
                const H = JSON.stringify(O.response, null, 2),
                    D = new Blob([H], {
                        type: "application/json"
                    }),
                    R = URL.createObjectURL(D),
                    E = document.createElement("a");
                E.href = R,
                E.download = `${O.name}_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16).replace(/:/g, "-")}.json`,
                document.body.appendChild(E),
                E.click(),
                document.body.removeChild(E),
                i({
                    title: "Archivo JSON exportado",
                    description: "El archivo se ha descargado correctamente",
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (H) {
                console.error("Error al exportar JSON:", H),
                i({
                    title: "Error al exportar",
                    description: "No se pudo generar el archivo JSON",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        w = O => {
            if (!O || O.length === 0)
                return "";
            const H = O.filter(I => I && typeof I == "object");
            if (H.length === 0)
                return "";
            const D = new Set;
            for (const I of H)
                if (I && typeof I == "object")
                    for (const U of Object.keys(I))
                        D.add(U);
            const R = Array.from(D),
                E = [R.join(",")];
            for (const I of H) {
                const U = [];
                for (const ie of R) {
                    let F = "";
                    if (I.hasOwnProperty(ie)) {
                        const M = I[ie];
                        M == null ? F = "" : typeof M == "object" ? F = `"${JSON.stringify(M).replace(/"/g, '""')}"` : F = `"${String(M).replace(/"/g, '""')}"`
                    }
                    U.push(F)
                }
                E.push(U.join(","))
            }
            return E.join(`
`
            )
        },
        C = O => {
            var H,
                D,
                R,
                E,
                I,
                U;
            try {
                let ie = "",
                    F = `${O.name}_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16).replace(/:/g, "-")}.csv`;
                (D = (H = O.response) == null ? void 0 : H.data) != null && D.piezas && O.response.data.piezas.length > 0 ? (ie = w(O.response.data.piezas), F = `piezas_${F}`) : (E = (R = O.response) == null ? void 0 : R.data) != null && E.vehiculos && O.response.data.vehiculos.length > 0 ? (ie = w(O.response.data.vehiculos), F = `vehiculos_${F}`) : Array.isArray((I = O.response) == null ? void 0 : I.data) ? ie = w(O.response.data) : ie = w([((U = O.response) == null ? void 0 : U.data) || {}]);
                const M = new Blob([ie], {
                        type: "text/csv;charset=utf-8;"
                    }),
                    Q = URL.createObjectURL(M),
                    le = document.createElement("a");
                le.href = Q,
                le.download = F,
                document.body.appendChild(le),
                le.click(),
                document.body.removeChild(le),
                i({
                    title: "Archivo CSV exportado",
                    description: "El archivo se ha descargado correctamente",
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (ie) {
                console.error("Error al exportar CSV:", ie),
                i({
                    title: "Error al exportar",
                    description: "No se pudo generar el archivo CSV",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }

        B = async () => {
            try {
                const O = await fetch("/api/config");
                if (!O.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al obtener la configuración de API");
                const H = await O.json();
                T(D => D.map(R => ({
                    ...R,
                    tests: R.tests.map(E => ({
                        ...E,
                        headers: {
                            ...E.headers,
                            apikey: H.apiKey
                        }
                    }))
                })))
            } catch (O) {
                console.error("Error fetching API config:", O),
                i({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo obtener la configuración de API. Verifique que ha configurado la API y que tiene permisos de administrador.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        z = (O, H, D) => {
            T(R => {
                const E = R.findIndex(ie => ie.id === O);
                if (E === -1)
                    return R;
                const I = R[E].tests.findIndex(ie => ie.id === H);
                if (I === -1)
                    return R;
                const U = [...R];
                return U[E].tests[I].body = D, U
            })
        },
        A = async (O, H) => {
            const D = _.findIndex(E => E.id === O);
            if (D === -1)
                return;
            const R = _[D].tests.findIndex(E => E.id === H);
            if (R !== -1) {
                T(E => {
                    const I = [...E];
                    return I[D].tests[R].loading = !0, I[D].tests[R].error = void 0, I[D].tests[R].success = void 0, I
                });
                try {
                    const {headers: E, body: I, requiresBody: U} = _[D].tests[R];
                    let ie = {};
                    if (U && I)
                        try {
                            ie = {
                                ...E,
                                body: JSON.parse(I)
                            }
                        } catch {
                            i({
                                title: "Error en el formato del body",
                                description: "El formato JSON del body no es válido",
                                variant: "destructive"
                            }),
                            T(le => {
                                const we = [...le];
                                return we[D].tests[R].loading = !1, we[D].tests[R].error = "Error en el formato JSON del body", we
                            });
                            return
                        }
                    else
                        ie = E;
                    const F = await fetch(_[D].tests[R].endpoint, {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(ie)
                        }),
                        M = await F.json();
                    T(Q => {
                        const le = [...Q];
                        return le[D].tests[R].loading = !1, le[D].tests[R].response = M, le[D].tests[R].success = F.ok, F.ok || (le[D].tests[R].error = M.error || "Error desconocido"), le
                    }),
                    F.ok ? i({
                        title: "Test ejecutado correctamente",
                        description: `${_[D].tests[R].name} completado con éxito.`
                    }) : i({
                        title: "Error al ejecutar test",
                        description: M.error || "Error desconocido",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } catch (E) {
                    console.error("Error running test:", E),
                    T(I => {
                        const U = [...I];
                        return U[D].tests[R].loading = !1, U[D].tests[R].error = E instanceof Error ? E.message : "Error desconocido", U[D].tests[R].success = !1, U
                    }),
                    i({
                        title: "Error al ejecutar test",
                        description: E instanceof Error ? E.message : "Error desconocido",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }
        };
    return ke.useEffect(() => {
        a && n && B()
    }, [a, n]), ke.useEffect(() => {
        T(O => O.map(H => ({

                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(os, {
                value: y,
                onValueChange: g,
                children: [e.jsx(Jt, {
                    className: "mb-6",
                    children: _.map(O => e.jsx($e, {
                        value: O.id,
                        children: O.name
                    }, O.id))
                }), _.map(O => e.jsx(ze, {
                    value: O.id,
                    children: e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: O.name
                            }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                                children: O.description
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-8",
                                children: O.tests.map(H => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "border rounded-lg p-6",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-center justify-between gap-4 mb-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                                className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                                children: H.name
                                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                                children: H.description
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "flex gap-2",
                                            children: e.jsxs(P, {
                                                variant: "default",
                                                onClick: () => A(O.id, H.id),
                                                disabled: H.loading,
                                                children: [H.loading && e.jsx(Qt, {
                                                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                                }), "Ejecutar"]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "mb-4",
                                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                            className: "text-sm font-medium mb-2",
                                            children: "Headers"
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-muted p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: JSON.stringify(H.headers, null, 2)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), H.requiresBody && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "mb-4 border-t pt-4",
                                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                                            children: e.jsx("h4", {
                                                className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                                children: "Body (JSON)"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "border border-input rounded-md",
                                            children: e.jsx("textarea", {
                                                className: "w-full p-3 font-mono text-xs bg-background resize-y min-h-[200px]",
                                                value: H.body || "",
                                                onChange: D => z(O.id, H.id, D.target.value),
                                                placeholder: "Escribe el body en formato JSON"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1",
                                            children: "El body debe estar en formato JSON válido"
                                        })]
                                    }), H.response && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "border-t pt-4 mt-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                                className: "text-sm font-medium flex items-center",
                                                children: ["Resultado", H.success ? e.jsx(Dt, {
                                                    className: "ml-2 h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                                                }) : e.jsx(Sa, {
                                                    className: "ml-2 h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => N(H),
                                                    children: "Exportar JSON"
                                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => C(H),
                                                    children: "Exportar CSV"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), H.error ? e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-red-50 text-red-500 p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: H.error
                                            })
                                        }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-muted p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto max-h-96",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: JSON.stringify(H.response, null, 2)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, H.id))
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }, O.id))]
            })]
        })]
    })
}

var HA = "RadioIndicator",

var NW = t => {
    const {control: s, checked: r, bubbles: n=!0, ...a} = t,
        i = f.useRef(null),
        o = Tp(r),
        l = bp(s);
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        const c = i.current,
            d = window.HTMLInputElement.prototype,
            m = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(d, "checked").set;
        if (o !== r && m) {
            const p = new Event("click", {
                bubbles: n
            });
            m.call(c, r),
            c.dispatchEvent(p)
        }
    }, [o, r, n]), e.jsx("input", {
        type: "radio",
        "aria-hidden": !0,
        defaultChecked: r,
        ...a,
        tabIndex: -1,
        ref: i,
        style: {
            ...t.style,
            ...l,
            position: "absolute",
            pointerEvents: "none",
            opacity: 0,
            margin: 0
        }
    })
};
function GA(t) {
    return t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}

var QA = "RadioGroupItem",

                    wW.includes(x.key) && (p.current = !0)

            }

const _1 = "guestSessionId";
function _W() {
    const t = Date.now().toString(36),
        s = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 15);
    return `guest_${t}_${s}`
}
function cy() {
    let t = localStorage.getItem(_1);
    return t || (t = _W(), localStorage.setItem(_1, t)), t
}
function TW() {
    const {toast: t} = st(),
        {items: s, clearCart: r, setItems: n} = gl(),
        [, a] = ft(),
        [i, o] = f.useState([]),
        [l, c] = f.useState([]),
        [d, u] = f.useState([]),
        [m, p] = f.useState(!0),
        [y, g] = f.useState(!1),
        [x, b] = f.useState(0),
        [j, h] = f.useState(!1),
        [v, N] = f.useState("guest"),
        [w, C] = f.useState(""),
        [S, _] = f.useState(""),
        [T, B] = f.useState(!1),
        [z, A] = f.useState(null),
        [O, H] = f.useState(null),
        [D, R] = f.useState(!1),
        [E, I] = f.useState({
            customerName: "",
            customerLastName: "",
            customerEmail: "",
            customerPhone: "",
            shippingAddress: "",
            shippingCity: "",
            shippingProvince: "",
            shippingPostalCode: "",
            billingAddress: "",
            billingCity: "",
            billingProvince: "",
            billingPostalCode: "",
            useSameAddress: !0,
            paymentMethodId: "",
            shippingMethodId: "",
            notes: "",
            createAccount: !1,
            password: ""
        });
    f.useEffect(() => {
        if (ie(), U(), s.length === 0) {
            const k = sessionStorage.getItem("backup_cart_data");
            if (k)
                try {
                    const ee = JSON.parse(k);
                    Array.isArray(ee) && ee.length > 0 && (console.log("🔄 Restaurando carrito desde backup en checkout:", ee.length, "items"), n(ee), sessionStorage.removeItem("backup_cart_data"))
                } catch (ee) {
                    console.error("Error restaurando carrito en checkout:", ee)
                }
        }
    }, []),
    f.useEffect(() => {
        E.shippingProvince && s.length > 0 && F()
    }, [E.shippingProvince, s]);
    const U = async () => {
            try {
                const k = await fetch("/api/auth/me", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (k.ok) {
                    const ee = await k.json();
                    A(ee);
                    const G = await fetch("/api/user/permissions", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (G.ok) {
                        const se = await G.json();
                        H(se)
                    }
                    ee && (I(se => ({
                        ...se,
                        customerName: ee.firstName || "",
                        customerLastName: ee.lastName || "",
                        customerEmail: ee.email || "",
                        customerPhone: ee.phone || "",
                        shippingAddress: ee.address || "",
                        shippingCity: ee.city || "",
                        shippingProvince: ee.province || "",
                        shippingPostalCode: ee.postalCode || "",
                        billingAddress: ee.billingAddress || ee.address || "",
                        billingCity: ee.billingCity || ee.city || "",
                        billingProvince: ee.billingProvince || ee.province || "",
                        billingPostalCode: ee.billingPostalCode || ee.postalCode || "",
                        useSameAddress: !ee.billingAddress
                    })), N("authenticated"))
                }
            } catch (k) {
                console.error("Error checking user auth:", k)
            }
        },
        ie = async () => {
            try {
                const [k, ee] = await Promise.all([Me("GET", "/api/payment-modules/demo"), Me("GET", "/api/provinces")]),
                    G = await k.json(),
                    se = await ee.json();
                o(G),
                u(se),
                G.length > 0 && I(L => ({
                    ...L,
                    paymentMethodId: G[0].provider
                }))
            } catch (k) {
                console.error("Error loading methods:", k),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los métodos de pago y provincias",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                p(!1)
            }
        },
        F = async () => {
            if (!(!E.shippingProvince || s.length === 0)) {
                h(!0),
                console.log(`🚚 Calculando envío para ${s.length} items distintos:`),
                s.forEach(k => {
                    console.log(`  - ID: ${k.partId}, Código: ${k.partCode}, Cantidad: ${k.quantity}, Peso almacenado: ${k.partWeight}g`)
                });
                try {
                    const k = await Promise.all(s.map(async se => {
                        let L = se.partWeight;
                        if (console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} (${se.partCode}) - peso almacenado: ${L}g`), !L || L === 500)
                            try {
                                let ue = await fetch(`/api/parts/${se.partId}`),
                                    ye = null;
                                if (ue.ok)
                                    ye = await ue.json();
                                else if (se.partCode && (console.log(`Buscando pieza por código: ${se.partCode}`), ue = await fetch(`/api/search-parts?search=${encodeURIComponent(se.partCode)}&limit=1`), ue.ok)) {
                                    const Ke = await ue.json();
                                    Ke.data && Ke.data.length > 0 && (ye = Ke.data[0], console.log(`Encontrada pieza por código ${se.partCode}: ID ${ye.id}, peso ${ye.peso}g`))
                                }
                                if (ye) {
                                    const Ke = ye.peso ? parseInt(ye.peso.toString()) : null;
                                    console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - peso de API: ${Ke}g`),
                                    L = Ke || 500
                                } else
                                    console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - no encontrada, usando 500g por defecto`),
                                    L = 500
                            } catch (ue) {
                                console.error("Error fetching part weight:", ue),
                                L = 500
                            }
                        const te = L * se.quantity;
                        return console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - peso final: ${L}g × ${se.quantity} = ${te}g`), {
                            partId: se.partId,
                            quantity: se.quantity,
                            price: se.price,
                            peso: L
                        }
                    }));
                    console.log("📤 Enviando datos al servidor para cálculo de envío:"),
                    console.log("  - Provincia:", E.shippingProvince),
                    console.log("  - Items del carrito:", k),
                    console.log("  - Total items:", k.length),
                    k.forEach((se, L) => {
                        console.log(`    [${L}] ID: ${se.partId}, Cantidad: ${se.quantity}, Peso unitario: ${se.peso}g, Peso total: ${se.peso * se.quantity}g`)
                    });
                    const G = await (await Me("POST", "/api/shipping/calculate", {
                        province: E.shippingProvince,
                        cartItems: k,
                        postalCode: E.shippingPostalCode
                    })).json();
                    if (G.shippingOptions && (c(G.shippingOptions), G.shippingOptions.length > 0)) {
                        const se = G.shippingOptions[0];
                        I(L => ({
                            ...L,
                            shippingMethodId: se.id.toString()
                        })),
                        b(se.cost)
                    }
                } catch (k) {
                    console.error("Error calculating shipping options:", k),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron calcular las opciones de envío",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    c([])
                } finally {
                    h(!1)
                }
            }
        },
        M = async k => {
            if (k.preventDefault(), R(!0), g(!0), !we()) {
                g(!1),
                t({
                    title: "Error en el formulario",
                    description: "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios antes de continuar.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                });
                return
            }
            try {
                const ee = s.reduce((te, ue) => te + ue.price * ue.quantity, 0),
                    G = i.find(te => te.provider === E.paymentMethodId);
                if (!G)
                    throw new Error("Método de pago no seleccionado");
                const se = cy(),
                    L = {
                        customerName: E.customerName,
                        customerLastName: E.customerLastName,
                        customerEmail: E.customerEmail,
                        customerPhone: E.customerPhone,
                        shippingAddress: E.shippingAddress,
                        shippingCity: E.shippingCity,
                        shippingProvince: E.shippingProvince,
                        shippingPostalCode: E.shippingPostalCode,
                        shippingCountry: "España",
                        billingAddress: E.useSameAddress ? E.shippingAddress : E.billingAddress,
                        billingCity: E.useSameAddress ? E.shippingCity : E.billingCity,
                        billingProvince: E.useSameAddress ? E.shippingProvince : E.billingProvince,
                        billingPostalCode: E.useSameAddress ? E.shippingPostalCode : E.billingPostalCode,
                        paymentMethodId: E.paymentMethodId,
                        shippingMethodId: parseInt(E.shippingMethodId),
                        notes: E.notes,
                        items: s.map(te => ({
                            partId: te.partId,
                            quantity: te.quantity,
                            price: te.price,
                            partName: te.partName
                        })),
                        subtotal: ee.toString(),
                        shippingCost: x.toString(),
                        total: (ee + x).toString(),
                        createAccount: E.createAccount,
                        password: E.password,
                        sessionId: se
                    };
                if (G.provider === "stripe") {
                    const te = {
                            amount: parseFloat(L.total),
                            currency: "EUR",
                            description: "Pedido - Desguace Murcia",
                            customerEmail: L.customerEmail,
                            customerName: `${L.customerName} ${L.customerLastName}`,
                            metadata: {
                                sessionId: se
                            }
                        },
                        ue = await Me("POST", "/api/payment/stripe/process", te);
                    if (ue.ok) {
                        const ye = await ue.json();
                        if (ye.success) {
                            sessionStorage.setItem("pending_order_data", JSON.stringify(L)),
                            window.location.href = `${ye.data.redirectUrl}&session_id=${se}`;
                            return
                        }
                    }
                } else if (G.provider === "paypal") {
                    const te = {
                            amount: parseFloat(L.total),
                            currency: "EUR",
                            description: "Pedido - Desguace Murcia",
                            customerEmail: L.customerEmail,
                            customerName: `${L.customerName} ${L.customerLastName}`,
                            metadata: {
                                sessionId: se
                            }
                        },
                        ue = await Me("POST", "/api/payment/paypal/process", te);
                    if (ue.ok) {
                        const ye = await ue.json();
                        if (ye.success) {
                            sessionStorage.setItem("pending_order_data", JSON.stringify(L)),
                            window.location.href = `${ye.data.redirectUrl}&session_id=${se}`;
                            return
                        }
                    }
                } else if (G.provider === "redsys") {
                    sessionStorage.setItem("backup_cart_data", JSON.stringify(s));
                    const te = await Me("POST", "/api/orders/local", L);
                    if (te.ok) {
                        const ue = await te.json(),
                            ye = {
                                id: ue.id,
                                orderNumber: ue.orderNumber,
                                amount: parseFloat(L.total),
                                currency: "EUR",
                                description: `Pedido #${ue.orderNumber} - Desguace Murcia`,
                                customerEmail: L.customerEmail,
                                customerName: `${L.customerName} ${L.customerLastName}`,
                                returnUrl: `${window.location.origin}/order-confirmation/${ue.id}?payment=redsys&sessionId=${se}`,
                                cancelUrl: `${window.location.origin}/checkout?error=payment_cancelled`,
                                metadata: {
                                    orderId: ue.id
                                }
                            },
                            Ke = await Me("POST", "/api/payment/redsys/process", ye);
                        if (Ke.ok) {
                            const X = await Ke.json();
                            if (X.success && X.data.formHtml) {
                                console.log("🚨 CHECKOUT DEBUG - Enviando directamente a Redsys:", {
                                    success: X.success,
                                    hasFormHtml: !!X.data.formHtml,
                                    actionUrl: X.data.actionUrl,
                                    orderNumber: X.data.orderNumber,
                                    redsysOrderNumber: X.data.redsysOrderNumber,
                                    amount: X.data.amount
                                });
                                const Ie = document.createElement("div");
                                Ie.innerHTML = X.data.formHtml,
                                Ie.style.display = "none",
                                document.body.appendChild(Ie);
                                const ct = Ie.querySelector("form");
                                if (ct)
                                    console.log("🚨 FORM FOUND - Submitting directly to Redsys"),
                                    document.body.appendChild(ct),
                                    ct.submit();
                                else
                                    throw console.error("❌ No se encontró el formulario en el HTML generado"), new Error("Error en la configuración del pago");
                                return
                            } else
                                throw new Error("Error al procesar el pago con Redsys")
                        } else
                            throw new Error("Error al procesar el pago con Redsys")
                    } else {
                        const ue = await te.json();
                        if (te.status === 400 && ue.error) {
                            let ye = "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios";
                            throw ue.error.includes("customerPhone") ? ye = "El teléfono es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : ue.error.includes("customerName") ? ye = "El nombre es obligatorio" : ue.error.includes("customerLastName") ? ye = "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : ue.error.includes("customerEmail") ? ye = "El email es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : ue.error.includes("shippingAddress") ? ye = "La dirección de envío es obligatoria" : ue.error.includes("shippingCity") ? ye = "La ciudad es obligatoria" : ue.error.includes("shippingProvince") ? ye = "La provincia es obligatoria" : ue.error.includes("shippingPostalCode") ? ye = "El código postal es obligatorio" : ue.error.includes("paymentMethodId") ? ye = "Debe seleccionar un método de pago" : ue.error.includes("shippingMethodId") && (ye = "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"), new Error(ye)
                        }
                        throw new Error(ue.error || "Error al crear el pedido")
                    }
                } else {
                    const te = await Me("POST", "/api/orders/local", L);
                    if (te.ok) {
                        const ue = await te.json(),
                            ye = cy();
                        G.provider === "bank_transfer" ? (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${ue.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Consulta los datos de transferencia en la página de confirmación.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${ue.id}?payment=bank_transfer&sessionId=${ye}`)) : G.provider === "stripe" ? (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${ue.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Serás redirigido al pago.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${ue.id}?payment=stripe&sessionId=${ye}`)) : G.provider === "paypal" ? (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${ue.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Serás redirigido al pago con PayPal.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${ue.id}?payment=paypal&sessionId=${ye}`)) : (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${ue.orderNumber} ha sido creado correctamente`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${ue.id}?sessionId=${ye}`))
                    } else {
                        const ue = await te.json();
                        if (te.status === 400 && ue.error) {
                            let ye = "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios";
                            throw ue.error.includes("customerPhone") ? ye = "El teléfono es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : ue.error.includes("customerName") ? ye = "El nombre es obligatorio" : ue.error.includes("customerLastName") ? ye = "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : ue.error.includes("customerEmail") ? ye = "El email es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : ue.error.includes("shippingAddress") ? ye = "La dirección de envío es obligatoria" : ue.error.includes("shippingCity") ? ye = "La ciudad es obligatoria" : ue.error.includes("shippingProvince") ? ye = "La provincia es obligatoria" : ue.error.includes("shippingPostalCode") ? ye = "El código postal es obligatorio" : ue.error.includes("paymentMethodId") ? ye = "Debe seleccionar un método de pago" : ue.error.includes("shippingMethodId") && (ye = "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"), new Error(ye)
                        }
                        throw new Error(ue.error || "Error al crear el pedido")
                    }
                }
            } catch (ee) {
                console.error("Error submitting order:", ee),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: ee instanceof Error ? ee.message : "No se pudo procesar el pedido. Inténtalo de nuevo.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                g(!1)
            }
        },
        Q = (k, ee) => {
            I(G => ({
                ...G,
                [k]: ee
            }))
        },
        le = (k, ee) => {
            if (!D && (!ee || ee.trim().length === 0))
                return null;
            switch (k) {
            case "customerName":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El nombre es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "El nombre debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "customerLastName":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "Los apellidos deben tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "customerEmail":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El email es obligatorio" : /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(ee) ? null : "El email debe tener un formato válido";
            case "customerPhone":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El teléfono es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 9 ? "El teléfono debe tener al menos 9 dígitos" : null;
            case "shippingAddress":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La dirección es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "La dirección debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "shippingCity":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La ciudad es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "La ciudad debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "shippingPostalCode":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El código postal es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "El código postal debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingAddress":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La dirección de facturación es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "La dirección debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingCity":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La ciudad de facturación es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "La ciudad debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingPostalCode":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El código postal de facturación es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "El código postal debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            default:
                return null
            }
        },
        we = () => {
            const k = ["customerName", "customerLastName", "customerEmail", "customerPhone", "shippingAddress", "shippingCity", "shippingProvince", "shippingPostalCode"];
            return E.useSameAddress || k.push("billingAddress", "billingCity", "billingProvince", "billingPostalCode"), k.every(ee => {
                const G = E[ee];
                return G && typeof G == "string" && G.trim().length > 0 && !le(ee, G)
            }) && E.paymentMethodId && E.shippingMethodId
        },
        Se = async k => {
            k.preventDefault(),
            B(!0);
            try {
                const ee = await Me("POST", "/api/auth/login", {
                    email: w,
                    password: S
                });
                if (ee.ok) {
                    const G = await ee.json();
                    t({
                        title: "¡Bienvenido!",
                        description: `Has iniciado sesión como ${G.firstName || w}`
                    }),
                    G.firstName && G.lastName && I(se => ({
                        ...se,
                        customerName: G.firstName,
                        customerLastName: G.lastName,
                        customerEmail: G.email || w,
                        customerPhone: G.phone || "",
                        shippingAddress: G.address || "",
                        shippingCity: G.city || "",
                        shippingPostalCode: G.postalCode || "",
                        billingAddress: G.billingAddress || G.address || "",
                        billingCity: G.billingCity || G.city || "",
                        billingProvince: G.billingProvince || G.province || "",
                        billingPostalCode: G.billingPostalCode || G.postalCode || "",
                        useSameAddress: !G.billingAddress
                    })),
                    N("guest")
                } else {
                    const G = await ee.json();
                    throw new Error(G.error || "Error en el inicio de sesión")
                }
            } catch (ee) {
                console.error("Error logging in:", ee),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: ee instanceof Error ? ee.message : "No se pudo iniciar sesión. Verifica tus credenciales.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                B(!1)
            }
        };
    return m ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center",
            children: "Cargando opciones de pago y envío..."
        })
    }) : s.length === 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsx($, {
            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "p-8 text-center",
                children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                    children: "Carrito vacío"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                    children: "Añade productos a tu carrito para proceder con la compra"
                }), e.jsx(P, {
                    onClick: () => a("/parts"),
                    children: "Ver productos"
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "lg:col-span-2",
                children: e.jsxs(os, {
                    value: v,
                    onValueChange: N,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: [e.jsxs(Jt, {
                        className: `grid w-full ${z ? "grid-cols-3" : "grid-cols-2"}`,
                        children: [e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "guest",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(T5, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Comprar como invitado"]
                        }), !z && e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "login",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(JN, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Iniciar sesión"]
                        }), z && e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "authenticated",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(so, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Usar mis datos"]
                        }), z && (O == null ? void 0 : O.isAdmin) && e.jsxs($e, {
                            value: "admin",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Xr, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
