                                                id: "shippingCity",
                                                value: E.shippingCity,
                                                onChange: k => Q("shippingCity", k.target.value),
                                                required: !0,
                                                placeholder: "Tu ciudad",
                                                className: le("shippingCity", E.shippingCity) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), le("shippingCity", E.shippingCity) && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: le("shippingCity", E.shippingCity)
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                                htmlFor: "shippingProvince",
                                                children: "Provincia *"
                                            }), e.jsxs(We, {
                                                value: E.shippingProvince,
                                                onValueChange: k => Q("shippingProvince", k),
                                                children: [e.jsx(qe, {
                                                    className: !E.shippingProvince && D ? "border-red-500" : "",
                                                    children: e.jsx(Ge, {
                                                        placeholder: "Selecciona provincia"
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(He, {
                                                    children: d.map(k => e.jsx(Y, {
                                                        value: k.name,
                                                        children: k.name
                                                    }, k.id))
                                                })]
                                            }), !E.shippingProvince && D && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: "La provincia es obligatoria"
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                                htmlFor: "shippingPostalCode",
                                                children: "Código postal *"
                                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                                id: "shippingPostalCode",
                                                value: E.shippingPostalCode,
                                                onChange: k => Q("shippingPostalCode", k.target.value),
                                                required: !0,
                                                placeholder: "12345",
                                                className: le("shippingPostalCode", E.shippingPostalCode) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), le("shippingPostalCode", E.shippingPostalCode) && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: le("shippingPostalCode", E.shippingPostalCode)
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(cf, {
                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Dirección de facturación"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx("input", {
                                            type: "checkbox",
                                            id: "useSameAddress",
                                            checked: E.useSameAddress,
                                            onChange: k => {
                                                const ee = k.target.checked;
                                                I(G => ({
                                                    ...G,
                                                    useSameAddress: ee,
                                                    billingAddress: ee ? G.shippingAddress : "",
                                                    billingCity: ee ? G.shippingCity : "",
                                                    billingProvince: ee ? G.shippingProvince : "",
                                                    billingPostalCode: ee ? G.shippingPostalCode : ""
                                                }))
                                            },
                                            className: "rounded border-gray-300"
                                        }), e.jsx(W, {
                                            htmlFor: "useSameAddress",
                                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                            children: "Usar misma dirección que la de envío"
                                        })]
                                    }), !E.useSameAddress && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                                htmlFor: "billingAddress",
                                                children: "Dirección de facturación *"
                                            }), e.jsx(J, {
                                                id: "billingAddress",
                                                value: E.billingAddress,
                                                onChange: k => Q("billingAddress", k.target.value),
                                                required: !E.useSameAddress,
                                                placeholder: "Calle, número, piso, puerta",
                                                className: le("billingAddress", E.billingAddress) && !E.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), le("billingAddress", E.billingAddress) && !E.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: le("billingAddress", E.billingAddress)
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                                    htmlFor: "billingCity",
                                                    children: "Ciudad *"
                                                }), e.jsx(J, {
                                                    id: "billingCity",
                                                    value: E.billingCity,
                                                    onChange: k => Q("billingCity", k.target.value),
                                                    required: !E.useSameAddress,
                                                    placeholder: "Tu ciudad",
                                                    className: le("billingCity", E.billingCity) && !E.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                                }), le("billingCity", E.billingCity) && !E.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                    children: le("billingCity", E.billingCity)
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                                    htmlFor: "billingProvince",
                                                    children: "Provincia *"
                                                }), e.jsxs(We, {
                                                    value: E.billingProvince,
                                                    onValueChange: k => Q("billingProvince", k),
                                                    children: [e.jsx(qe, {
                                                        className: !E.billingProvince && D && !E.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : "",
                                                        children: e.jsx(Ge, {
                                                            placeholder: "Selecciona provincia"
                                                        })
                                                    }), e.jsx(He, {
                                                        children: d.map(k => e.jsx(Y, {
                                                            value: k.name,
                                                            children: k.name
                                                        }, k.id))
                                                    })]
                                                }), !E.billingProvince && D && !E.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                    children: "La provincia es obligatoria"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                                    htmlFor: "billingPostalCode",
                                                    children: "Código postal *"
                                                }), e.jsx(J, {
                                                    id: "billingPostalCode",
                                                    value: E.billingPostalCode,
                                                    onChange: k => Q("billingPostalCode", k.target.value),
                                                    required: !E.useSameAddress,
                                                    placeholder: "12345",
                                                    className: le("billingPostalCode", E.billingPostalCode) && !E.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                                }), le("billingPostalCode", E.billingPostalCode) && !E.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                    children: le("billingPostalCode", E.billingPostalCode)
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), E.useSameAddress && e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "bg-green-50 p-3 rounded-lg",
                                        children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-green-800",
                                            children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                children: "Dirección de facturación:"
                                            }), " Se utilizará la misma dirección de envío para la facturación."]
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Xs, {
                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Método de envío *"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(V, {
                                    children: j ? e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-center py-4",
                                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Calculando opciones de envío..."
                                        })
                                    }) : E.shippingProvince === "" ? e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-center py-4",
                                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Selecciona una provincia para ver las opciones de envío"
                                        })
                                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx(oy, {
                                            value: E.shippingMethodId,
                                            onValueChange: k => {
                                                Q("shippingMethodId", k);
                                                const ee = l.find(G => G.id.toString() === k);
                                                ee && b(ee.cost)
                                            },
                                            children: l.map(k => e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2 p-3 border rounded-lg",
                                                children: [e.jsx(ly, {
                                                    value: k.id.toString(),
                                                    id: `shipping-${k.id}`
                                                }), e.jsx(W, {
                                                    htmlFor: `shipping-${k.id}`,
                                                    className: "flex-1",
                                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                                children: k.name
                                                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                                children: k.description
                                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                children: [k.estimatedDays, " días estimados"]
                                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                children: ["Zona: ", k.zoneName]
                                                            })]
                                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                                            className: "text-right",
                                                            children: k.isFreeShipping ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                                    className: "text-sm font-medium text-green-600",
                                                                    children: "GRATIS"
                                                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                    className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                    children: ["Precio normal: €", k.originalCost.toFixed(2)]
                                                                })]
                                                            }) : e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                                                children: ["€", k.cost.toFixed(2)]
                                                            })
                                                        })]
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            }, k.id))
                                        }), !E.shippingMethodId && D && e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-2",
                                            children: "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ds, {
                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Método de pago *"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(V, {
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx(oy, {
                                            value: E.paymentMethodId,
                                            onValueChange: k => Q("paymentMethodId", k),
                                            children: i.map(k => e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: `flex items-center space-x-2 p-3 border rounded-lg ${k.needsConfiguration ? "border-orange-200 bg-orange-50" : ""}`,
                                                children: [e.jsx(ly, {
                                                    value: k.provider,
                                                    id: `payment-${k.provider}`,
                                                    disabled: k.needsConfiguration
                                                }), e.jsxs(W, {
                                                    htmlFor: `payment-${k.provider}`,
                                                    className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                                                    children: [k.provider === "stripe" && e.jsx(ds, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                                                    }), k.provider === "bank_transfer" && e.jsx(cf, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-green-600"
                                                    }), k.provider === "paypal" && e.jsx(ds, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-yellow-600"
                                                    }), k.provider === "redsys" && e.jsx(ds, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-red-600"
                                                    }), k.provider === "cash" && e.jsx(ZO, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-orange-600"
                                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "flex-1",
                                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "font-medium",
                                                            children: k.name
                                                        }), k.provider === "bank_transfer" && !k.needsConfiguration && e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                            children: "Los datos bancarios se mostrarán después de confirmar el pedido"
                                                        }), k.needsConfiguration && e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "text-sm text-orange-600",
                                                            children: "Necesita configuración en el panel de administración"
                                                        })]
                                                    })]
                                                })]
                                            }, k.provider))
                                        }), !E.paymentMethodId && D && e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-2",
                                            children: "Debe seleccionar un método de pago"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                        children: "Notas adicionales"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(V, {
                                    children: e.jsx("textarea", {
                                        className: "w-full p-3 border rounded-md",
                                        rows: 3,
                                        placeholder: "Instrucciones especiales para la entrega...",
                                        value: E.notes,
                                        onChange: k => Q("notes", k.target.value)
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx("div", {
                children: e.jsxs($, {
                    className: "sticky top-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Resumen del pedido"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [s.map(k => e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex-1",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-sm",
                                    children: k.partName
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-xs text-gray-600",
                                    children: k.partFamily
                                }), (k.partReference || k.partCode) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-1 mt-1",
                                    children: [k.partReference && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs",
                                        children: ["Ref: ", k.partReference]
                                    }), k.partCode && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs",
                                        children: ["Cód: ", k.partCode]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-xs mt-1",
                                    children: ["Cantidad: ", k.quantity]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: ["€", (k.price * k.quantity).toFixed(2)]
                            })]
                        }, k.id)), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Subtotal:"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: ["€", s.reduce((k, ee) => k + ee.price * ee.quantity, 0).toFixed(2)]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Envío:"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: ["€", x.toFixed(2)]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between font-bold text-lg",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Total:"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: ["€", (s.reduce((k, ee) => k + ee.price * ee.quantity, 0) + x).toFixed(2)]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            type: "submit",
                            className: "w-full",
                            size: "lg",
                            disabled: y || !we(),
                            onClick: M,
                            children: y ? "Procesando..." : "Finalizar pedido"
                        }), !we() && !y && D && e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-xs text-red-600 text-center mt-2",
                            children: "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios y corrige los errores antes de continuar"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-xs text-gray-600 text-center",
                            children: "Al finalizar el pedido aceptas nuestros términos y condiciones"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
const AW = () => {
        const {items: t, totalItems: s, totalPrice: r, updateQuantity: n, removeItem: a, clearCart: i} = gl(),
            [, o] = ft();
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6 py-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex items-center gap-4 mb-8",
                children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                    variant: "ghost",
                    size: "sm",
                    onClick: () => o("/"),
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(yr, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Volver a la tienda"]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                        children: "Tu Carrito"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600",
                        children: s === 0 ? "Tu carrito está vacío" : `${s} ${s === 1 ? "artículo" : "artículos"} en tu carrito`
                    })]
                })]
            }), t.length === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-16",
                children: [e.jsx(rn, {
                    className: "h-24 w-24 text-gray-300 mb-6"
                }), e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-4",
                    children: "Tu carrito está vacío"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-500 mb-8 text-center max-w-md",
                    children: "Parece que no has añadido ninguna pieza a tu carrito. ¡Explora nuestro catálogo y encuentra las piezas que necesitas!"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                        onClick: () => o("/parts"),
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(rn, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        }), "Buscar piezas"]
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: () => o("/vehicles"),
                        children: "Ver vehículos"
                    })]
                })]
            }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-2",
                    children: e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                            className: "flex flex-row items-center justify-between",
                            children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Productos en tu carrito"
                            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                size: "sm",
                                onClick: i,
                                className: "text-red-600 hover:text-red-700",
                                children: [e.jsx(tl, {
                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                }), "Vaciar carrito"]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: t.map(l => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-3 sm:gap-4 p-3 sm:p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "h-20 w-20 sm:h-20 sm:w-20 mx-auto sm:mx-0 rounded bg-gray-100 flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden flex-shrink-0",
                                        children: l.partImage ? e.jsx("img", {
                                            src: l.partImage,
                                            alt: l.partName,
                                            className: "object-cover h-full w-full"
                                        }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "text-gray-400 text-2xl",
                                            children: "🔧"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex-1 space-y-3",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "text-center sm:text-left",
                                            children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                                className: "font-semibold text-base sm:text-lg mb-1",
                                                children: l.partName
                                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-gray-600 text-sm mb-2",
                                                children: l.partFamily
                                            })]
                                        }), (l.partReference || l.partCode) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex flex-wrap gap-2 justify-center sm:justify-start",
                                            children: [l.partReference && e.jsxs("span", {
                                                className: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs sm:text-sm font-medium",
                                                children: ["Ref: ", l.partReference]
                                            }), l.partCode && e.jsxs("span", {
                                                className: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs sm:text-sm font-medium",
                                                children: ["Código: ", l.partCode]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:items-center sm:justify-between gap-3",
                                            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center justify-center sm:justify-start gap-2",
                                                children: e.jsx("div", {
                                                    className: "flex items-center justify-center",
                                                    children: e.jsx("span", {
                                                        className: "text-lg font-medium text-center px-4 py-2 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg",
                                                        children: "1 unidad"
                                                    })
                                                })
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-center sm:text-right",
                                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                                    className: "text-lg sm:text-xl font-bold",
                                                    children: bt(l.price * l.quantity, !1)
                                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "text-xs sm:text-sm text-gray-500",
                                                    children: [bt(l.price, !1), " cada uno"]
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "mt-3 flex justify-center sm:justify-start",
                                            children: e.jsxs(P, {
                                                variant: "ghost",
                                                size: "sm",
                                                className: "text-red-600 hover:text-red-700 text-xs sm:text-sm",
                                                onClick: () => a(l.partId),
                                                children: [e.jsx(tl, {
                                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                }), "Eliminar"]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, l.id))
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-1",
                    children: e.jsxs($, {
                        className: "sticky top-8",
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Resumen del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [(() => {
                                const l = r,
                                    c = l / (1 + gp),
                                    d = l - c;
                                return e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("span", {
                                            children: ["Subtotal (", s, " ", s === 1 ? "artículo" : "artículos", ")"]
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: bt(c, !1)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "IVA (21%)"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: bt(d, !1)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Envío"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-gray-600 font-medium",
                                            children: "*Coste de envío calculado en el checkout"
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })
                            })(), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between text-lg font-bold",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Total"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: bt(r, !1)
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-3 pt-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                    className: "w-full",
                                    size: "lg",
                                    onClick: () => o("/checkout"),
                                    children: [e.jsx(ds, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2"
                                    }), "Finalizar compra"]
                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    className: "w-full",
                                    onClick: () => o("/parts"),
                                    children: "Continuar comprando"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-xs text-gray-500 pt-4 space-y-1",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    children: "• Coste de envío calculado en el checkout"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    children: "• Garantía de calidad en todas las piezas"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    children: "• Soporte técnico especializado"
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    MW = {
        pagado: "Pagado",
        pendiente: "Pendiente"
    },
    RW = {
        pagado: "success",
        pendiente: "default"
    },
    IW = {
        pendiente_verificar: "Pendiente Verificar",
        verificado: "Verificado",
        embalado: "Embalado",
        enviado: "Enviado",
        incidencia: "Incidencia"
    },
    DW = {
        pendiente_verificar: "default",
        verificado: "primary",
        embalado: "secondary",
        enviado: "success",
        incidencia: "destructive"
    },
    OW = () => {

            [, r] = ft(),

                queryKey: ["/api/orders"],

            });

                    })

                    })
                })]

                        children: "Reintentar"
                    })]
                })
            })]
        }) : !n || n.length === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-6",

            }), e.jsx($, {

                        className: "h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mb-4"
                    }), e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-xl font-semibold mb-2",

        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "container max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",

    T1 = {
        pending: {

            icon: e.jsx(Xs, {
