            }),
            color: "bg-purple-200 text-purple-800"
        },
        delivered: {
            label: "Entregado",
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido entregado con éxito.",
            icon: e.jsx(Dt, {
                className: "h-6 w-6"
            }),
            color: "bg-green-200 text-green-800"
        },
        cancelled: {
            label: "Cancelado",
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido cancelado.",
            icon: e.jsx(Qs, {
                className: "h-6 w-6"
            }),
            color: "bg-red-200 text-red-800"
        }
    },
    LW = () => {
        const {user: t, isLoading: s} = Es(),
            r = Ju(),
            [, n] = ft(),
            a = parseInt(r.id),
            {data: i, isLoading: o, error: l} = Pe({
                queryKey: [`/api/orders/${a}`],
                enabled: !!(t != null && t.id) && !isNaN(a)
            });
        if (s)
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsx(ri, {
                    className: "h-10 w-48 mb-6"
                }), e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ri, {
                            className: "h-7 w-36"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsx(ri, {
                            className: "h-64 w-full"
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            });
        if (!t)
            return e.jsx("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "text-center py-10",
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-4",
                        children: "Acceso no autorizado"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                        children: "Debes iniciar sesión para ver los detalles de tu pedido."
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        onClick: () => n("/login"),
                        children: "Iniciar Sesión"
                    })]
                })
            });
        if (o)
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center mb-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => n("/pedidos"),
                        className: "mr-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(yr, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                        }), " Volver"]
                    }), e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                        children: "Detalles del Pedido"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    className: "mb-6",
                    children: e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: e.jsx(ri, {
                            className: "h-64 w-full"
                        })
                    })
                })]
            });
        if (l || !i)
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center mb-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => n("/pedidos"),
                        className: "mr-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(yr, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                        }), " Volver"]
                    }), e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                        children: "Detalles del Pedido"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "flex flex-col items-center py-10",
                        children: [e.jsx(Qs, {
                            className: "h-12 w-12 text-red-500 mb-4"
                        }), e.jsx("h2", {
                            className: "text-xl font-semibold mb-2",
                            children: "Error al cargar el pedido"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                            children: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido. Por favor, intenta de nuevo más tarde."
                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            onClick: () => window.location.reload(),
                            children: "Reintentar"
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            });
        const c = T1[i.status] || T1.pending;
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex items-center mb-6",
                children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                    variant: "ghost",
                    size: "sm",
                    onClick: () => n("/pedidos"),
                    className: "mr-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(yr, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                    }), " Volver"]
                }), e.jsxs("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                    children: ["Pedido #", i.id]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(fp, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                            }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                className: "font-semibold",
                                children: "Fecha del Pedido"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: Gt(new Date(i.createdAt), "PPP", {
                                locale: Ds
                            })
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                            children: Gt(new Date(i.createdAt), "p", {
                                locale: Ds
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(Ot, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                            }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                className: "font-semibold",
                                children: "Total del Pedido"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                            children: bt(i.total, !1)
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                            children: "IVA incluido"
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(Xs, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                            }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                className: "font-semibold",
                                children: "Estado"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: `inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm ${c.color}`,
                            children: [c.icon, e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "ml-2 font-medium",
                                children: c.label
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2",
                            children: c.description
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6",
                children: [e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Información de Contacto"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "font-medium",
                            children: i.customerName
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.customerEmail
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.customerPhone
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Dirección de Envío"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.shippingAddress
                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                            children: [i.shippingCity, ", ", i.shippingPostalCode]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.shippingCountry
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), (i.transportAgency || i.expeditionNumber || i.adminObservations) && e.jsxs($, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(Xs, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                        }), "Información de Transporte"]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [i.transportAgency && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Agencia de transporte:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: i.transportAgency
                        })]
                    }), i.expeditionNumber && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Número de expedición:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900 font-mono",
                            children: i.expeditionNumber
                        })]
                    }), i.adminObservations && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Observaciones:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: i.adminObservations
                        })]
                    }), i.shippingCost && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Costo de envío:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: bt(i.shippingCost, !1)
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs($, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Artículos del Pedido"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: i.items && i.items.length > 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [i.items.map((d, u) => e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-start justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Ot, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                    }), e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold",
                                        children: d.partName
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-1 text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: [d.partFamily && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Familia:"
                                        }), " ", d.partFamily]
                                    }), d.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Referencia:"
                                        }), " ", d.partReference]
                                    }), (d.vehicleBrand || d.vehicleModel) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Vehículo:"
                                        }), d.vehicleBrand && ` ${d.vehicleBrand}`, d.vehicleModel && ` ${d.vehicleModel}`, d.vehicleYear && ` (${d.vehicleYear})`]
                                    }), d.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Versión:"
                                        }), " ", d.vehicleVersion]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: [bt(d.price, !1), " × ", d.quantity]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                    children: ["Total: ", bt((parseFloat(d.price) || 0) * d.quantity, !1)]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }, u)), e.jsx(wa, {
                            className: "my-4"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                children: "Total del Pedido:"
                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "text-lg font-bold",
                                children: bt(i.total, !1)
                            })]
                        })]
                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "text-center py-8 text-gray-500",
                        children: [e.jsx(Ot, {
                            className: "h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: "No se encontraron artículos en este pedido."
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), i.notes && e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Notas"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600",
                        children: i.notes
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    };
function FW({params: t}) {
    const {toast: s} = st(),
        [, r] = ft(),
        [n, a] = f.useState(null),
        [i, o] = f.useState(!0),
        [l, c] = f.useState("");
    f.useEffect(() => {
        d();
        const y = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        c(y.get("payment") || "")
    }, [t.orderId]);
    const d = async () => {
        try {
            const g = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("sessionId"),
                x = cy(),
                b = g || x;
            let j = `/api/orders/${t.orderId}`;
            b && (j += `?sessionId=${b}`);
            const h = await Me("GET", j);
            if (h.ok) {
                const v = await h.json();
                a(v)
            } else
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cargar la información del pedido",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
        } catch (y) {
            console.error("Error loading order:", y),
            s({
                title: "Error",
                description: "No se pudo cargar la información del pedido",
                variant: "destructive"
            })
        } finally {
            o(!1)
        }
    };
    if (i)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "text-center",
                children: "Cargando información del pedido..."
            })
        });
    if (!n)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: e.jsx($, {
                children: e.jsxs(V, {
                    className: "p-8 text-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                        children: "Pedido no encontrado"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                        children: "No se pudo encontrar el pedido solicitado"
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        onClick: () => r("/"),
                        children: "Volver al inicio"
                    })]
                })
            })
        });
    const u = y => new Date(y).toLocaleDateString("es-ES", {
            year: "numeric",
            month: "long",
            day: "numeric",
            hour: "2-digit",
            minute: "2-digit"
        }),
        m = () => {
            var y;
            if ((y = n.shippingMethod) != null && y.estimatedDays) {
                const g = new Date;
                return g.setDate(g.getDate() + n.shippingMethod.estimatedDays), g.toLocaleDateString("es-ES", {
                    year: "numeric",
                    month: "long",
                    day: "numeric"
                })
            }
            return "Por determinar"
        },
        p = y => ({
            stripe: "Tarjeta de Crédito/Débito",
            paypal: "PayPal",
            bank_transfer: "Transferencia Bancaria",
            redsys: "Tarjeta (Redsys)",
            cash: "Pago en Efectivo",
            cash_on_delivery: "Pago contra reembolso"
        })[y] || y;
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "max-w-4xl mx-auto",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center mb-8",
                children: [e.jsx(Dt, {
                    className: "w-16 h-16 text-green-600 mx-auto mb-4"
                }), e.jsx("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold text-green-600 mb-2",
                    children: "¡Pedido confirmado!"
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600",
                    children: ["Tu pedido #", n.orderNumber, " ha sido procesado correctamente"]
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2",
                    children: ["Realizado el ", u(n.createdAt)]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-2 space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Productos del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: n.items && n.items.length > 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: n.items.map(y => e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "border-b pb-4",
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex-1",
                                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: y.partName
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1 mt-2",
                                                children: [y.partFamily && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Familia: ", y.partFamily]
                                                }), y.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Referencia: ", y.partReference]
                                                }), (y.vehicleBrand || y.vehicleModel) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Vehículo:", y.vehicleBrand && ` ${y.vehicleBrand}`, y.vehicleModel && ` ${y.vehicleModel}`, y.vehicleYear && ` (${y.vehicleYear})`]
                                                }), y.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Versión: ", y.vehicleVersion]
                                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Cantidad: ", y.quantity]
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "text-right",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: [parseFloat(y.price).toFixed(2), " € × ", y.quantity]
                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                children: ["Total: ", (parseFloat(y.price) * y.quantity).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }, y.id))
                            }) : e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-600",
                                children: "No se encontraron productos en este pedido"
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Xr, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Información del cliente"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: n.customerName
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: n.customerEmail
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: n.customerPhone
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(oo, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Dirección de envío"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: n.shippingAddress
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: [n.shippingCity, ", ", n.shippingPostalCode]
                                })]
                            }), n.shippingMethod && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "mt-4 p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Xs, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 text-blue-600"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium text-blue-600",
                                        children: n.shippingMethod.name
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: n.shippingMethod.description
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-blue-600 font-medium",
                                    children: ["Entrega estimada: ", m()]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(ds, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Información de pago"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: n.paymentMethod && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                                    children: [n.paymentMethod.provider === "bank_transfer" && e.jsx(cf, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-green-600"
                                    }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "stripe" && e.jsx(ds, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                                    }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "paypal" && e.jsx(ds, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-yellow-600"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: p(n.paymentMethod.provider)
                                        }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "text-xs mt-1",
                                            children: n.paymentStatus === "pending" ? "Pendiente" : n.paymentStatus === "paid" ? "Pagado" : n.paymentStatus === "failed" ? "Fallido" : "Pendiente"
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "bank_transfer" && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-3",
                                        children: "Datos para transferencia bancaria"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2 text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Banco:"
                                            }), " ", n.paymentMethod.config.bank_name]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Número de cuenta:"
                                            }), " ", n.paymentMethod.config.account_number]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Concepto:"
                                            }), " Pedido #", n.orderNumber]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Importe:"
                                            }), " ", parseFloat(n.total).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-blue-100 rounded border border-blue-300",
                                        children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-blue-700",
                                            children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                children: "Importante:"
                                            }), " Una vez realizada la transferencia, tu pedido será procesado. Guarda el justificante de la transferencia como comprobante."]
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "stripe" && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "bg-green-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-green-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold text-green-800 mb-3",
                                        children: "Pago con tarjeta"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2 text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-green-700",
                                            children: "Tu pedido ha sido creado correctamente. El pago se procesará de forma segura."
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-green-100 rounded border border-green-300",
                                            children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-green-700",
                                                children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                    children: "Nota:"
                                                }), " Recibirás un email de confirmación una vez procesado el pago."]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "paypal" && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "bg-yellow-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-yellow-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold text-yellow-800 mb-3",
                                        children: "Pago con PayPal"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2 text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-yellow-700",
                                            children: "Tu pedido ha sido creado correctamente. El pago se procesará a través de PayPal."
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-yellow-100 rounded border border-yellow-300",
                                            children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-yellow-700",
                                                children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                    children: "Nota:"
                                                }), " Recibirás un email de confirmación una vez procesado el pago."]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), n.notes && e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Notas del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-700 whitespace-pre-wrap",
                                children: n.notes
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Resumen del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Subtotal"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [parseFloat(n.subtotal).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Envío"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [parseFloat(n.shippingCost).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between font-semibold text-lg",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Total"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [parseFloat(n.total).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Estado del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-green-500 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm",
                                    children: "Pedido confirmado"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-yellow-500 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm",
                                    children: "En proceso"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-gray-300 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                    children: "Enviado"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-gray-300 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                    children: "Entregado"
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-3",
                        children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                            onClick: () => r("/"),
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "w-full",
                            children: [e.jsx(yr, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                            }), "Volver al catálogo"]
                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            onClick: () => window.print(),
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "w-full",
                            children: "Imprimir pedido"
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    })
}
const zW = Te.object({
        identifier: Te.string().min(3, "Ingresa un email o nombre de usuario válido"),
        password: Te.string().min(6, "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres")
    }),
    $W = () => {
        const {login: t, isLoading: s} = Es();
        ft();
        const r = cn({
                resolver: Cn(zW),
                defaultValues: {
                    identifier: "",
                    password: ""
                }
            }),
            n = async a => {
                try {
                    if (!a.identifier || !a.password) {
                        r.setError("identifier", {
                            message: "Usuario y contraseña son requeridos"
                        }),
                        r.setError("password", {
                            message: "Usuario y contraseña son requeridos"
                        });
                        return
                    }
                    const i = await t(a.identifier, a.password);
                    i.success || (r.setError("identifier", {
                        message: i.message || "Usuario o contraseña incorrectos"
                    }), r.setError("password", {
                        message: i.message || "Usuario o contraseña incorrectos"
                    }))
                } catch (i) {
                    console.error("Error en el formulario de login:", i),
                    r.setError("identifier", {
                        message: "Error de conexión. Intente nuevamente."
                    }),
                    r.setError("password", {
                        message: "Error de conexión. Intente nuevamente."
                    })
                }
            };
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-12 max-w-md",
            children: e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                    className: "space-y-1",
                    children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold text-center",
                        children: "Iniciar Sesión"
                    }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                        className: "text-center",
                        children: "Ingresa tus credenciales para acceder a tu cuenta"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsx(kn, {
                        ...r,
                        children: e.jsxs("form", {
                            onSubmit: r.handleSubmit(n),
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(Je, {
                                control: r.control,
                                name: "identifier",
                                render: ({field: a}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                        children: "Email o nombre de usuario"
                                    }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                        children: e.jsx(J, {
                                            placeholder: "email@ejemplo.com o usuario",
                                            ...a
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                control: r.control,
                                name: "password",
                                render: ({field: a}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                        children: "Contraseña"
                                    }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                        children: e.jsx(J, {
                                            type: "password",
                                            placeholder: "••••••••",
                                            ...a
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(P, {
                                type: "submit",
                                className: "w-full",
                                disabled: s,
                                children: s ? "Iniciando sesión..." : "Iniciar Sesión"
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(ka, {
                    className: "flex flex-col gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "text-center text-sm",
                        children: ["¿No tienes una cuenta?", " ", e.jsx(Re, {
                            href: "/register",
                            className: "text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800",
                            children: "Regístrate aquí"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "text-center text-sm",
                        children: e.jsx(Re, {
                            href: "/checkout",
                            className: "text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800",
                            children: "Continuar como invitado"
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })
        })
    },
    VW = Te.object({
        username: Te.string().min(3, "El nombre de usuario debe tener al menos 3 caracteres"),
        email: Te.string().email("Ingresa un email válido"),
        password: Te.string().min(6, "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres"),
        confirmPassword: Te.string(),
        firstName: Te.string().optional(),
        lastName: Te.string().optional()
    }).refine(t => t.password === t.confirmPassword, {
        message: "Las contraseñas no coinciden",
        path: ["confirmPassword"]
    }),
    UW = () => {
        const {register: t, isLoading: s} = Es(),
            [, r] = ft(),
            {toast: n} = st(),
            a = cn({
                resolver: Cn(VW),
                defaultValues: {
                    username: "",
                    email: "",
                    password: "",
                    confirmPassword: "",
                    firstName: "",
                    lastName: ""
                }
            }),
            i = async o => {
                try {
                    const {confirmPassword: l, ...c} = o;
                    await t(c),
                    n({
                        title: "Registro exitoso",
                        description: "Tu cuenta ha sido creada correctamente. Puedes iniciar sesión ahora."
                    }),
                    r("/login")
                } catch (l) {
                    console.error("Error en el formulario de registro:", l)
                }
            };
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8 max-w-md",
            children: e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                    className: "space-y-1",
                    children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold text-center",
                        children: "Crear Cuenta"
                    }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                        className: "text-center",
                        children: "Ingresa tus datos para registrarte en la plataforma"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsx(kn, {
                        ...a,
                        children: e.jsxs("form", {
                            onSubmit: a.handleSubmit(i),
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(Je, {
                                control: a.control,
                                name: "username",
                                render: ({field: o}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                        children: "Nombre de Usuario"
                                    }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                        children: e.jsx(J, {
                                            placeholder: "usuario123",
                                            ...o
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                control: a.control,
                                name: "email",
                                render: ({field: o}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                        children: "Email"
                                    }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                        children: e.jsx(J, {
                                            placeholder: "tucorreo@ejemplo.com",
                                            ...o
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(Je, {
                                    control: a.control,
                                    name: "firstName",
                                    render: ({field: o}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                        children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                            children: "Nombre"
                                        }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                            children: e.jsx(J, {
                                                placeholder: "Juan",
                                                ...o
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(Je, {
                                    control: a.control,
                                    name: "lastName",
                                    render: ({field: o}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                        children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                            children: "Apellido"
                                        }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                            children: e.jsx(J, {
                                                placeholder: "Pérez",
                                                ...o
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(rt, {})]
                                    })
                                })]

    this.message = t,
    this.name = "AxiosError",
    s && (this.code = s),
    r && (this.config = r),
    n && (this.request = n),
    a && (this.response = a, this.status = a.status ? a.status : null)
}

    toJSON: function() {
        return {

function tx(t, s, r) {
    if (!ce.isObject(t))
        throw new TypeError("target must be an object");
    s = s || new FormData,
    r = ce.toFlatObject(r, {
        metaTokens: !0,
        dots: !1,
        indexes: !1
    }, !1, function(x, b) {
        return !ce.isUndefined(b[x])
    });
    const n = r.metaTokens,
        a = r.visitor || u,
        i = r.dots,
        o = r.indexes,
        c = (r.Blob || typeof Blob < "u" && Blob) && ce.isSpecCompliantForm(s);
    if (!ce.isFunction(a))
        throw new TypeError("visitor must be a function");
    function d(g) {
        if (g === null)
            return "";
        if (ce.isDate(g))
            return g.toISOString();
        if (!c && ce.isBlob(g))
            throw new ut("Blob is not supported. Use a Buffer instead.");
        return ce.isArrayBuffer(g) || ce.isTypedArray(g) ? c && typeof Blob == "function" ? new Blob([g]) : Buffer.from(g) : g
    }
    function u(g, x, b) {
        let j = g;

            if (ce.endsWith(x, "{}"))
                x = n ? x : x.slice(0, -2),
                g = JSON.stringify(g);
            else if (ce.isArray(g) && IG(g) || (ce.isFileList(g) || ce.endsWith(x, "[]")) && (j = ce.toArray(g)))

                    !(ce.isUndefined(v) || v === null) && s.append(o === !0 ? M1([x], N, i) : o === null ? x : x + "[]", d(v))
                }), !1
        }
        return uy(g) ? !0 : (s.append(M1(b, x, i), d(g)), !1)
    }
    const m = [],
        p = Object.assign(DG, {
            defaultVisitor: u,
            convertValue: d,
            isVisitable: uy
        });
    function y(g, x) {
        if (!ce.isUndefined(g)) {
            if (m.indexOf(g) !== -1)
                throw Error("Circular reference detected in " + x.join("."));
            m.push(g),
            ce.forEach(g, function(j, h) {

            }),
            m.pop()
        }
    }
    if (!ce.isObject(t))
        throw new TypeError("data must be an object");
    return y(t), s
}
function R1(t) {
    const s = {
        "!": "%21",
        "'": "%27",
        "(": "%28",
        ")": "%29",
        "~": "%7E",
        "%20": "+",
        "%00": "\0"
    };
    return encodeURIComponent(t).replace(/[!'()~]|%20|%00/g, function(n) {
        return s[n]
    })
}

class Hr {

    }

                throw new Error("header name must be a non-empty string");

    }

function rK(t, s) {

function jK(t, s, r) {

class Yo {
    constructor(s)
    {
        this.defaults = s || {},
        this.interceptors = {
            request: new I1,
            response: new I1
        }
    }
    async request(s, r)
    {
        try {
            return await this._request(s, r)
        } catch (n) {
            if (n instanceof Error) {
                let a = {};
                Error.captureStackTrace ? Error.captureStackTrace(a) : a = new Error;
                const i = a.stack ? a.stack.replace(/^.+\n/, "") : "";
                try {
                    n.stack ? i && !String(n.stack).endsWith(i.replace(/^.+\n.+\n/, "")) && (n.stack += `
`
                    + i) : n.stack = i
                } catch {}
            }
            throw n
        }
    }
    _request(s, r)
    {
        typeof s == "string" ? (r = r || {}, r.url = s) : r = s || {},
        r = ml(this.defaults, r);
        const {transitional: n, paramsSerializer: a, headers: i} = r;
        n !== void 0 && Rh.assertOptions(n, {
            silentJSONParsing: aa.transitional(aa.boolean),
            forcedJSONParsing: aa.transitional(aa.boolean),
            clarifyTimeoutError: aa.transitional(aa.boolean)
        }, !1),
        a != null && (ce.isFunction(a) ? r.paramsSerializer = {
            serialize: a
        } : Rh.assertOptions(a, {
            encode: aa.function,
            serialize: aa.function
        }, !0)),
        r.allowAbsoluteUrls !== void 0 || (this.defaults.allowAbsoluteUrls !== void 0 ? r.allowAbsoluteUrls = this.defaults.allowAbsoluteUrls : r.allowAbsoluteUrls = !0),
        Rh.assertOptions(r, {
            baseUrl: aa.spelling("baseURL"),
            withXsrfToken: aa.spelling("withXSRFToken")
        }, !0),
        r.method = (r.method || this.defaults.method || "get").toLowerCase();
        let o = i && ce.merge(i.common, i[r.method]);
        i && ce.forEach(["delete", "get", "head", "post", "put", "patch", "common"], g => {
            delete i[g]
        }),
        r.headers = Hr.concat(o, i);
        const l = [];
        let c = !0;
        this.interceptors.request.forEach(function(x) {
            typeof x.runWhen == "function" && x.runWhen(r) === !1 || (c = c && x.synchronous, l.unshift(x.fulfilled, x.rejected))
        });
        const d = [];
        this.interceptors.response.forEach(function(x) {
            d.push(x.fulfilled, x.rejected)
        });
        let u,
            m = 0,
            p;
        if (!c) {
            const g = [U1.bind(this), void 0];
            for (g.unshift.apply(g, l), g.push.apply(g, d), p = g.length, u = Promise.resolve(r); m < p;)
                u = u.then(g[m++], g[m++]);
            return u
        }
        p = l.length;
        let y = r;
        for (m = 0; m < p;) {
            const g = l[m++],
                x = l[m++];
            try {
                y = g(y)
            } catch (b) {
                x.call(this, b);
                break
            }
        }
        try {
            u = U1.call(this, y)
        } catch (g) {
            return Promise.reject(g)
        }
        for (m = 0, p = d.length; m < p;)
            u = u.then(d[m++], d[m++]);
        return u
    }
    getUri(s)
    {
        s = ml(this.defaults, s);
        const r = yM(s.baseURL, s.url, s.allowAbsoluteUrls);
        return fM(r, s.params, s.paramsSerializer)
    }
}

class fb {
    constructor(s)
    {
        if (typeof s != "function")
            throw new TypeError("executor must be a function.");
        let r;
        this.promise = new Promise(function(i) {
            r = i
        });
        const n = this;
        this.promise.then(a => {
            if (!n._listeners)
                return;
            let i = n._listeners.length;
            for (; i-- > 0;)
                n._listeners[i](a);
            n._listeners = null
        }),
        this.promise.then = a => {
            let i;
            const o = new Promise(l => {
                n.subscribe(l),
                i = l
            }).then(a);
            return o.cancel = function() {
                n.unsubscribe(i)
            }, o
        },
        s(function(i, o, l) {
            n.reason || (n.reason = new rd(i, o, l), r(n.reason))
        })
    }
    throwIfRequested()
    {
        if (this.reason)
            throw this.reason
    }
    subscribe(s)
    {
        if (this.reason) {
            s(this.reason);
            return
        }
        this._listeners ? this._listeners.push(s) : this._listeners = [s]
    }
    unsubscribe(s)
    {
        if (!this._listeners)
            return;
        const r = this._listeners.indexOf(s);
        r !== -1 && this._listeners.splice(r, 1)
    }
    toAbortSignal()
    {
        const s = new AbortController,
            r = n => {
                s.abort(n)
            };
        return this.subscribe(r), s.signal.unsubscribe = () => this.unsubscribe(r), s.signal
    }
    static source()
    {
        let s;
        return {
            token: new fb(function(a) {
                s = a
            }),
            cancel: s
        }
    }
}
function bK(t) {
    return function(r) {
        return t.apply(null, r)
    }
}
function NK(t) {
    return ce.isObject(t) && t.isAxiosError === !0
}

    py[s] = t

function SM(t) {
    const s = new Yo(t),
        r = sM(Yo.prototype.request, s);
    return ce.extend(r, Yo.prototype, s, {
        allOwnKeys: !0
    }), ce.extend(r, s, null, {
        allOwnKeys: !0
    }), r.create = function(a) {
        return SM(ml(t, a))
    }, r
}

    return Promise.all(s)

                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                                        }), " ", v.id]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                                            children: "Marca:"
                                                        }), " ", v.marca]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Modelo:"
                                                        }), " ", v.modelo]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Versión:"
                                                        }), " ", v.version]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Año:"
                                                        }), " ", v.anyo]
                                                    })]
                                                }, v.id))
                                            })]
                                        }), !i.success && e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "mt-2",
                                            children: "No se encontraron vehículos compatibles con la pieza proporcionada."
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm font-semibold mb-1",
                                            children: "Datos de respuesta completos:"
                                        }), e.jsx("pre", {
                                            className: "p-2 bg-gray-100 rounded-md overflow-auto text-xs",
                                            children: JSON.stringify(i, null, 2)
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-center items-center h-48 text-gray-400",
                                    children: "Aquí se mostrarán los vehículos compatibles"
                                })
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function wK() {
    const [t, s] = f.useState(null),
        [r, n] = f.useState(!0);
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        (async () => {
            try {
                console.log("TEST: Cargando módulos de pago...");
                const i = await fetch("/api/admin/payment-modules");
                console.log("TEST: Response status:", i.status),
                console.log("TEST: Response ok:", i.ok);
                const o = await i.json();
                console.log("TEST: Data received:", o),
                console.log("TEST: Data type:", typeof o),
                console.log("TEST: Is array?", Array.isArray(o)),
                Array.isArray(o) && (console.log("TEST: Data length:", o.length), console.log("TEST: First module:", o[0])),
                s(o),
                n(!1)
            } catch (i) {
                console.error("TEST: Error:", i),
                s({
                    error: i.message
                }),
                n(!1)
            }
        })()
    }, []), r ? e.jsxs("div", {
        style: {
            padding: "20px"
        },
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            children: "Test Payment Modules"
        }), e.jsx("p", {
            children: "Loading..."
        })]
    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
        style: {
            padding: "20px"
        },
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            children: "Test Payment Modules"
        }), t && t.error ? e.jsxs("div", {
            style: {
                color: "red"
            },
            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                children: "Error!"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                children: t.error
            })]
        }) : Array.isArray(t) ? e.jsxs("div", {
            style: {
                color: "green"
            },
            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                children: "Success!"
            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                children: ["Modules loaded: ", t.length]
            }), e.jsx("pre", {
                style: {
                    background: "#f0f0f0",
                    padding: "10px",
                    overflow: "auto"
                },
                children: JSON.stringify(t, null, 2)
            })]
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            style: {
                color: "orange"
            },
            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                children: "Unexpected data type"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                children: "Data is not an array"
            }), e.jsx("pre", {
                style: {
                    background: "#f0f0f0",
                    padding: "10px",
                    overflow: "auto"
                },
                children: JSON.stringify(t, null, 2)
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function CK() {
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen w-full flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsx($, {
            className: "w-full max-w-md mx-4",
            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "pt-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex mb-4 gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(Gs, {
                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-red-500"
                    }), e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                        children: "404 Page Not Found"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "mt-4 text-sm text-gray-600",
                    children: "Did you forget to add the page to the router?"
                })]
            })
        })
    })
}
function Pt({path: t, component: s}) {
    const {user: r, isLoading: n} = Es();
    return n ? e.jsx(yt, {
        path: t,
        children: () => e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",
            children: e.jsx(Qt, {
                className: "h-8 w-8 animate-spin text-border"
            })
        })
    }) : r ? e.jsx(yt, {
        path: t,
        component: s
    }) : e.jsx(yt, {
        path: t,
        children: () => e.jsx(WS, {
            to: "/login"
        })
    })
}
const SK = () => {
        const {toast: t} = st(),
            [s, r] = f.useState(!1),
            [n, a] = f.useState(!1),
            {data: i, isLoading: o, refetch: l} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/google-merchant/stats"],
                queryFn: () => fetch("/api/google-merchant/stats").then(y => y.json())
            }),
            c = async () => {
                try {
                    r(!0),
                    t({
                        title: "Generando feed",
                        description: "Creando archivo XML para Google Merchant Center..."
                    });
                    const y = await fetch("/api/google-merchant/feed.xml");
                    if (!y.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al generar el feed");
                    const g = await y.blob(),
                        x = window.URL.createObjectURL(g),
                        b = document.createElement("a");
                    b.href = x,
                    b.download = `google-merchant-feed-${new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0]}.xml`,
                    document.body.appendChild(b),
                    b.click(),
                    document.body.removeChild(b),
                    window.URL.revokeObjectURL(x),
                    t({
                        title: "Feed descargado",
                        description: "El archivo XML se ha descargado correctamente"
                    })
                } catch (y) {
                    console.error("Error al descargar feed:", y),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo descargar el feed XML",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    r(!1)
                }
            },
            d = async () => {
                try {
                    const y = await fetch("/api/google-merchant/preview");
                    if (!y.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al generar vista previa");
                    const g = await y.text(),
                        x = window.open();
                    x && (x.document.write(`
          <html>
            <head>
              <title>Vista previa - Google Merchant Feed</title>
              <style>
                body { font-family: monospace; padding: 20px; }
                pre { white-space: pre-wrap; background: #f5f5f5; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; }
              </style>
            </head>
            <body>
              <h2>Vista previa del Feed XML (primeros 10 productos)</h2>
              <pre>${









                    g.replace(/</g, "&lt;").replace(/>/g, "&gt;")}</pre>
            </body>
          </html>
        `


                    ), x.document.close())
                } catch (y) {
                    console.error("Error al mostrar vista previa:", y),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo mostrar la vista previa",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            u = () => {
                const y = `${window.location.origin}/api/google-merchant/feed.xml`;
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(y),
                a(!0),
                t({
                    title: "URL copiada",
                    description: "La URL del feed se ha copiado al portapapeles"
                }),
                setTimeout(() => a(!1), 2e3)
            },
            m = `${window.location.origin}/api/google-merchant/feed.xml`,
            p = i == null ? void 0 : i.data;
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "min-h-screen bg-gray-50",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "text-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-4xl font-montserrat font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4",
                        children: "Google Merchant Center"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-xl text-gray-600 max-w-3xl mx-auto",
                        children: "Sincroniza automáticamente tu inventario de piezas de recambio con Google Shopping"
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "max-w-6xl mx-auto space-y-6",
                    children: [p && e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Pj, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), "Estadísticas del Feed"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {

                                            className: "h-8 w-8 text-blue-600"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-3xl font-bold text-blue-600 mb-1",
                                        children: p.totalParts.toLocaleString()
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {

                                        children: "Total Piezas"
                                    })]
