    },
    EK = ({importHistory: t, onControlImport: s, onDeleteAllHistory: r}) => {
        const n = c => {
                switch (c) {
                case "completed":
                    return e.jsx(Dt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(Sa, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                    });
                case "in_progress":
                case "processing":
                case "running":
                    return e.jsx(xt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500 animate-spin"
                    });
                case "paused":
                    return e.jsx(vv, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(Qs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                    })
                }
            },
            a = c => {
                const d = {
                    completed: "default",
                    failed: "destructive",
                    in_progress: "secondary",
                    processing: "secondary",
                    running: "secondary",
                    paused: "outline"
                };
                return e.jsxs(ve, {
                    variant: d[c] || "outline",
                    className: "flex items-center gap-1",
                    children: [n(c), c]
                })
            },
            i = c => {
                switch (c) {
                case "vehicles":
                    return "Vehículos";
                case "parts":
                    return "Piezas";
                case "all":
                    return "Todo";
                default:
                    return c
                }
            },
            o = t.filter(c => c.status === "in_progress" || c.status === "processing" || c.status === "running"),
            l = t.filter(c => c.status === "completed" || c.status === "failed" || c.status === "paused");
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [o.length > 0 && e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5 animate-spin"
                        }), "Importaciones en Curso (", o.length, ")"]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: o.map(c => e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "p-4 border rounded-lg space-y-3",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: [i(c.type), " - ", c.isFullImport ? "Completa" : "Incremental"]
                                    }), a(c.status)]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: ["Iniciada: ", Gt(new Date(c.startTime), "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm", {
                                        locale: Ds
                                    })]
                                }), c.processingItem && e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-blue-600",
                                    children: c.processingItem
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-1",
                                children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => s(c.id, "pause"),
                                    children: e.jsx(vv, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "destructive",
                                    onClick: () => s(c.id, "cancel"),
                                    children: e.jsx(N5, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), c.progress !== void 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between text-sm",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Progreso"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [Math.round(c.progress), "%"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx($f, {
                                value: c.progress,
                                className: "h-2"
                            })]
                        }), c.processedItems !== void 0 && c.totalItems !== void 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 text-sm",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Procesados:"
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: [c.processedItems, "/", c.totalItems]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Nuevos:"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-green-600",
                                    children: c.newItems || 0
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Actualizados:"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-blue-600",
                                    children: c.updatedItems || 0
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }, c.id))
                })]
            }), e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Historial de Importaciones"
                        }), r && l.length > 0 && e.jsxs(P, {
                            size: "sm",
                            variant: "destructive",
                            onClick: r,
                            children: [e.jsx(Xt, {
                                className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1"
                            }), "Eliminar Todo"]
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: l.length === 0 ? e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground text-center py-4",
                        children: "No hay importaciones completadas"
                    }) : l.map(c => e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "p-4 border rounded-lg",
                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: [i(c.type), " - ", c.isFullImport ? "Completa" : "Incremental"]
                                    }), a(c.status)]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: [Gt(new Date(c.startTime), "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm", {
                                        locale: Ds
                                    }), c.endTime && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                        children: [" - ", Gt(new Date(c.endTime), "HH:mm", {
                                            locale: Ds
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), (c.newItems !== void 0 || c.updatedItems !== void 0) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-4 text-sm",
                                    children: [c.newItems !== void 0 && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "text-green-600",
                                        children: ["+", c.newItems, " nuevos"]
                                    }), c.updatedItems !== void 0 && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "text-blue-600",
                                        children: ["~", c.updatedItems, " actualizados"]
                                    })]
                                }), c.errors && c.errors.length > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600",
                                    children: [c.errors.length, " error(es)"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-1",
                                children: [c.status === "paused" && e.jsx(P, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => s(c.id, "resume"),
                                    children: e.jsx(v5, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "ghost",
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        console.log("Intentando eliminar importación:", c.id, c),
                                        c.id ? s(c.id, "delete") : console.error("ID de importación no encontrado:", c)
                                    },
                                    className: "text-red-600 hover:text-red-700",
                                    children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    }, c.id))
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    kK = () => {
        const [, t] = ft(),
            {toast: s} = st(),
            {user: r, logout: n} = Es(),
            [a, i] = f.useState({
                vehiclesIncremental: !1,
                vehiclesComplete: !1,
                partsIncremental: !1,
                partsComplete: !1,
                allComplete: !1,
                allIncremental: !1,
                updateCounters: !1
            }),
            [o, l] = f.useState([]),
            [c, d] = f.useState({
                type: "vehicles",
                frequency: "12h",
                active: !0,
                isFullImport: !1,
                days: ["monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"]
            }),
            [u, m] = f.useState(null),
            [p, y] = f.useState({
                fromDate: void 0,
                fullImport: !1,
                batchSize: 1e3,
                autoRecovery: !0
            }),
            [g, x] = f.useState([]),
            [b, j] = f.useState(!0),
            [h, v] = f.useState(!0),
            [N, w] = f.useState("import");
        f.useState(!1),
        f.useState(null);
        const {data: C, isLoading: S, refetch: _} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/history"],
                queryFn: () => ts.getHistory(20),
                refetchInterval: h ? 5e3 : !1
            }),
            {data: T, isLoading: B, refetch: z} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/schedule"],
                queryFn: () => ts.getSchedules(),
                refetchInterval: h ? 1e4 : !1
            }),
            {data: A, refetch: O, error: H} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/stats"],
                queryFn: () => ts.getImportStats(),
                refetchInterval: h ? 3e4 : !1,
                retry: 3,
                retryDelay: G => Math.min(1e3 * 2 ** G, 3e4)
            });
        f.useEffect(() => {
            T && l(T)
        }, [T]),
        f.useEffect(() => {
            if (!C)
                return;
            const G = C.some(se => se.status === "in_progress" || se.status === "processing");
            j(G),
            x(C.filter(se => se.status === "in_progress" || se.status === "processing"))
        }, [C]);
        const D = async () => {
                try {
                    await n(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al cerrar sesión:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo cerrar la sesión",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            R = async (G, se=!1) => {
                try {
                    const L = E(G, se);
                    i(ye => ({
                        ...ye,
                        [L]: !0
                    }));
                    const te = {
                        fromDate: !se && p.fromDate ? Gt(p.fromDate, "yyyy-MM-dd") : void 0,
                        fullImport: se,
                        batchSize: p.batchSize,
                        autoRecovery: p.autoRecovery
                    };
                    await ts.startOptimizedImport(G, te),
                    s({
                        title: "Importación iniciada",
                        description: `La importación ${se ? "completa" : "incremental"} de ${G === "vehicles" ? "vehículos" : G === "parts" ? "piezas" : "vehículos y piezas"} ha comenzado`
                    }),
                    w("monitor"),
                    _(),
                    O()
                } catch (L) {
                    console.error("Error al iniciar importación:", L),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo iniciar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const L = E(G, se);
                        i(te => ({
                            ...te,
                            [L]: !1
                        }))
                    }, 2e3)
                }
            },
            E = (G, se) => G === "vehicles" ? se ? "vehiclesComplete" : "vehiclesIncremental" : G === "parts" ? se ? "partsComplete" : "partsIncremental" : se ? "allComplete" : "allIncremental",
            I = async () => {
                try {
                    i(L => ({
                        ...L,
                        updateCounters: !0
                    }));
                    const G = await fetch("/api/import/update-vehicle-counters", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!G.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar contadores");
                    const se = await G.json();
                    s({
                        title: "Contadores actualizados",
                        description: "Los contadores de piezas en vehículos se han actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    O(),
                    _()
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar contadores:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron actualizar los contadores de piezas",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    i(G => ({
                        ...G,
                        updateCounters: !1
                    }))
                }
            },
            U = async () => {
                try {
                    await ts.createSchedule(c);
                    const G = c.isFullImport ? "completa" : "incremental";
                    s({
                        title: "Programación creada",
                        description: `Importación ${G} de ${c.type} programada cada ${c.frequency}`
                    }),
                    z(),
                    d({
                        type: "vehicles",
                        frequency: "12h",
                        active: !0,
                        isFullImport: !1,
                        days: ["monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"]
                    })
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al programar importación:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo programar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            ie = async (G, se) => {
                try {
                    await ts.updateScheduleConfig(G, se),
                    s({
                        title: "Programación actualizada",
                        description: "La programación ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                    }),
                    z(),
                    m(null)
                } catch (L) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar programación:", L),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            F = G => {
                m(G)
            },
            M = () => {
                m(null)
            },
            Q = async (G, se) => {
                try {
                    if (console.log(`Ejecutando acción ${se} para importación ID: ${G}`), se === "pause")
                        await ts.pauseImportOperation(G);
                    else if (se === "resume")
                        await ts.resumeImportOperation(G);
                    else if (se === "cancel")
                        await ts.cancelImportOperation(G);
                    else if (se === "delete") {
                        const te = await ts.deleteImportFromHistory(G);
                        console.log("Resultado de eliminación:", te)
                    }
                    const L = {
                        pause: "pausada",
                        resume: "reanudada",
                        cancel: "cancelada",
                        delete: "eliminada"
                    }[se];
                    s({
                        title: "Importación " + L,
                        description: `La importación ha sido ${L} correctamente`
                    }),
                    _()
                } catch (L) {
                    console.error(`Error al ${se} importación:`, L),
                    console.error("Error details:", L),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: L instanceof Error ? L.message : `No se pudo ${se} la importación`,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            le = async () => {
                try {
                    await ts.deleteAllImportHistory(),
                    s({
                        title: "Historial eliminado",
                        description: "Todo el historial de importaciones ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    _(),
                    O()
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al eliminar historial:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el historial de importaciones",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            we = async () => {
                try {
                    await ts.clearImportStatistics(),
                    s({
                        title: "Estadísticas limpiadas",
                        description: "Las estadísticas de importación han sido reiniciadas"
                    }),
                    O()
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al limpiar estadísticas:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron limpiar las estadísticas",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            Se = async (G, se) => {
                try {
                    await ts.updateScheduleConfig(G, {
                        active: se
                    }),
                    s({
                        title: se ? "Programación activada" : "Programación desactivada",
                        description: `La programación ha sido ${se ? "activada" : "desactivada"}`
                    }),
                    z()
                } catch (L) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar programación:", L),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            k = async G => {
                try {
                    await ts.deleteSchedule(G),
                    z(),
                    s({
                        title: "Programación eliminada",
                        description: "La programación ha sido eliminada correctamente"
                    })
                } catch (se) {
                    console.error("Error al eliminar programación:", se),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            ee = G => {
                switch (G) {
                case "completed":
                    return e.jsx(Dt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(Sa, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                    });
                case "in_progress":
                    return e.jsx(xt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500 animate-spin"
                    });
                case "paused":
                    return e.jsx(vv, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(Qs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                    })
                }
            };
        return B ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
            })
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Importación Optimizada"
                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: ["Sistema avanzado de importación y sincronización de datos", h && e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "ml-2 inline-flex items-center text-green-600 font-medium",
                                children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                                    className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1 animate-spin"
                                }), "Actualización automática activa"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: D,
                        children: [e.jsx(hi, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                        }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                    })]
                }), g.length > 0 && e.jsxs(br, {
                    className: "mb-6 border-blue-200 bg-blue-50",
                    children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                    }), e.jsxs(Nr, {
                        children: ["Hay ", g.length, " importación(es) en curso.", h ? " La página se actualiza automáticamente cada 5 segundos." : " Active la actualización automática en Configuración para monitoreo en tiempo real."]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(os, {
                    value: N,
                    onValueChange: w,
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(Jt, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                        children: [e.jsx($e, {
                            value: "import",
                            children: "Importación"
                        }), e.jsx($e, {
                            value: "schedule",
                            children: "Programación"
                        }), e.jsx($e, {
                            value: "monitor",

                        }), e.jsx($e, {
                            value: "config",
                            children: "Configuración"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                        value: "import",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6",
                            children: [e.jsx(B0, {}), e.jsx($0, {})]
                        }), e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {

                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), "Configuración de Importación"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            children: "Importar desde (fecha)"
                                        }), e.jsx(nb, {
                                            value: p.fromDate,
                                            onChange: G => y(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                fromDate: G
                                            }))
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            children: "Tamaño de lote"
                                        }), e.jsxs(We, {
                                            value: p.batchSize.toString(),
                                            onValueChange: G => y(se => ({
                                                ...se,

                                            })),

                                                children: e.jsx(Ge, {})

                                                    value: "500",

                                                })]

                                        id: "fullImport",
                                        checked: p.fullImport,
                                        onCheckedChange: G => y(se => ({
                                            ...se,
                                            fullImport: G
                                        }))
                                    }), e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "fullImport",
                                        children: "Importación completa (todos los datos)"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(wt, {
                                        id: "autoRecovery",
                                        checked: p.autoRecovery,

                                            ...se,
                                            autoRecovery: G
                                        }))
                                    }), e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "autoRecovery",
                                        children: "Recuperación automática de errores"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {

                                        }), "Vehículos"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: () => R("vehicles", !1),
                                            disabled: a.vehiclesIncremental || a.vehiclesComplete,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.vehiclesIncremental ? e.jsx(xt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ua, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: () => R("vehicles", !0),
                                            disabled: a.vehiclesIncremental || a.vehiclesComplete,
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.vehiclesComplete ? e.jsx(xt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ua, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]

                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ua, {

                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: () => R("parts", !0),

                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.partsComplete ? e.jsx(xt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ua, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]
                                    }), (A == null ? void 0 : A.parts) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",

                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Actualizadas: ", A.parts.updatedItems]
                                        })]

                                        }), "Todo"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: () => R("all", !1),
                                            disabled: a.allIncremental || a.allComplete,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.allIncremental ? e.jsx(xt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ua, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: () => R("all", !0),
                                            disabled: a.allIncremental || a.allComplete,
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.allComplete ? e.jsx(xt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ua, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {

                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Mantenimiento"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: e.jsxs(P, {
                                            onClick: I,
                                            disabled: a.updateCounters,
                                            variant: "secondary",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.updateCounters ? e.jsx(xt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"

                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                        value: "schedule",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(lr, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), "Nueva Programación"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            children: "Tipo de importación"
                                        }), e.jsxs(We, {
                                            value: c.type,
                                            onValueChange: G => d(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                type: G
                                            })),
                                            children: [e.jsx(qe, {
                                                children: e.jsx(Ge, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(Y, {
                                                    value: "vehicles",
                                                    children: "Vehículos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Y, {
                                                    value: "parts",
                                                    children: "Piezas"

const {entries: EM, setPrototypeOf: H1, isFrozen: PK, getPrototypeOf: _K, getOwnPropertyDescriptor: TK} = Object;
let {freeze: kr, seal: Pn, create: kM} = Object,
    {apply: xy, construct: gy} = typeof Reflect < "u" && Reflect;
kr || (kr = function(s) {
    return s
});
Pn || (Pn = function(s) {
    return s
});
xy || (xy = function(s, r, n) {
    return s.apply(r, n)
});
gy || (gy = function(s, r) {
    return new s(...r)
});
const nh = Pr(Array.prototype.forEach),
    AK = Pr(Array.prototype.lastIndexOf),
    W1 = Pr(Array.prototype.pop),
    yd = Pr(Array.prototype.push),
    MK = Pr(Array.prototype.splice),
    Ih = Pr(String.prototype.toLowerCase),
    hg = Pr(String.prototype.toString),
    G1 = Pr(String.prototype.match),
    jd = Pr(String.prototype.replace),
    RK = Pr(String.prototype.indexOf),
    IK = Pr(String.prototype.trim),
    Rn = Pr(Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty),
    ur = Pr(RegExp.prototype.test),
    bd = DK(TypeError);
function Pr(t) {
    return function(s) {
        s instanceof RegExp && (s.lastIndex = 0);
        for (var r = arguments.length, n = new Array(r > 1 ? r - 1 : 0), a = 1; a < r; a++)
            n[a - 1] = arguments[a];
        return xy(t, s, n)
    }
}
function DK(t) {
    return function() {
        for (var s = arguments.length, r = new Array(s), n = 0; n < s; n++)
            r[n] = arguments[n];
        return gy(t, r)
    }
}
function jt(t, s) {
    let r = arguments.length > 2 && arguments[2] !== void 0 ? arguments[2] : Ih;
    H1 && H1(t, null);
    let n = s.length;
    for (; n--;) {
        let a = s[n];
        if (typeof a == "string") {
            const i = r(a);
            i !== a && (PK(s) || (s[n] = i), a = i)
        }
        t[a] = !0
    }
    return t
}
function OK(t) {
    for (let s = 0; s < t.length; s++)
        Rn(t, s) || (t[s] = null);
    return t
}
function Ua(t) {
    const s = kM(null);
    for (const [r, n] of EM(t))
        Rn(t, r) && (Array.isArray(n) ? s[r] = OK(n) : n && typeof n == "object" && n.constructor === Object ? s[r] = Ua(n) : s[r] = n);
    return s
}
function Nd(t, s) {
    for (; t !== null;) {
        const n = TK(t, s);
        if (n) {
            if (n.get)
                return Pr(n.get);
            if (typeof n.value == "function")
                return Pr(n.value)
        }
        t = _K(t)
    }
    function r() {
        return null
    }

            if (Ut && (Ee === "id" || Ee === "name") && (Ue in r || Ue in ix))
                return !1;
            if (!(G && !k[Ee] && ur(D, Ee))) {
                if (!(ee && ur(R, Ee))) {
                    if (!Q[Ee] || k[Ee]) {
                        if (!(wb(Z) && (we.tagNameCheck instanceof RegExp && ur(we.tagNameCheck, Z) || we.tagNameCheck instanceof Function && we.tagNameCheck(Z)) && (we.attributeNameCheck instanceof RegExp && ur(we.attributeNameCheck, Ee) || we.attributeNameCheck instanceof Function && we.attributeNameCheck(Ee)) || Ee === "is" && we.allowCustomizedBuiltInElements && (we.tagNameCheck instanceof RegExp && ur(we.tagNameCheck, Ue) || we.tagNameCheck instanceof Function && we.tagNameCheck(Ue))))
                            return !1
                    } else if (!St[Ee]) {
                        if (!ur(ie, jd(Ue, I, ""))) {
                            if (!((Ee === "src" || Ee === "xlink:href" || Ee === "href") && Z !== "script" && RK(Ue, "data:") === 0 && Oe[Z])) {
                                if (!(se && !ur(E, jd(Ue, I, "")))) {
                                    if (Ue)
                                        return !1
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            return !0
        },
        wb = function(Z) {
            return Z !== "annotation-xml" && G1(Z, U)
        },
        Cb = function(Z) {
            Ia(z.beforeSanitizeAttributes, Z, null);
            const {attributes: Ee} = Z;
            if (!Ee || lx(Z))
                return;
            const Ue = {
                attrName: "",
                attrValue: "",
                keepAttr: !0,
                allowedAttributes: Q,
                forceKeepAttr: void 0
            };
            let Kt = Ee.length;
            for (; Kt--;) {
                const er = Ee[Kt],
                    {name: _s, namespaceURI: Mr, value: Da} = er,
                    nd = us(_s),
                    cx = Da;
                let tr = _s === "value" ? cx : IK(cx);
                if (Ue.attrName = nd, Ue.attrValue = tr, Ue.keepAttr = !0, Ue.forceKeepAttr = void 0, Ia(z.uponSanitizeAttribute, Z, Ue), tr = Ue.attrValue, Bt && (nd === "id" || nd === "name") && (wl(_s, Z), tr = q + tr), ue && ur(/((--!?|])>)|<\/(style|title)/i, tr)) {
                    wl(_s, Z);
                    continue
                }
                if (Ue.forceKeepAttr)
                    continue;
                if (!Ue.keepAttr) {
                    wl(_s, Z);
                    continue
                }
                if (!L && ur(/\/>/i, tr)) {
                    wl(_s, Z);
                    continue
                }
                te && nh([A, O, H], Eb => {
                    tr = jd(tr, Eb, " ")
                });
                const Sb = us(Z.nodeName);
                if (!Nb(Sb, nd, tr)) {
                    wl(_s, Z);
                    continue
                }
                if (N && typeof y == "object" && typeof y.getAttributeType == "function" && !Mr)
                    switch (y.getAttributeType(Sb, nd)) {
                    case "TrustedHTML":
                        {
                            tr = N.createHTML(tr);
                            break
                        }case "TrustedScriptURL":
                        {
                            tr = N.createScriptURL(tr);
                            break
                        }
                    }
                if (tr !== cx)
                    try {
                        Mr ? Z.setAttributeNS(Mr, _s, tr) : Z.setAttribute(_s, tr),
                        lx(Z) ? ra(Z) : W1(s.removed)
                    } catch {
                        wl(_s, Z)
                    }
            }
            Ia(z.afterSanitizeAttributes, Z, null)
        },
        GM = function Ye(Z) {
            let Ee = null;
            const Ue = yb(Z);
            for (Ia(z.beforeSanitizeShadowDOM, Z, null); Ee = Ue.nextNode();)
                Ia(z.uponSanitizeShadowNode, Ee, null),
                bb(Ee),
                Cb(Ee),
                Ee.content instanceof i && Ye(Ee.content);
            Ia(z.afterSanitizeShadowDOM, Z, null)
        };
    return s.sanitize = function(Ye) {
        let Z = arguments.length > 1 && arguments[1] !== void 0 ? arguments[1] : {},
            Ee = null,
            Ue = null,
            Kt = null,
            er = null;
        if (bi = !Ye, bi && (Ye = "<!-->"), typeof Ye != "string" && !jb(Ye))
            if (typeof Ye.toString == "function") {
                if (Ye = Ye.toString(), typeof Ye != "string")
                    throw bd("dirty is not a string, aborting")
            } else
                throw bd("toString is not a function");
        if (!s.isSupported)
            return Ye;
        if (Ke || ox(Z), s.removed = [], typeof Ye == "string" && (de = !1), de) {
            if (Ye.nodeName) {
                const Da = us(Ye.nodeName);
                if (!F[Da] || Se[Da])
                    throw bd("root node is forbidden and cannot be sanitized in-place")
            }
        } else if (Ye instanceof l)
            Ee = vb("<!---->"),
            Ue = Ee.ownerDocument.importNode(Ye, !0),
            Ue.nodeType === wd.element && Ue.nodeName === "BODY" || Ue.nodeName === "HTML" ? Ee = Ue : Ee.appendChild(Ue);
        else {
            if (!Ie && !te && !ye && Ye.indexOf("<") === -1)
                return N && Tt ? N.createHTML(Ye) : Ye;
            if (Ee = vb(Ye), !Ee)
                return Ie ? null : Tt ? w : ""
        }
        Ee && X && ra(Ee.firstChild);
        const _s = yb(de ? Ye : Ee);
        for (; Kt = _s.nextNode();)
            bb(Kt),
            Cb(Kt),
            Kt.content instanceof i && GM(Kt.content);
        if (de)
            return Ye;
        if (Ie) {
            if (ct)
                for (er = _.call(Ee.ownerDocument); Ee.firstChild;)
                    er.appendChild(Ee.firstChild);
            else
                er = Ee;
            return (Q.shadowroot || Q.shadowrootmode) && (er = B.call(n, er, !0)), er
        }
        let Mr = ye ? Ee.outerHTML : Ee.innerHTML;
        return ye && F["!doctype"] && Ee.ownerDocument && Ee.ownerDocument.doctype && Ee.ownerDocument.doctype.name && ur(_M, Ee.ownerDocument.doctype.name) && (Mr = "<!DOCTYPE " + Ee.ownerDocument.doctype.name + `>
`
        + Mr), te && nh([A, O, H], Da => {
            Mr = jd(Mr, Da, " ")
        }), N && Tt ? N.createHTML(Mr) : Mr
    }, s.setConfig = function() {
        let Ye = arguments.length > 0 && arguments[0] !== void 0 ? arguments[0] : {};
        ox(Ye),
        Ke = !0
    }, s.clearConfig = function() {
        Ra = null,
        Ke = !1
    }, s.isValidAttribute = function(Ye, Z, Ee) {
        Ra || ox({});
        const Ue = us(Ye),
            Kt = us(Z);
        return Nb(Ue, Kt, Ee)
    }, s.addHook = function(Ye, Z) {
        typeof Z == "function" && yd(z[Ye], Z)
    }, s.removeHook = function(Ye, Z) {
        if (Z !== void 0) {
            const Ee = AK(z[Ye], Z);
            return Ee === -1 ? void 0 : MK(z[Ye], Ee, 1)[0]
        }
        return W1(z[Ye])
    }, s.removeHooks = function(Ye) {
        z[Ye] = []
    }, s.removeAllHooks = function() {
        z = J1()
    }, s
}
var e2 = TM();
function AM({content: t, onChange: s, placeholder: r, className: n}) {
    const a = f.useRef(null),
        [i, o] = f.useState(!1),
        [l, c] = f.useState(t);
    f.useEffect(() => {
        if (c(t), a.current && a.current.innerHTML !== t) {
            const h = e2.sanitize(t, {
                ALLOWED_TAGS: ["p", "br", "strong", "em", "u", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6", "ul", "ol", "li", "a", "img", "div"],
                ALLOWED_ATTR: ["href", "target", "rel", "src", "alt", "style", "class"],
                ALLOWED_URI_REGEXP: /^(?:(?:(?:f|ht)tps?|mailto|tel|callto|cid|xmpp|data):|[^a-z]|[a-z+.\-]+(?:[^a-z+.\-:]|$))/i
            });
            a.current.innerHTML = h
        }
    }, [t]);
    const d = () => {
            if (a.current) {
                const h = a.current.innerHTML;
                c(h),
                s(h)
            }
        },
        u = h => {
            if (c(h), s(h), a.current) {
                const v = e2.sanitize(h, {
                    ALLOWED_TAGS: ["p", "br", "strong", "em", "u", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6", "ul", "ol", "li", "a", "img", "div"],
                    ALLOWED_ATTR: ["href", "target", "rel", "src", "alt", "style", "class"],
                    ALLOWED_URI_REGEXP: /^(?:(?:(?:f|ht)tps?|mailto|tel|callto|cid|xmpp|data):|[^a-z]|[a-z+.\-]+(?:[^a-z+.\-:]|$))/i
                });
                a.current.innerHTML = v
            }
        },
        m = (h, v) => {
            var N;
            try {
                document.queryCommandSupported && document.queryCommandSupported(h) ? document.execCommand(h, !1, v) : p(h, v)
            } catch (w) {
                console.warn("Error executing command:", h, w),
                p(h, v)
            }
            (N = a.current) == null || N.focus(),
            d()
        },
        p = (h, v) => {
            if (!a.current)
                return;
            const N = window.getSelection();
            if (!N || N.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const w = N.getRangeAt(0);
            switch (h) {
            case "bold":
                y("strong");
                break;
            case "italic":
                y("em");
                break;
            case "underline":
                y("u");
                break;
            case "createLink":
                if (v) {
                    const C = document.createElement("a");
                    C.href = v,
                    C.target = "_blank",
                    C.rel = "noopener noreferrer";
                    try {
                        w.surroundContents(C)
                    } catch {
                        w.deleteContents(),
                        w.insertNode(C)
                    }
                }
                break;
            case "insertImage":
                if (v) {
                    const C = document.createElement("img");
                    C.src = v,
                    C.style.maxWidth = "100%",
                    C.style.height = "auto",
                    w.insertNode(C)
                }
                break;
            case "insertUnorderedList":
                g("ul");
                break;
            default:
                if (h.startsWith("justify")) {
                    const C = h.replace("justify", "").toLowerCase(),
                        S = document.createElement("div");
                    S.style.textAlign = C === "left" ? "left" : C === "center" ? "center" : "right";
                    try {
                        w.surroundContents(S)
                    } catch {
                        w.deleteContents(),
                        w.insertNode(S)
                    }
                }
                break
            }
        },
        y = h => {
            const v = window.getSelection();
            if (!v || v.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const N = v.getRangeAt(0),
                w = N.toString();
            if (w) {
                const C = document.createElement(h);
                C.textContent = w,
                N.deleteContents(),
                N.insertNode(C)
            }
        },
        g = h => {
            const v = window.getSelection();
            if (!v || v.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const N = v.getRangeAt(0),
                w = N.toString();
            if (w) {
                const C = document.createElement(h),
                    S = document.createElement("li");
                S.textContent = w,
                C.appendChild(S),
                N.deleteContents(),
                N.insertNode(C)
            }
        },
        x = () => {
            const h = prompt("Ingrese la URL:");
            h && m("createLink", h)
        },
        b = () => {
            const h = prompt("Ingrese la URL de la imagen:");
            h && m("insertImage", h)
        },
        j = [{
            icon: QO,
            command: "bold",
            title: "Negrita"
        }, {
            icon: h5,
            command: "italic",
            title: "Cursiva"
        }, {
            icon: P5,
            command: "underline",
            title: "Subrayado"
        }, {
            icon: GO,
            command: "justifyLeft",
            title: "Alinear izquierda"
        }, {
            icon: WO,
            command: "justifyCenter",
            title: "Centrar"
        }, {
            icon: KO,
            command: "justifyRight",
            title: "Alinear derecha"
        }, {
            icon: xp,
            command: "insertUnorderedList",
            title: "Lista"
        }];
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: me("border rounded-lg overflow-hidden", n),
        children: e.jsxs(os, {
            defaultValue: "visual",
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsxs(Jt, {
                className: "grid w-full grid-cols-2",
                children: [e.jsx($e, {
                    value: "visual",
                    children: "Editor Visual"
                }), e.jsx($e, {
                    value: "html",
                    children: "Código HTML"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                value: "visual",
                className: "m-0",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "border-b bg-gray-50 p-2 flex flex-wrap gap-1",
                    children: [j.map(h => e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: () => m(h.command),
                        title: h.title,
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(h.icon, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }, h.command)), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-px h-6 bg-gray-300 mx-1"
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: x,
                        title: "Insertar enlace",
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(p5, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: b,
                        title: "Insertar imagen",
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(qs, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-px h-6 bg-gray-300 mx-1"
                    }), e.jsxs("select", {
                        onChange: h => m("formatBlock", h.target.value),
                        className: "h-8 px-2 text-sm border rounded",
                        defaultValue: "",
                        children: [e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "",
                            children: "Formato"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h1",
                            children: "Título 1"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h2",
                            children: "Título 2"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h3",
                            children: "Título 3"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "p",
                            children: "Párrafo"
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "relative",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        ref: a,
                        contentEditable: !0,
                        onInput: d,
                        onFocus: () => o(!0),
                        onBlur: () => o(!1),
                        className: me("min-h-[300px] p-4 outline-none prose prose-sm max-w-none", "focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-inset", !t && !i && "text-gray-400"),
                        style: {
                            whiteSpace: "pre-wrap",
                            wordWrap: "break-word"
                        },
                        suppressContentEditableWarning: !0
                    }), !t && !i && e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "absolute top-4 left-4 text-gray-400 pointer-events-none",
                        children: r || "Escriba el contenido aquí..."
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "html",
                className: "m-0",
                children: e.jsx($t, {
                    value: l,
                    onChange: h => u(h.target.value),
                    placeholder: "Ingrese el código HTML aquí...",
                    className: "min-h-[400px] font-mono text-sm border-0 rounded-none resize-none"
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
function YK() {
    const [t, s] = f.useState("pages"),
        [r, n] = f.useState(null),
        [a, i] = f.useState(null),
        [o, l] = f.useState({}),
        [c, d] = f.useState({}),
        [u, m] = f.useState(!1),
        [p, y] = f.useState(!1),
        {toast: g} = st(),
        x = dr(),
        {data: b, isLoading: j} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const A = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/pages", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!A.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar páginas");
                return A.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: h, isLoading: v} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const A = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!A.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return A.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: N, isLoading: w, error: C} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const A = await fetch("/api/cms/site-settings", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!A.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar configuraciones");
                return A.json()
            }
        }),
        S = async () => {
            try {
                const A = r ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    O = r ? `/api/admin/cms/pages/${r.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/pages";
                if (!(await fetch(O, {
                    method: A,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(o)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar página");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                n(null),
                l({}),
                m(!1),
                g({
                    title: r ? "Página actualizada exitosamente" : "Página creada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al guardar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        _ = async A => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/pages/${A}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar página");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Página eliminada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al eliminar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        T = async () => {
            try {
                const A = a ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    O = a ? `/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${a.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks";
                if (!(await fetch(O, {
                    method: A,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },

                })).ok)

                })
            } catch {

                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        B = async A => {

                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar bloque");

                }),

                })

                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        z = async (A, O) => {
            try {

                    },

                    })
                })).ok)

                })
            } catch {

                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {
            activeTab: "admin_cms"
        }), e.jsxs("div", {

                className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-8",
                children: "Sistema de Gestión de Contenido"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {

                    }), e.jsxs(P, {

                                isPublished: !0,
                                isEditable: !0,
                                pageType: "static"
                            })
                        },

                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",

                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Páginas Existentes"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: j ? e.jsx("div", {
                                children: "Cargando páginas..."
                            }) : b == null ? void 0 : b.map(A => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                    })]

                                        size: "sm",

                                            n(A),
                                            l(A),
                                            m(!1)
                                        },

                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    }), A.isEditable && e.jsx(P, {
                                        size: "sm",
                                        variant: "destructive",
                                        onClick: () => _(A.id),
                                        children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }, A.id))
                        })]
                    }), (r || u) && e.jsxs($, {

                                    },
