                                })]
                            }, A.id))
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function ZK() {
    const [, t] = ft(),
        [s, r] = f.useState(null),
        [n, a] = f.useState(""),
        [i, o] = f.useState(!1),
        l = () => {
            var p;
            if (!s)
                return;
            if (o(!0), console.log("🚨 PÁGINA INTERMEDIA - Enviando datos a Redsys"), console.log("🚨 DATOS COMPLETOS:", {
                actionUrl: s.actionUrl,
                merchantParameters: s.merchantParameters,
                signature: s.signature,
                hasFormHtml: !!s.formHtml,
                orderNumber: s.orderNumber,
                amount: s.amount
            }), s.formHtml) {
                console.log("🚨 USANDO FORMULARIO HTML DEL BACKEND");
                const y = document.createElement("div");
                y.innerHTML = s.formHtml;
                const g = y.querySelector("form");
                if (g) {
                    g.style.display = "none",
                    document.body.appendChild(g),
                    console.log("🚨 FORMULARIO DEL BACKEND AÑADIDO AL DOM"),
                    console.log("- Action:", g.action),
                    console.log("- Method:", g.method),
                    console.log("- Fields count:", g.children.length);
                    const x = g.querySelector('input[name="Ds_SignatureVersion"]'),
                        b = g.querySelector('input[name="Ds_MerchantParameters"]'),
                        j = g.querySelector('input[name="Ds_Signature"]');
                    console.log("🚨 VERIFICANDO CAMPOS:"),
                    console.log("- Ds_SignatureVersion:", x == null ? void 0 : x.value),
                    console.log("- Ds_MerchantParameters length:", (p = b == null ? void 0 : b.value) == null ? void 0 : p.length),
                    console.log("- Ds_Signature:", j == null ? void 0 : j.value),
                    console.log("🚨 ENVIANDO FORMULARIO DEL BACKEND A REDSYS..."),
                    g.submit(),
                    sessionStorage.removeItem("redsysPaymentData");
                    return
                }
            }
            console.log("🚨 FALLBACK: Creando formulario manualmente");
            const c = document.createElement("form");
            c.method = "POST",
            c.action = s.actionUrl,
            c.acceptCharset = "UTF-8",
            c.enctype = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
            c.style.display = "none";
            const d = document.createElement("input");
            d.type = "hidden",
            d.name = "Ds_SignatureVersion",
            d.value = "HMAC_SHA256_V1",
            c.appendChild(d);
            const u = document.createElement("input");
            u.type = "hidden",
            u.name = "Ds_MerchantParameters",
            u.value = s.merchantParameters,
            c.appendChild(u);
            const m = document.createElement("input");
            m.type = "hidden",
            m.name = "Ds_Signature",
            m.value = s.signature,
            c.appendChild(m),
            document.body.appendChild(c),
            console.log("🚨 FORMULARIO MANUAL CREADO - Verificando campos:"),
            console.log("- Action:", c.action),
            console.log("- Method:", c.method),
            console.log("- Fields count:", c.children.length),
            console.log("- Ds_SignatureVersion:", d.value),
            console.log("- Ds_MerchantParameters length:", u.value.length),
            console.log("- Ds_Signature:", m.value),
            console.log("🚨 ENVIANDO FORMULARIO MANUAL A REDSYS..."),
            c.submit(),
            sessionStorage.removeItem("redsysPaymentData")
        };
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        var d,
            u;
        const c = sessionStorage.getItem("redsysPaymentData");
        if (!c) {
            a("No se encontraron datos de pago. Redirigiendo al checkout..."),
            setTimeout(() => t("/checkout"), 3e3);
            return
        }
        try {
            const m = JSON.parse(c);
            r(m),
            console.log("🚨 PÁGINA INTERMEDIA - Datos recibidos:", {
                hasFormHtml: !!m.formHtml,
                formHtmlLength: (d = m.formHtml) == null ? void 0 : d.length,
                actionUrl: m.actionUrl,
                merchantParameters: ((u = m.merchantParameters) == null ? void 0 : u.substring(0, 50)) + "...",
                signature: m.signature,
                orderNumber: m.orderNumber,
                amount: m.amount
            }),
            console.log("🚨 INICIANDO ENVÍO AUTOMÁTICO A REDSYS"),
            setTimeout(() => {
                l()
            }, 1500)
        } catch (m) {
            a("Error al procesar los datos de pago"),
            console.error("Error parsing Redsys data:", m)
        }
    }, [t]), n ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md w-full bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "w-12 h-12 mx-auto mb-4 bg-red-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center",
                    children: e.jsx("svg", {
                        className: "w-6 h-6 text-red-600",
                        fill: "none",
                        stroke: "currentColor",
                        viewBox: "0 0 24 24",
                        children: e.jsx("path", {
                            strokeLinecap: "round",
                            strokeLinejoin: "round",
                            strokeWidth: 2,
                            d: "M12 9v2m0 4h.01m-6.938 4h13.856c1.54 0 2.502-1.667 1.732-2.5L13.732 4c-.77-.833-1.964-.833-2.732 0L3.082 16.5c-.77.833.192 2.5 1.732 2.5z"
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Error en el proceso de pago"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: n
                }), e.jsx("button", {
                    onClick: () => t("/checkout"),
                    className: "w-full bg-blue-600 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors",
                    children: "Volver al checkout"
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : s ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md w-full bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "w-12 h-12 mx-auto mb-4 bg-blue-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center",
                    children: e.jsx("svg", {
                        className: "w-6 h-6 text-blue-600",
                        fill: "none",
                        stroke: "currentColor",
                        viewBox: "0 0 24 24",
                        children: e.jsx("path", {
                            strokeLinecap: "round",
                            strokeLinejoin: "round",
                            strokeWidth: 2,
                            d: "M12 15v2m-6 4h12a2 2 0 002-2v-6a2 2 0 00-2-2H6a2 2 0 00-2 2v6a2 2 0 002 2zm10-10V7a4 4 0 00-8 0v4h8z"
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Redirigiendo al pago seguro"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: "Estás siendo redirigido a la pasarela de pago segura de Redsys para completar tu compra."
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4 mb-6",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between",
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                children: "Pedido:"
                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: s.reference || s.orderNumber || "N/A"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between",
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                children: "Importe:"
                            }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: [s.totalAmount ? s.totalAmount.toFixed(2) : s.amount ? (s.amount / 100).toFixed(2) : "0.00", "€"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                }), i ? e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "w-full bg-green-600 text-white py-3 px-4 rounded-lg font-medium",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "animate-spin rounded-full h-4 w-4 border-b-2 border-white mr-2"
                        }), "Redirigiendo a Redsys..."]
                    })
                }) : e.jsx("button", {
                    onClick: l,
                    className: "w-full bg-red-600 text-white py-3 px-4 rounded-lg hover:bg-red-700 transition-colors font-medium",
                    children: "Continuar con el pago en Redsys"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-xs text-gray-500 mt-4",
                    children: "Si no eres redirigido automáticamente, haz clic en el botón de arriba."
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "text-center",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-blue-600 mx-auto mb-4"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                className: "text-gray-600",
                children: "Preparando el pago..."
            })]
        })
    })
}
function QK() {
    const [t, s] = f.useState("pages"),
        [r, n] = f.useState(null),
        [a, i] = f.useState(null),
        [o, l] = f.useState({}),
        [c, d] = f.useState({}),
        [u, m] = f.useState(!1),
        [p, y] = f.useState(!1),
        [g, x] = f.useState({}),
        [b, j] = f.useState({}),
        {toast: h} = st(),
        v = dr(),
        {data: N, isLoading: w} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const R = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/pages", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!R.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar páginas");
                return R.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: C, isLoading: S} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const R = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!R.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return R.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: _, isLoading: T} = Pe({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const R = await fetch("/api/cms/site-settings", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!R.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar configuraciones");
                return R.json()
            }
        }),
        B = async (R, E) => {
            x(I => ({
                ...I,
                [R]: !0
            }));
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/cms/site-settings/${R}`, {
                    method: "PUT",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        value: E
                    })
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al actualizar configuración");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"]
                }),
                j(U => {
                    const ie = {
                        ...U
                    };
                    return delete ie[R], ie
                }),
                h({
                    title: "Configuración guardada",
                    description: "Los cambios se han guardado correctamente"
                })
            } catch {
                h({
                    title: "Error al guardar",
                    description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                x(I => ({
                    ...I,
                    [R]: !1
                }))
            }
        },
        z = (R, E) => {
            j(I => ({
                ...I,
                [R]: E
            }))
        },
        A = async () => {
            x(R => ({
                ...R,
                page: !0
            }));
            try {
                const R = r ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    E = r ? `/api/admin/cms/pages/${r.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/pages";
                if (!(await fetch(E, {
                    method: R,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(o)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar página");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                n(null),
                l({}),
                m(!1),
                h({
                    title: r ? "Página actualizada" : "Página creada"
                })
            } catch {
                h({
                    title: "Error al guardar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                x(R => ({
                    ...R,
                    page: !1
                }))
            }
        },
        O = async () => {
            x(R => ({
                ...R,
                block: !0
            }));
            try {
                const R = a ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    E = a ? `/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${a.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks";
                if (!(await fetch(E, {
                    method: R,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(c)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar bloque");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                i(null),
                d({}),
                y(!1),
                h({
                    title: a ? "Bloque actualizado" : "Bloque creado"
                })
            } catch {
                h({
                    title: "Error al guardar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                x(R => ({
                    ...R,
                    block: !1
                }))
            }
        },
        H = async R => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${R}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar bloque");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                h({
                    title: "Bloque eliminado"
                })
            } catch {
                h({
                    title: "Error al eliminar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        D = R => {
            var ie;
            const E = b[R.key] !== void 0,
                I = E ? b[R.key] : R.value,
                U = g[R.key];
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-3 p-4 border rounded-lg bg-gray-50",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex-1",
                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                            htmlFor: R.key,
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: R.description || R.key
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2 mt-1",
                            children: [e.jsx(ve, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                className: "text-xs",
                                children: R.category
                            }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                className: "text-xs",
                                children: R.type
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), E && e.jsx(P, {
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => B(R.key, I),
                        disabled: U,
                        className: "ml-2",
                        children: U ? e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin"
                        }) : e.jsx(Nn, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        })
                    })]
                }), R.type === "boolean" ? e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(wt, {
                        id: R.key,
                        checked: I === "true",
                        onCheckedChange: F => {
                            z(R.key, F.toString())
                        },
                        disabled: U
                    }), e.jsx(W, {
                        htmlFor: R.key,
                        className: "text-sm",
                        children: I === "true" ? "Activado" : "Desactivado"
                    })]
                }) : R.type === "json" ? e.jsx($t, {
                    id: R.key,
                    value: I,
                    onChange: F => z(R.key, F.target.value),
                    disabled: U,
                    rows: 4,
                    className: "font-mono text-sm",
                    placeholder: "Formato JSON válido"
                }) : R.type === "email" ? e.jsx(J, {
                    id: R.key,
                    type: "email",
                    value: I,
                    onChange: F => z(R.key, F.target.value),
                    disabled: U,
                    placeholder: "correo@ejemplo.com"
                }) : e.jsx(J, {
                    id: R.key,
                    value: I,
                    onChange: F => z(R.key, F.target.value),
                    disabled: U,
                    placeholder: `Ingrese ${((ie = R.description) == null ? void 0 : ie.toLowerCase()) || R.key}`
                })]
            }, R.id)
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {
            activeTab: "admin_cms"
        }), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "mb-8",
                children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-2",
                    children: "Sistema de Gestión de Contenido"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "Gestiona páginas, bloques del footer y configuraciones del sitio web"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(os, {
                value: t,
                onValueChange: s,
                className: "w-full",
                children: [e.jsxs(Jt, {
                    className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs($e, {
                        value: "pages",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(yn, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Páginas"]
                    }), e.jsxs($e, {
                        value: "header",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(lr, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Header"]
                    }), e.jsxs($e, {
                        value: "footer",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(_E, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Footer"]
                    }), e.jsxs($e, {
                        value: "settings",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(Os, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Configuraciones"]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                    value: "pages",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                            children: "Gestión de Páginas"
                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                            onClick: () => {
                                m(!0),
                                l({
                                    slug: "",
                                    title: "",
                                    content: "",
                                    metaDescription: "",
                                    isPublished: !1,
                                    isEditable: !0,
                                    pageType: "content"
                                })
                            },
                            children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                            }), "Nueva Página"]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: "Páginas del Sitio"
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: w ? e.jsx("div", {
                                    children: "Cargando páginas..."
                                }) : N == null ? void 0 : N.map(R => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-1",
                                        children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: R.title
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: ["/", R.slug]
                                        }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                            variant: R.isPublished ? "default" : "secondary",
                                            children: R.isPublished ? "Publicado" : "Borrador"
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "flex gap-2",
                                        children: e.jsx(P, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            onClick: () => {
                                                n(R),
                                                l(R),
                                                m(!1)
                                            },
                                            children: e.jsx(nn, {
                                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                                            })
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }, R.id))
                            })]
                        }), (r || u) && e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: u ? "Nueva Página" : `Editando: ${r == null ? void 0 : r.title}`
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            htmlFor: "page-title",
                                            children: "Título"
                                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                                            id: "page-title",
                                            value: o.title || "",
                                            onChange: R => l({
                                                ...o,
                                                title: R.target.value
                                            }),
                                            placeholder: "Título de la página"
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            htmlFor: "page-slug",
                                            children: "URL (slug)"
                                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                                            id: "page-slug",
                                            value: o.slug || "",
                                            onChange: R => l({
                                                ...o,
                                                slug: R.target.value
                                            }),
                                            placeholder: "url-de-la-pagina"
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "page-meta",
                                        children: "Meta descripción"
                                    }), e.jsx($t, {
                                        id: "page-meta",
                                        value: o.metaDescription || "",
                                        onChange: R => l({
                                            ...o,
                                            metaDescription: R.target.value
                                        }),
                                        placeholder: "Descripción para SEO (máx. 160 caracteres)",
                                        maxLength: 160
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "page-content",
                                        children: "Contenido"
                                    }), e.jsx(AM, {
                                        content: o.content || "",
                                        onChange: R => l({
                                            ...o,
                                            content: R
                                        }),
                                        placeholder: "Escriba el contenido de la página aquí...",
                                        className: "min-h-[400px]"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(wt, {
                                        id: "isPublished",
                                        checked: o.isPublished || !1,
                                        onCheckedChange: R => l({
                                            ...o,
                                            isPublished: R
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "isPublished",
                                        children: "Página publicada"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                        onClick: A,
                                        disabled: g.page,
                                        children: [g.page ? e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin mr-2"
                                        }) : e.jsx(Nn, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), "Guardar"]
                                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        onClick: () => {
                                            n(null),
                                            l({}),
                                            m(!1)
                                        },
                                        children: [e.jsx(Js, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), "Cancelar"]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                    value: "footer",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                            children: "Gestión del Footer"
                        }), e.jsxs(P, {
                            onClick: () => {
                                y(!0),
                                d({
                                    title: "",
                                    content: "",
                                    blockType: "text",
                                    sortOrder: 0,
                                    isActive: !0
                                })
                            },
                            children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                            }), "Nuevo Bloque"]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: "Bloques del Footer"
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: S ? e.jsx("div", {
                                    children: "Cargando bloques..."
                                }) : C == null ? void 0 : C.map(R => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-1",
                                        children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: R.title
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground line-clamp-2",
                                            children: R.content
                                        }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                            variant: R.isActive ? "default" : "secondary",
                                            children: R.isActive ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            onClick: () => {
                                                i(R),
                                                d(R),
                                                y(!1)
                                            },
                                            children: e.jsx(nn, {
                                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            variant: "destructive",
                                            onClick: () => H(R.id),
                                            children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, R.id))
                            })]
                        }), (a || p) && e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: p ? "Nuevo Bloque" : `Editando: ${a == null ? void 0 : a.title}`
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "block-title",
                                        children: "Título"
                                    }), e.jsx(J, {
                                        id: "block-title",
                                        value: c.title || "",
                                        onChange: R => d({
                                            ...c,
                                            title: R.target.value
                                        }),
                                        placeholder: "Título del bloque"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "block-content",
                                        children: "Contenido"
                                    }), e.jsx($t, {
                                        id: "block-content",
                                        value: c.content || "",
                                        onChange: R => d({
                                            ...c,
                                            content: R.target.value
                                        }),
                                        placeholder: "Contenido del bloque",
                                        rows: 6
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            htmlFor: "block-type",
                                            children: "Tipo de Bloque"
                                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                                            id: "block-type",
                                            value: c.blockType || "",
                                            onChange: R => d({
                                                ...c,
                                                blockType: R.target.value
                                            }),
                                            placeholder: "text, links, hours, etc."
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {
                                            htmlFor: "block-order",
                                            children: "Orden"
                                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                                            id: "block-order",
                                            type: "number",
                                            value: c.sortOrder || 0,
                                            onChange: R => d({
                                                ...c,
                                                sortOrder: parseInt(R.target.value)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(wt, {
                                        id: "block-active",
                                        checked: c.isActive || !1,
                                        onCheckedChange: R => d({
                                            ...c,
                                            isActive: R
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(W, {
                                        htmlFor: "block-active",
                                        children: "Bloque activo"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                        onClick: O,
                                        disabled: g.block,
                                        children: [g.block ? e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin mr-2"
                                        }) : e.jsx(Nn, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), "Guardar"]
                                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        onClick: () => {
                                            i(null),
                                            d({}),
                                            y(!1)
                                        },
                                        children: [e.jsx(Js, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), "Cancelar"]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                    value: "header",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "mb-6",
                        children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-semibold mb-2",
                            children: "Configuración del Header"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Gestiona los horarios de atención, información de contacto y otros elementos del header."
                        })]
                    }), T ? e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-center p-8",
                        children: e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                        })
                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(lr, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5"
                                    }), "Horarios de Atención"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: _ == null ? void 0 : _.filter(R => R.category === "header" && R.key.includes("hours")).map(D)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Kn, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5"
                                    }), "Contacto del Header"]

var UM = "basil",
    CY = function(s) {
        return s === 3 ? "v3" : s
    },
    BM = "https://js.stripe.com",
    SY = "".concat(BM, "/").concat(UM, "/stripe.js"),
    EY = /^https:\/\/js\.stripe\.com\/v3\/?(\?.*)?$/,
    kY = /^https:\/\/js\.stripe\.com\/(v3|[a-z]+)\/stripe\.js(\?.*)?$/,
    i2 = "loadStripe.setLoadParameters was called but an existing Stripe.js script already exists in the document; existing script parameters will be used",
    PY = function(s) {
        return EY.test(s) || kY.test(s)
    },
    _Y = function() {
        for (var s = document.querySelectorAll('script[src^="'.concat(BM, '"]')), r = 0; r < s.length; r++) {
            var n = s[r];
            if (PY(n.src))
                return n
        }
        return null
    },
    o2 = function(s) {
        var r = "",
            n = document.createElement("script");
        n.src = "".concat(SY).concat(r);
        var a = document.head || document.body;
        if (!a)
            throw new Error("Expected document.body not to be null. Stripe.js requires a <body> element.");
        return a.appendChild(n), n
    },
    TY = function(s, r) {
        !s || !s._registerWrapper || s._registerWrapper({
            name: "stripe-js",
            version: "7.4.0",
            startTime: r
        })
    },
    Cd = null,
    ih = null,
    oh = null,
    AY = function(s) {
        return function(r) {
            s(new Error("Failed to load Stripe.js", {
                cause: r
            }))
        }
    },
    MY = function(s, r) {
        return function() {
            window.Stripe ? s(window.Stripe) : r(new Error("Stripe.js not available"))
        }
    },
    RY = function(s) {
        return Cd !== null ? Cd : (Cd = new Promise(function(r, n) {
            if (typeof window > "u" || typeof document > "u") {
                r(null);
                return
            }
            if (window.Stripe && s && console.warn(i2), window.Stripe) {
                r(window.Stripe);
                return
            }
            try {
                var a = _Y();
                if (a && s)
                    console.warn(i2);
                else if (!a)
                    a = o2(s);
                else if (a && oh !== null && ih !== null) {
                    var i;
                    a.removeEventListener("load", oh),
                    a.removeEventListener("error", ih),
                    (i = a.parentNode) === null || i === void 0 || i.removeChild(a),
                    a = o2(s)
                }
                oh = MY(r, n),
                ih = AY(n),
                a.addEventListener("load", oh),
                a.addEventListener("error", ih)
            } catch (o) {
                n(o);
                return
            }
        }), Cd.catch(function(r) {
            return Cd = null, Promise.reject(r)
        }))
    },
    IY = function(s, r, n) {
        if (s === null)
            return null;
        var a = r[0],
            i = a.match(/^pk_test/),
            o = CY(s.version),
            l = UM;
        i && o !== l && console.warn("Stripe.js@".concat(o, " was loaded on the page, but @stripe/stripe-js@").concat("7.4.0", " expected Stripe.js@").concat(l, ". This may result in unexpected behavior. For more information, see https://docs.stripe.com/sdks/stripejs-versioning"));
        var c = s.apply(void 0, r);
        return TY(c, n), c
    },
    Sd,
    qM = !1,
    HM = function() {
        return Sd || (Sd = RY(null).catch(function(s) {
                return Sd = null, Promise.reject(s)
            }), Sd)
    };
Promise.resolve().then(function() {
    return HM()
}).catch(function(t) {
    qM || console.warn(t)
});
var DY = function() {
    for (var s = arguments.length, r = new Array(s), n = 0; n < s; n++)
        r[n] = arguments[n];
    qM = !0;
    var a = Date.now();
    return HM().then(function(i) {
        return IY(i, r, a)
    })
};
let l2 = null;
const OY = ({clientSecret: t, sessionId: s}) => {
    const r = NY(),
        n = xY(),
        {toast: a} = st();
    _n();
    const [i, o] = f.useState(!1),
        l = async c => {
            if (c.preventDefault(), !(!r || !n)) {
                o(!0);
                try {
                    const {error: d} = await r.confirmPayment({
                        elements: n,
                        confirmParams: {
                            return_url: `${window.location.origin}/payment/stripe/success?session_id=${s}`
                        }
                    });
                    d && a({
                        title: "Error en el pago",
                        description: d.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } catch {
                    a({
                        title: "Error en el pago",
                        description: "Hubo un problema al procesar el pago",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    o(!1)
                }
            }
        };
    return e.jsxs($, {
        className: "w-full max-w-md mx-auto",
        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
            children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                children: "Pago con Stripe"
            }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                children: "Completa tu pago de forma segura"
            })]
        }), e.jsx(V, {
            children: e.jsxs("form", {
                onSubmit: l,
                className: "space-y-4",
                children: [e.jsx(wY, {}), e.jsx(P, {
                    type: "submit",
                    disabled: !r || i,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: i ? e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                        children: [e.jsx(Qt, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                        }), "Procesando..."]
                    }) : "Pagar ahora"
                })]
            })
        })]
    })
};
function LY() {
    const [t] = ft(),
        [, s] = _n(),
        {toast: r} = st(),
        [n, a] = f.useState(""),
        [i, o] = f.useState(""),
        [l, c] = f.useState("");
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        (async () => {
            try {
                const m = await (await Me("GET", "/api/payment-modules/stripe/config")).json();
                if (!m.publicKey)
                    throw new Error("Stripe no configurado");
                c(m.publicKey),
                l2 = DY(m.publicKey);
                const p = new URLSearchParams(t.split("?")[1]),
                    y = p.get("client_secret"),
                    g = p.get("session_id");
                if (!y || !g)
                    throw new Error("Faltan parámetros de pago");
                a(y),
                o(g)
            } catch (u) {
                console.error("Error initializing Stripe:", u),
                r({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "Error al inicializar Stripe",
                    variant: "destructive"
                }),
                s("/checkout")
            }
        })()
    }, [t, s, r]), n ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen bg-gray-50 py-12 px-4",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md mx-auto",
            children: e.jsx($M, {
                stripe: l2,
                options: {
                    clientSecret: n
                },
                children: e.jsx(OY, {
                    clientSecret: n,
                    sessionId: i
                })
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "animate-spin w-8 h-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
        })
    })
}
function FY() {
    const [t] = ft(),
        [, s] = _n(),
        {toast: r} = st(),
        [n, a] = f.useState(!0);
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        (async () => {
            try {
                const o = new URLSearchParams(t.split("?")[1]),
                    l = o.get("session_id"),
                    c = o.get("payment_intent");
                if (!l || !c)
                    throw new Error("Missing required parameters");
                const d = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("pending_order_data") || "{}");
                if (!d.customerEmail)
                    throw new Error("No pending order data found");
                const u = await Me("POST", "/api/orders/local", {
                    ...d,
                    paymentTransactionId: c,
                    paymentStatus: "completed"
                });
                if (u.ok) {
                    const m = await u.json();
                    sessionStorage.removeItem("pending_order_data"),
                    s(`/order-confirmation/${m.id}?payment=stripe&sessionId=${l}`)
                } else
                    throw new Error("Failed to create order")
            } catch (o) {
                console.error("Error processing payment success:", o),
                r({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "Hubo un problema al procesar tu pago. Por favor contacta con nosotros.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                }),
                s("/checkout")
            } finally {
                a(!1)
            }
        })()
    }, [t, s, r]), n ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen bg-gray-50 py-12 px-4",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md mx-auto",
            children: e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx(Qt, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-5 w-5 animate-spin"
                        }), "Procesando pago..."]
                    }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                        children: "Estamos confirmando tu pago con Stripe"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "text-center py-8",
                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "animate-spin w-12 h-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "mt-4 text-gray-600",
                            children: "Por favor, no cierres esta ventana..."
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen bg-gray-50 py-12 px-4",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md mx-auto",
            children: e.jsxs($, {
                children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center text-green-600",
                        children: [e.jsx(Dt, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-5 w-5"
                        }), "Pago exitoso"]
                    }), e.jsx(Ft, {
                        children: "Tu pago ha sido procesado correctamente"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "text-center py-8",
                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600",
                            children: "Redirigiendo a la confirmación del pedido..."
                        })
                    })
                })]
            })
        })
    })
}
const zY = ({amount: t, sessionId: s}) => {
    const {toast: r} = st(),
        [, n] = _n(),
        [a, i] = f.useState(!0),
        o = async () => {
            try {
                const m = await Me("POST", "/api/paypal/order", {
                    amount: parseFloat(t),
                    currency: "EUR",
                    intent: "CAPTURE"
                });
                if (m.ok)
                    return {
                        orderId: (await m.json()).id
                    };
                throw new Error("Failed to create PayPal order")
            } catch (m) {
                throw console.error("Error creating PayPal order:", m), m
            }
        },
        l = async m => {
            try {
                const p = await Me("POST", `/api/paypal/order/${m}/capture`);
                if (p.ok)
                    return await p.json();
                throw new Error("Failed to capture PayPal order")
            } catch (p) {
                throw console.error("Error capturing PayPal order:", p), p
            }
        },
        c = async m => {
            try {
                const p = await l(m.orderId);
                if (p.status === "COMPLETED") {
                    const y = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("pending_order_data") || "{}"),
                        g = await Me("POST", "/api/orders/local", {
                            ...y,
                            paymentTransactionId: p.id,
                            paymentStatus: "completed"
                        });
                    if (g.ok) {
                        const x = await g.json();
                        sessionStorage.removeItem("pending_order_data"),
                        n(`/order-confirmation/${x.id}?payment=paypal&sessionId=${s}`)
                    }
                }
            } catch {
                r({
                    title: "Error en el pago",
                    description: "Hubo un problema al procesar tu pago con PayPal",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        d = () => {
            r({
                title: "Pago cancelado",
                description: "El pago con PayPal fue cancelado",
                variant: "default"
            }),
            n("/checkout")
        },
        u = m => {
            console.error("PayPal error:", m),
            r({
                title: "Error en el pago",
                description: "Hubo un error al procesar el pago con PayPal",
                variant: "destructive"
            })
        };
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        const m = async () => {
                try {
                    if (window.paypal)
                        await p();
                    else {
                        const y = document.createElement("script");
                        y.src = "https://www.paypal.com/web-sdk/v6/core",
                        y.async = !0,
                        y.onload = () => p(),
                        document.body.appendChild(y)
                    }
                } catch (y) {
                    console.error("Failed to load PayPal SDK", y),
                    i(!1)
                }
            },
            p = async () => {
                try {
                    const g = await (await Me("GET", "/api/paypal/setup")).json(),
                        b = (await window.paypal.createInstance({
                            clientToken: g.clientToken,
                            components: ["paypal-payments"]
                        })).createPayPalOneTimePaymentSession({
                            onApprove: c,
                            onCancel: d,
                            onError: u
                        }),
                        j = async () => {
                            try {
                                const v = o();
                                await b.start({
                                    paymentFlow: "auto"
                                }, v)
                            } catch (v) {
                                console.error("PayPal checkout error:", v),
                                u(v)
                            }
                        },
                        h = document.getElementById("paypal-button");
                    h && h.addEventListener("click", j),
                    i(!1)
                } catch (y) {
                    console.error("PayPal initialization error:", y),
                    i(!1)
                }
            };
        m()
    }, []), a ? e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex items-center justify-center py-8",
        children: [e.jsx(Qt, {
            className: "h-8 w-8 animate-spin"
        }), e.jsx("span", {
            className: "ml-2",
            children: "Cargando PayPal..."
        })]
    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "space-y-4",
        children: [e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center",
            children: e.jsxs("p", {
                className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                children: ["Total a pagar: ", t, " €"]
            })
        }), e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex justify-center",
            children: e.jsx("button", {
                id: "paypal-button",
                className: "bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg transition-colors",
                children: "Pagar con PayPal"
            })
        })]
    })
};
function $Y() {

        const l = new URLSearchParams(t.split("?")[1]),
            c = l.get("amount"),

        if (!c || !d) {
            r({
                title: "Error",
                description: "Faltan parámetros de pago",
                variant: "destructive"
            }),
            s("/checkout");
            return
        }
        a(c),
        o(d)
    }, [t, s, r]), n ? e.jsx("div", {

                        children: "Completa tu pago de forma segura con PayPal"

                            children: [e.jsx(yr, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Volver al checkout"]
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {

        })
    })
}

            }[d] || "Error no especificado en el procesamiento del pago" : "Error en el procesamiento del pago")

}
const BY = ({popup: t, onClose: s, onSuccess: r}) => {
        const {toast: n} = st(),
            [a, i] = f.useState({
                title: "",
                content: "",
                image: "",
                type: "info",
                position: "center",
                trigger: "immediate",
                triggerValue: 0,
                displayFrequency: "always",
                startDate: "",
                endDate: "",
                isActive: !0,
                priority: 1,
                targetPages: [],
                excludePages: [],
                buttonText: "Cerrar",
                buttonAction: "close",
                buttonUrl: "",
                showCloseButton: !0,
                backdropClose: !0
            }),
            [o, l] = f.useState(""),
            [c, d] = f.useState(""),
            [u, m] = f.useState(null),
            [p, y] = f.useState(""),
            g = v => {
                var w;
                const N = (w = v.target.files) == null ? void 0 : w[0];
                if (N) {
                    if (!N.type.startsWith("image/")) {
                        n({
                            title: "Error",
                            description: "Por favor selecciona un archivo de imagen",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        });
                        return
                    }
                    if (N.size > 5 * 1024 * 1024) {
                        n({
                            title: "Error",
                            description: "La imagen debe ser menor a 5MB",
                            variant: "destructive"
                        });
                        return
                    }
                    m(N);
                    const C = new FileReader;
                    C.onload = S => {
                        var _;
                        y((_ = S.target) == null ? void 0 : _.result)
                    },
                    C.readAsDataURL(N)
                }
            };
        f.useEffect(() => {
            t && (i({
                title: t.title,
                content: t.content,
                image: t.image || "",
                type: t.type,
                position: t.position,
                trigger: t.trigger,
                triggerValue: t.triggerValue,
                displayFrequency: t.displayFrequency,
                startDate: t.startDate ? t.startDate.split("T")[0] : "",
                endDate: t.endDate ? t.endDate.split("T")[0] : "",
                isActive: t.isActive,
                priority: t.priority,
                targetPages: t.targetPages || [],
                excludePages: t.excludePages || [],
                buttonText: t.buttonText,
                buttonAction: t.buttonAction,
                buttonUrl: t.buttonUrl || "",
                showCloseButton: t.showCloseButton,
                backdropClose: t.backdropClose
            }), l((t.targetPages || []).join(`
`
            )), d((t.excludePages || []).join(`
`
            )), y(t.image || ""))
        }, [t]);
        const x = async v => {
                const N = new FormData;
                N.append("image", v);
                const w = await fetch("/api/upload/image", {
                    method: "POST",
                    body: N
                });
                if (!w.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al subir la imagen");
                return (await w.json()).url
            },
            b = tt({
                mutationFn: async v => {
                    const N = t ? `/api/popups/${t.id}` : "/api/popups",
                        C = await fetch(N, {
                            method: t ? "PUT" : "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(v)
                        });
                    if (!C.ok) {
                        const S = await C.json();
                        throw new Error(S.error || "Error al guardar el pop-up")
                    }
                    return C.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    n({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: `Pop-up ${t ? "actualizado" : "creado"} correctamente`
                    }),
                    r()
                },
                onError: v => {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: v.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            j = async v => {
                if (v.preventDefault(), !a.title.trim()) {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "El título es obligatorio",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (!a.content.trim()) {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "El contenido es obligatorio",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                try {
                    let N = a.image;
                    u && (N = await x(u));
                    const w = o.trim() ? o.split(`
`
                        ).map(_ => _.trim()).filter(_ => _.length > 0) : [],
                        C = c.trim() ? c.split(`
`
                        ).map(_ => _.trim()).filter(_ => _.length > 0) : [],
                        S = {
                            ...a,
                            image: N,
                            targetPages: w.length > 0 ? w : null,
                            excludePages: C.length > 0 ? C : null,
                            startDate: a.startDate ? new Date(a.startDate).toISOString() : null,
                            endDate: a.endDate ? new Date(a.endDate).toISOString() : null
                        };
                    b.mutate(S)
                } catch {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al subir la imagen",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            h = (v, N) => {
                i(w => ({
                    ...w,
                    [v]: N
                }))
            };
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-4xl w-full max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "sticky top-0 bg-white border-b px-6 py-4 flex justify-between items-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-xl font-semibold",
                        children: t ? "Editar Pop-up" : "Nuevo Pop-up"
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: s,
                        children: e.jsx(Js, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("form", {
                    onSubmit: j,
                    className: "p-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(os, {
                        defaultValue: "basic",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs(Jt, {
                            className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                            children: [e.jsx($e, {
                                value: "basic",
                                children: "Básico"
                            }), e.jsx($e, {
                                value: "behavior",
                                children: "Comportamiento"
                            }), e.jsx($e, {
                                value: "targeting",
                                children: "Segmentación"
                            }), e.jsx($e, {
                                value: "advanced",
                                children: "Avanzado"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(ze, {
                            value: "basic",
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Información Básica"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                            htmlFor: "title",
                                            children: "Título *"
                                        }), e.jsx(J, {
                                            id: "title",
                                            value: a.title,
                                            onChange: v => h("title", v.target.value),
                                            placeholder: "Título del pop-up",
                                            required: !0

                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                            placeholder: "Contenido del pop-up. Puedes usar HTML básico como <b>, <i>, <a>, etc.",

                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx(W, {

                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    }), "Subir imagen"]
                                                }), p && e.jsx(P, {
                                                    type: "button",

                                                        y(""),
                                                        m(null),

                                                            ...v,

                                                        }))
                                                    },

                                                children: "Cerrar al hacer clic fuera"
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(ze, {
                            value: "targeting",
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Segmentación de Páginas"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {

                                        }), e.jsx(W, {

                                        })]

                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
