                        children: [e.jsx(P, {
                            type: "button",
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: s,
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                            type: "submit",
                            disabled: b.isPending,
                            children: b.isPending ? "Guardando..." : t ? "Actualizar" : "Crear"
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })
        })
    },
    qY = ({popupId: t, onClose: s}) => {
        const {data: r, isLoading: n} = Pe({
            queryKey: [`/api/popups/${t}/stats`],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const o = await fetch(`/api/popups/${t}/stats`);
                if (!o.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al obtener estadísticas");
                return o.json()
            }
        });
        if (n)
            return e.jsx("div", {
                className: "fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "bg-white rounded-lg p-8",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin rounded-full h-8 w-8 border-b-2 border-blue-600 mx-auto"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "mt-2 text-gray-600",
                        children: "Cargando estadísticas..."
                    })]
                })
            });
        const {summary: a={}, stats: i=[]} = r || {};
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-4xl w-full max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "sticky top-0 bg-white border-b px-6 py-4 flex justify-between items-center",
                    children: [e.jsxs("h2", {
                        className: "text-xl font-semibold flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(fu, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                        }), "Estadísticas del Pop-up"]
                    }), e.jsx(P, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: s,
                        children: e.jsx(Js, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "p-6 space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4",
                        children: [e.jsx($, {
                            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "p-4 text-center",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-center mb-2",
                                    children: e.jsx(Cs, {
                                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-blue-600"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                    children: a.totalViews || 0
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: "Visualizaciones"
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx($, {
                            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "p-4 text-center",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-center mb-2",
                                    children: e.jsx(gv, {
                                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-green-600"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                    children: a.totalClicks || 0
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: "Clics"
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx($, {
                            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "p-4 text-center",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-center mb-2",
                                    children: e.jsx(Sa, {
                                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-red-600"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                    children: a.totalCloses || 0
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: "Cierres"
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx($, {
                            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "p-4 text-center",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-center mb-2",
                                    children: e.jsx(fu, {
                                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-purple-600"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                    children: a.clickRate ? `${a.clickRate.toFixed(1)}%` : "0%"
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: "Tasa de clics"
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), a.totalViews > 0 && e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Métricas de Rendimiento"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: "Tasa de interacción"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                        children: [((a.totalClicks + a.totalCloses) / a.totalViews * 100).toFixed(1), "%"]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: "Tasa de cierre"
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                        children: a.closeRate ? `${a.closeRate.toFixed(1)}%` : "0%"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Historial de Interacciones"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: i.length === 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "text-center py-8 text-gray-500",
                                children: "No hay datos de interacciones disponibles"
                            }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2 max-h-64 overflow-y-auto",
                                children: i.map((o, l) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                                        children: [o.action === "viewed" && e.jsx(Cs, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-600"
                                        }), o.action === "clicked" && e.jsx(gv, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-600"
                                        }), o.action === "closed" && e.jsx(Sa, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-600"
                                        }), o.action === "ignored" && e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 rounded-full bg-gray-400"
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: [o.action === "viewed" && "Visualizado", o.action === "clicked" && "Botón presionado", o.action === "closed" && "Cerrado", o.action === "ignored" && "Ignorado"]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                children: [o.page, " • ", o.sessionId ? `Sesión: ${o.sessionId.slice(0, 8)}...` : "Usuario anónimo"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                        children: new Date(o.createdAt).toLocaleString()
                                    })]
                                }, l))
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Páginas más activas"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: (() => {
                                const o = i.reduce((c, d) => (c[d.page] = (c[d.page] || 0) + 1, c), {}),
                                    l = Object.entries(o).sort(([, c], [, d]) => d - c).slice(0, 5);
                                return l.length > 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: l.map(([c, d]) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-sm font-mono",
                                            children: c
                                        }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: [d, " interacciones"]
                                        })]
                                    }, c))
                                }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "text-center py-4 text-gray-500",
                                    children: "No hay datos de páginas disponibles"
                                })
                            })()
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })
        })
    },
    HY = () => {
        var h,
            v;
        const [t, s] = f.useState(!1),
            [r, n] = f.useState(null),
            [a, i] = f.useState(null),
            {toast: o} = st(),
            l = dr(),
            {data: c, isLoading: d} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/popups"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const N = await fetch("/api/popups");
                    if (!N.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al obtener pop-ups");
                    return N.json()
                }
            }),
            u = tt({
                mutationFn: async N => {
                    const w = await fetch(`/api/popups/${N}/toggle`, {
                        method: "PATCH"
                    });
                    if (!w.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cambiar estado del pop-up");
                    return w.json()
                },
                onSuccess: N => {
                    l.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/popups"]
                    }),
                    o({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: N.message
                    })
                },
                onError: () => {
                    o({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del pop-up",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            m = tt({
                mutationFn: async N => {
                    const w = await fetch(`/api/popups/${N}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!w.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar pop-up");
                    return w.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    l.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/popups"]
                    }),
                    o({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: "Pop-up eliminado correctamente"
                    })
                },

                    o({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el pop-up",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            p = N => {
                n(N),
                s(!0)
            },
            y = N => {
                window.confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este pop-up?") && m.mutate(N)
            },
            g = () => {
                s(!1),
                n(null)
            },

                switch (N) {
                case "warning":
                    return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800";
                case "promotion":
                    return "bg-green-100 text-green-800";
                case "announcement":
                    return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800";
                case "info":
                default:
                    return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
                }
            },
            b = (N, w) => {
                switch (N) {
                case "immediate":
                    return "Inmediato";
                case "delay":
                    return `Después de ${w}s`;
                case "scroll":
                    return `Al scroll ${w}%`;
                case "exit":
                    return "Al intentar salir";
                default:
                    return N
                }
            },
            j = N => {
                switch (N) {
                case "always":
                    return "Siempre";
                case "once_per_session":
                    return "Una vez por sesión";
                case "once_per_user":
                    return "Una vez por usuario";
                case "daily":
                    return "Una vez al día";
                default:
                    return N
                }
            };
        return d ? e.jsx(ya, {
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex items-center justify-center h-64",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "text-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin rounded-full h-8 w-8 border-b-2 border-blue-600 mx-auto"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "mt-2 text-gray-600",
                        children: "Cargando pop-ups..."
                    })]
                })
            })
        }) : e.jsx(ya, {
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center",

                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                            children: "Gestión de Pop-ups"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600",
                            children: "Administra los pop-ups que se muestran en tu sitio web"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                        onClick: () => s(!0),
                        children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                        }), "Nuevo Pop-up"]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "grid gap-6",
                    children: ((h = c == null ? void 0 : c.popups) == null ? void 0 : h.length) === 0 ? e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "text-center py-12",
                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-500 mb-4",
                                children: "No hay pop-ups configurados"
                            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                onClick: () => s(!0),
                                children: [e.jsx(sn, {
                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                }), "Crear primer pop-up"]
                            })]
                        })
                    }) : (v = c == null ? void 0 : c.popups) == null ? void 0 : v.map(N => {
                        var w,
                            C,
                            S,
                            _;

                            className: N.isActive ? "border-green-200" : "border-gray-200",

                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-start justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                                children: N.title
                                            }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                                className: x(N.type),
                                                children: N.type

                                            })]

            })
        })
    },
    WY = () => {
        var N,
            w;
        const [t, s] = f.useState(""),
            [r, n] = f.useState(null),
            {toast: a} = st(),
            i = dr(),
            {data: o, isLoading: l} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/backup/list", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al obtener backups");
                    return C.json()
                }
            }),
            c = tt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = await fetch("/api/backup/create/database", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: C || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!S.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup de base de datos");
                    return S.json()
                },
                onSuccess: C => {
                    i.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    a({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: C.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: C.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            d = tt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = await fetch("/api/backup/create/files", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: C || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!S.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup de archivos");
                    return S.json()
                },
                onSuccess: C => {
                    i.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    a({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: C.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: C.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            u = tt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = await fetch("/api/backup/create/complete", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: C || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!S.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup completo");
                    return S.json()
                },
                onSuccess: C => {
                    i.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    a({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: C.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: C.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            m = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({backupId: C, type: S}) => {
                    const _ = await fetch(`/api/backup/restore/${S}/${C}`, {
                        method: "POST",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!_.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error restaurando ${S}`);
                    return _.json()
                },
                onSuccess: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: C.message
                    })
                },
                onError: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: C.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            p = tt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = await fetch(`/api/backup/${C}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!S.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error eliminando backup");
                    return S.json()
                },
                onSuccess: C => {
                    i.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    a({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: C.message
                    })
                },
                onError: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: C.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            y = tt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = new FormData;
                    S.append("backup", C);
                    const _ = await fetch("/api/backup/upload", {
                        method: "POST",
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: S
                    });
                    if (!_.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error subiendo backup");
                    return _.json()
                },
                onSuccess: C => {
                    i.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    a({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: C.message
                    }),
                    n(null)
                },
                onError: C => {
                    a({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: C.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            g = (C, S) => {
                const _ = `¿Estás seguro de que quieres restaurar ${S === "database" ? "la base de datos" : S === "files" ? "los archivos" : "todo el sistema"}? Esta acción sobrescribirá los datos actuales.`;
                window.confirm(_) && m.mutate({
                    backupId: C.id,
                    type: S
                })
            },
            x = C => {
                window.confirm(`¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar el backup "${C.name}"?`) && p.mutate(C.id)
            },
            b = C => {
                var _;
                const S = (_ = C.target.files) == null ? void 0 : _[0];
                S && n(S)
            },
            j = C => {
                switch (C) {
                case "database":
                    return e.jsx(bn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    });
                case "files":
                    return e.jsx(yn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    });
                case "complete":
                    return e.jsx(Ot, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(yn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    })
                }
            },
            h = C => {
                switch (C) {
                case "database":
                    return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800";
                case "files":
                    return "bg-green-100 text-green-800";
                case "complete":
                    return "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800";
                default:
                    return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
                }

                case "database":

                case "files":

                    return "Completo";

                    return C

                                    placeholder: "Mi backup personalizado"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "grid grid-cols-1 gap-2",

                                    }), d.isPending ? "Creando..." : "Backup Archivos"]

                                })]

                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                    children: ["Tamaño: ", (r.size / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2), " MB"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                onClick: () => r && y.mutate(r),
                                disabled: !r || y.isPending,
                                className: "w-full",

                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                }), y.isPending ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Backup"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]

                                children: "Backups Disponibles"
                            }), e.jsxs(P, {

                                size: "sm",

                                    queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                                }),
                                children: [e.jsx(xt, {
                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                }), "Actualizar"]
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: ((N = o == null ? void 0 : o.backups) == null ? void 0 : N.length) === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {

                                children: "No hay backups disponibles"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-gray-400",
                                children: "Crea tu primer backup usando las opciones de arriba"
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: (w = o == null ? void 0 : o.backups) == null ? void 0 : w.map(C => e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "border rounded-lg p-4 hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-start justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                                children: [j(C.type), e.jsx("h3", {
                                                    className: "font-medium",
                                                    children: C.name
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                                className: h(C.type),
                                                children: v(C.type)
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: C.description
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex gap-4 text-xs text-gray-500",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("span", {
                                                className: "flex items-center gap-1",
                                                children: [e.jsx(lr, {
                                                    className: "h-3 w-3"
                                                }), new Date(C.createdAt).toLocaleString()]
                                            }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                                children: ["Tamaño: ", C.sizeFormatted]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex gap-2",
                                        children: [C.type === "complete" ? e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsxs(P, {
                                                size: "sm",
                                                variant: "outline",
                                                onClick: () => g(C, "database"),
                                                disabled: m.isPending,
                                                children: [e.jsx(bn, {
                                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                }), "BD"]
                                            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                                size: "sm",
                                                variant: "outline",
                                                onClick: () => g(C, "files"),
                                                disabled: m.isPending,
                                                children: [e.jsx(yn, {
                                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                }), "Archivos"]
                                            }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                                size: "sm",
                                                onClick: () => g(C, "complete"),
                                                disabled: m.isPending,
                                                children: [e.jsx(Dt, {
                                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                }), "Todo"]
                                            })]
                                        }) : e.jsxs(P, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            onClick: () => g(C, C.type),
                                            disabled: m.isPending,
                                            children: [e.jsx(Dt, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                            }), "Restaurar"]
                                        }), e.jsx(P, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            onClick: () => x(C),
                                            disabled: p.isPending,
                                            children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })
                            }, C.id))
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    className: "border-yellow-200",
                    children: e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex gap-3",
                            children: [e.jsx(Qs, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5 text-yellow-600 mt-0.5"
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-yellow-800",
                                    children: "Advertencias importantes:"
                                }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-yellow-700 space-y-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                        children: "• Las restauraciones sobrescribirán los datos actuales"
                                    }), e.jsx("li", {
                                        children: "• Se recomienda crear un backup antes de restaurar"
                                    }), e.jsx("li", {
                                        children: "• Los backups completos incluyen tanto base de datos como archivos"
                                    }), e.jsx("li", {
                                        children: "• Mantén tus backups en un lugar seguro"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                })]
            })
        })
    },
    GY = () => {
        const [t, s] = f.useState(""),
            [r, n] = f.useState("all"),
            [a, i] = f.useState("all"),
            [o, l] = f.useState(null),
            [c, d] = f.useState(!1),
            [u, m] = f.useState([]),
            {toast: p} = st(),
            y = dr(),
            g = D => {
                try {
                    const R = new Date(D);
                    return isNaN(R.getTime()) ? "Fecha inválida" : TU(R, {
                        addSuffix: !0,
                        locale: Ds
                    })
                } catch (R) {
                    return console.warn("Error formatting date:", D, R), "Fecha inválida"
                }
            },
            {data: x=[], isLoading: b} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages", t, r, a],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const D = new URLSearchParams;
                    t && D.set("search", t),
                    r !== "all" && D.set("status", r),
                    a !== "all" && D.set("type", a);
                    const R = await fetch(`/api/admin/messages?${D}`);
                    if (!R.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar mensajes");
                    return R.json()
                }
            }),
            {data: j} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages/stats"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const D = await fetch("/api/admin/messages/stats");
                    if (!D.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar estadísticas");
                    return D.json()
                }
            }),
            h = tt({
                mutationFn: async D => {
                    const R = await fetch(`/api/admin/messages/${D}/read`, {
                        method: "PUT"
                    });
                    if (!R.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al marcar como leído");
                    return R.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages"]
                    }),
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages/stats"]
                    }),
                    p({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: "Mensaje marcado como leído"
                    })
                }
            }),
            v = tt({
                mutationFn: async D => {
                    const R = await fetch(`/api/admin/messages/${D}/archive`, {
                        method: "PUT"
                    });
                    if (!R.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al archivar mensaje");
                    return R.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages"]
                    }),
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages/stats"]
                    }),
                    p({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: "Mensaje archivado"
                    })
                }
            }),
            N = tt({
                mutationFn: async D => {
                    const R = await fetch(`/api/admin/messages/${D}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!R.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar mensaje");
                    return R.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages"]
                    }),
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages/stats"]
                    }),
                    d(!1),
                    p({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: "Mensaje eliminado"
                    })
                }
            }),
            w = tt({
                mutationFn: async D => {
                    const R = await fetch("/api/admin/messages/bulk", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            action: "delete",
                            messageIds: D
                        })
                    });
                    if (!R.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar mensajes");
                    return R.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages"]
                    }),
                    y.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/messages/stats"]
                    }),
                    m([]),
                    p({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: "Mensajes eliminados"
                    })
                }
            }),
            C = (D, R) => {
                m(R ? E => [...E, D] : E => E.filter(I => I !== D))
            },
            S = D => {
                m(D ? H.map(R => R.id) : [])
            },
            _ = () => {
                if (u.length === 0)
                    return;
                const D = `¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar ${u.length} mensaje${u.length > 1 ? "s" : ""}? Esta acción no se puede deshacer.`;
                confirm(D) && w.mutate(u)
            },
            T = D => {
                switch (D) {
                case "contact":
                    return "Contacto";
                case "valuation":
                    return "Tasación";
                case "quote":
                    return "Presupuesto";
                default:
                    return D
                }
            },
            B = D => {
                switch (D) {
                case "contact":
                    return ew;
                case "valuation":
                    return jr;
                case "quote":
                    return yn;
                default:
                    return Rs
                }
            },
            z = D => {
                switch (D) {
                case "unread":
                    return "bg-red-100 text-red-800";
                case "read":
                    return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800";
                case "archived":
                    return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800";
                default:
                    return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
                }
            },
            A = D => {
                switch (D) {
                case "unread":
                    return "Sin leer";
                case "read":
                    return "Leído";
                case "archived":
                    return "Archivado";
                default:
                    return D
                }
            },
            O = D => {
                l(D),
                d(!0),
                D.status === "unread" && h.mutate(D.id)
            },
            H = x;
        return b ? e.jsx(ya, {
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-[400px]",
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                })
            })
        }) : e.jsx(ya, {
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                            children: "Mensajes Recibidos"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600",
                            children: "Gestiona los mensajes de contacto y solicitudes de tasación"
                        })]
                    })
                }), j && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4",
                    children: [e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "p-4",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Rs, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 text-blue-500"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: "Total"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                        children: j.total
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })
                    }), e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "p-4",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(x5, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 text-red-500"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: "Sin leer"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-2xl font-bold text-red-600",
                                        children: j.unread
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })
                    }), e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "p-4",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(jr, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 text-green-500"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: "Tasaciones"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                        children: j.valuation
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })
                    }), e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "p-4",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(ew, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 text-purple-500"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: "Contactos"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                        children: j.contact
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "p-4",
                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "flex-1",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "relative",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Ys, {
                                        className: "absolute left-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 h-4 w-4 text-gray-400"
                                    }), e.jsx(J, {
                                        placeholder: "Buscar por nombre, email o mensaje...",
                                        value: t,
                                        onChange: D => s(D.target.value),
                                        className: "pl-10"
                                    })]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("select", {
                                    value: r,
                                    onChange: D => n(D.target.value),
                                    className: "px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm",
                                    children: [e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "all",
                                        children: "Todos los estados"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "unread",
                                        children: "Sin leer"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "read",
                                        children: "Leídos"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "archived",
                                        children: "Archivados"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("select", {
                                    value: a,
                                    onChange: D => i(D.target.value),
                                    className: "px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm",
                                    children: [e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "all",
                                        children: "Todos los tipos"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "contact",
                                        children: "Contacto"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "valuation",
                                        children: "Tasación"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "quote",
                                        children: "Presupuesto"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Rs, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), "Mensajes (", H.length, ")"]
                            }), u.length > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: [u.length, " seleccionado", u.length > 1 ? "s" : ""]
                                }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                    variant: "destructive",
                                    size: "sm",
                                    onClick: _,
                                    disabled: w.isPending,
                                    children: [e.jsx(Xt, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Eliminar seleccionados"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: H.length === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx(Rs, {
                                className: "h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-500",
                                children: "No hay mensajes que mostrar"
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2 pb-2 border-b",
                                children: [e.jsx(xi, {
                                    checked: u.length === H.length && H.length > 0,
                                    onCheckedChange: S
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: "Seleccionar todos"
                                })]
                            }), H.map(D => {
                                const R = B(D.form_type),
                                    E = D.status === "unread",
                                    I = u.includes(D.id);
                                return e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: `p-4 border rounded-lg transition-colors ${I ? "bg-blue-100 border-blue-300" : E ? "bg-blue-50 border-blue-200" : "bg-white"}`,
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-start justify-between",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-start space-x-3 flex-1",
                                            children: [e.jsx(xi, {
                                                checked: I,
                                                onCheckedChange: U => C(D.id, U),
                                                onClick: U => U.stopPropagation()
                                            }), e.jsx(R, {
                                                className: `h-5 w-5 mt-1 ${E ? "text-blue-600" : "text-gray-400"}`
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex-1 min-w-0 cursor-pointer",
                                                onClick: () => O(D),
                                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                                        className: `font-medium ${E ? "text-blue-900" : "text-gray-900"}`,
                                                        children: D.name
                                                    }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                                        variant: "outline",
                                                        className: z(D.status),
                                                        children: A(D.status)
                                                    }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                                        variant: "secondary",
                                                        children: T(D.form_type)
                                                    })]
                                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2",
                                                    children: D.email
                                                }), D.subject && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    className: `text-sm mb-2 ${E ? "text-blue-800" : "text-gray-700"}`,
                                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                        children: "Asunto:"
                                                    }), " ", D.subject]
                                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 line-clamp-2",
                                                    children: D.message
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex flex-col items-end gap-2 ml-4",
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                children: g(D.created_at)
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex gap-1",
                                                children: [e.jsx(P, {
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    onClick: U => {
                                                        U.stopPropagation(),
                                                        O(D)
                                                    },
                                                    children: e.jsx(Cs, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                }), D.status !== "archived" && e.jsx(P, {
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    onClick: U => {
                                                        U.stopPropagation(),
                                                        v.mutate(D.id)
                                                    },
                                                    disabled: v.isPending,
                                                    children: e.jsx(KN, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(P, {
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    variant: "destructive",
                                                    onClick: U => {
                                                        U.stopPropagation(),
                                                        confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este mensaje? Esta acción no se puede deshacer.") && N.mutate(D.id)
                                                    },
                                                    disabled: N.isPending,
                                                    children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }, D.id)
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(ws, {
                    open: c,
                    onOpenChange: d,
                    children: e.jsx(ps, {
                        className: "max-w-2xl max-h-[80vh] overflow-y-auto",
                        children: o && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                            children: [e.jsx(xs, {
                                children: e.jsxs(gs, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [ke.createElement(B(o.form_type), {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), T(o.form_type), " - ", o.name]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(ve, {
                                        className: z(o.status),
                                        children: A(o.status)
                                    }), e.jsx(ve, {
                                        variant: "secondary",
                                        children: T(o.form_type)
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Xr, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Nombre:"
                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                children: o.name
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                                className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                            }), e.jsx("span", {

                                            }), e.jsx("span", {

                                            })]
                                        }), o.phone && e.jsxs("div", {

                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
