                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                children: o.phone
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Cr, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Recibido:"
                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                children: g(o.created_at)
                                            })]
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }), o.subject && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-medium mb-2",
                                        children: "Asunto:"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-gray-700 bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded",
                                        children: o.subject
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-medium mb-2",
                                        children: "Mensaje:"
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-gray-700 bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded whitespace-pre-wrap",
                                        children: o.message
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-2 pt-4 border-t",
                                    children: [o.status !== "archived" && e.jsxs(P, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        onClick: () => v.mutate(o.id),
                                        disabled: v.isPending,
                                        children: [e.jsx(KN, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                        }), "Archivar"]
                                    }), e.jsxs(P, {
                                        variant: "destructive",
                                        onClick: () => N.mutate(o.id),
                                        disabled: N.isPending,
                                        children: [e.jsx(Xt, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                        }), "Eliminar"]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                })]
            })
        })
    },
    KY = ({userId: t}) => {
        const [s] = ft(),
            [r] = f.useState(() => sessionStorage.getItem("sessionId") || Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)),
            [n, a] = f.useState(new Set),
            [i, o] = f.useState(null),
            [l, c] = f.useState(new Set);
        f.useEffect(() => {
            sessionStorage.setItem("sessionId", r)
        }, [r]);
        const {data: d} = Pe({
                queryKey: ["/api/popups/active", s],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const b = await fetch(`/api/popups/active?page=${encodeURIComponent(s)}`);
                    if (!b.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al obtener pop-ups");
                    return b.json()
                },
                refetchInterval: 6e4
            }),
            u = tt({
                mutationFn: async ({popupId: b, action: j}) => {
                    const h = await fetch("/api/popups/stats", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            popupId: b,
                            action: j,
                            page: s,
                            sessionId: r,
                            userId: t
                        })
                    });
                    if (!h.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al registrar estadística");
                    return h.json()
                }
            });
        f.useEffect(() => {
            const b = sessionStorage.getItem("shownPopups");
            if (b && a(new Set(JSON.parse(b))), t) {
                const j = new Date().toDateString(),
                    h = `popupsToday_${t}_${j}`,
                    v = localStorage.getItem(h);
                v && c(new Set(JSON.parse(v)))
            }
        }, [t]),
        f.useEffect(() => {
            var N;
            if (!((N = d == null ? void 0 : d.popups) != null && N.length))
                return;
            console.log("Processing popups:", d.popups.length, "found"),
            console.log("Current location:", s);
            const b = d.popups.filter(w => {
                switch (console.log("Checking popup:", w.title, {
                    isActive: w.isActive,
                    trigger: w.trigger,
                    displayFrequency: w.displayFrequency,
                    targetPages: w.targetPages,
                    excludePages: w.excludePages
                }), w.displayFrequency) {
                case "once_per_session":
                    if (n.has(w.id))
                        return !1;
                    break;
                case "once_per_user":
                    if (t && localStorage.getItem(`popup_shown_${t}_${w.id}`))
                        return !1;
                    break;
                case "daily":
                    if (l.has(w.id))
                        return !1;
                    break;
                case "always":
                default:
                    if (n.has(w.id)) {
                        const C = sessionStorage.getItem(`popup_last_${w.id}`);
                        if (C && Date.now() - parseInt(C) < 3e4)
                            return !1
                    }
                    break
                }
                return !0
            });
            if (b.length === 0)
                return;
            const h = b.sort((w, C) => C.priority - w.priority)[0],
                v = () => {
                    o(h),
                    u.mutate({
                        popupId: h.id,
                        action: "viewed"
                    });
                    const w = new Set(n).add(h.id);
                    if (a(w), sessionStorage.setItem("shownPopups", JSON.stringify([...w])), sessionStorage.setItem(`popup_last_${h.id}`, Date.now().toString()), h.displayFrequency === "once_per_user" && t)
                        localStorage.setItem(`popup_shown_${t}_${h.id}`, "true");
                    else if (h.displayFrequency === "daily" && t) {
                        const C = new Date().toDateString(),
                            S = `popupsToday_${t}_${C}`,
                            _ = new Set(l).add(h.id);
                        c(_),
                        localStorage.setItem(S, JSON.stringify([..._]))
                    }
                };
            switch (h.trigger) {
            case "immediate":
                setTimeout(v, 100);
                break;
            case "delay":
                setTimeout(v, (h.triggerValue || 3) * 1e3);
                break;
            case "scroll":
                const w = () => {
                    const S = window.scrollY / (document.documentElement.scrollHeight - window.innerHeight) * 100;
                    console.log("Scroll event:", {
                        scrollY: window.scrollY,
                        scrollHeight: document.documentElement.scrollHeight,
                        windowHeight: window.innerHeight,
                        scrollPercent: S,
                        triggerValue: h.triggerValue,
                        shouldShow: S >= (h.triggerValue || 50)
                    }),
                    S >= (h.triggerValue || 50) && (console.log("Showing scroll popup:", h.title), v(), window.removeEventListener("scroll", w))
                };
                return console.log("Setting up scroll listener for popup:", h.title, "trigger at:", h.triggerValue || 50, "%"), window.addEventListener("scroll", w), () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", w);
            case "exit":
                const C = S => {
                    S.clientY <= 0 && (v(), document.removeEventListener("mouseleave", C))
                };
                return document.addEventListener("mouseleave", C), () => document.removeEventListener("mouseleave", C)
            }
        }, [d, n, l, t, s]);
        const m = () => {
                i && u.mutate({
                    popupId: i.id,
                    action: "closed"
                }),
                o(null)
            },
            p = () => {
                if (i)
                    switch (u.mutate({
                        popupId: i.id,
                        action: "clicked"
                    }), i.buttonAction) {
                    case "close":
                        m();
                        break;
                    case "redirect":
                        i.buttonUrl && (window.location.href = i.buttonUrl),
                        m();
                        break;
                    case "external":
                        i.buttonUrl && window.open(i.buttonUrl, "_blank", "noopener,noreferrer"),
                        m();
                        break
                    }
            },
            y = () => {
                i != null && i.backdropClose && (u.mutate({
                    popupId: i.id,
                    action: "ignored"
                }), m())
            };
        if (!i)
            return null;
        const g = () => {
                switch (i.position) {
                case "top":
                    return "top-4 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2";
                case "bottom":
                    return "bottom-4 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2";
                case "corner":
                    return "bottom-4 right-4";
                case "center":
                default:
                    return "top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2"
                }
            },
            x = () => {
                switch (i.type) {
                case "warning":
                    return "border-yellow-500 bg-yellow-50";
                case "promotion":
                    return "border-green-500 bg-green-50";
                case "announcement":
                    return "border-blue-500 bg-blue-50";
                case "info":
                default:
                    return "border-gray-300 bg-white"
                }
            };
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-50",
            onClick: y,
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: `
          relative max-w-md mx-4 p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl border-2 
          ${
                x()} 
          ${i.position !== "center" ? `fixed ${g()}` : ""}
        `
                ,
                style: i.styles,
                onClick: b => b.stopPropagation(),
                children: [i.showCloseButton && e.jsx("button", {
                    onClick: m,
                    className: "absolute top-2 right-2 p-1 text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors",
                    children: e.jsx(Js, {
                        size: 20
                    })
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mb-4",
                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                        className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-2 text-gray-800",
                        children: i.title
                    }), i.image && e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "mb-3",
                        children: e.jsx("img", {
                            src: i.image,
                            alt: i.title,
                            className: "w-full max-h-48 object-cover rounded-md"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 prose prose-sm max-w-none",
                        dangerouslySetInnerHTML: {
                            __html: i.content
                        }
                    })]
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-end",
                    children: e.jsxs("button", {
                        onClick: p,
                        className: `
              px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
              ${
                        i.type === "promotion" ? "bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white" : i.type === "warning" ? "bg-yellow-600 hover:bg-yellow-700 text-white" : "bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white"}
            `
                        ,
                        children: [i.buttonAction === "external" && e.jsx(pu, {
                            size: 16,
                            className: "inline mr-1"
                        }), i.buttonText]
                    })
                })]
            })
        })
    };
function za() {
    const t = Ju(),
        [s] = ft(),
        r = t.slug || s.replace("/", ""),
        {data: n, isLoading: a, error: i} = Pe({
            queryKey: [`/api/cms/pages/${r}`],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const o = await fetch(`/api/cms/pages/${r}`);
                if (!o.ok)
                    throw new Error("Página no encontrada");
                return o.json()
            },
            enabled: !!r
        });
    if (a)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto py-12",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "animate-pulse space-y-4",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-8 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/3"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-2/3"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-5/6"
                    })]
                })]
            })
        });
    if (i || !n)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto py-12",
            children: e.jsx($, {
                children: e.jsxs(V, {
                    className: "text-center py-12",
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                        children: "Página no encontrada"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "La página que buscas no existe o no está disponible."
                    })]
                })
            })
        });
    if (typeof document < "u") {
        document.title = n.title;
        const o = document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]');
        if (o && n.metaDescription)
            o.setAttribute("content", n.metaDescription);
        else if (n.metaDescription) {
            const l = document.createElement("meta");
            l.name = "description",
            l.content = n.metaDescription,
            document.head.appendChild(l)
        }
    }
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto py-12",
        children: e.jsx("article", {
            className: "max-w-4xl mx-auto",
            children: e.jsx($, {
                children: e.jsx(V, {
                    className: "py-8",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "prose prose-lg max-w-none",
                        dangerouslySetInnerHTML: {
                            __html: n.content
                        }
                    })
                })
            })
        })
    })
}
function YY() {
    QD();
    const [t, s] = f.useState(!1);
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        function r() {
            return new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("platform") === "mobile"
        }
        s(r());
        function n(a) {
            var i;
            if (t)
                try {
                    const l = a.target.closest("a");
                    if (!l || !l.href || l.target === "_blank" || (i = l.getAttribute("href")) != null && i.startsWith("http") && !l.href.includes(window.location.hostname))
                        return;
                    if (!l.href.includes("platform=mobile")) {
                        a.preventDefault();
                        const c = new URL(l.href);
                        c.searchParams.set("platform", "mobile");
                        const d = c.toString();
                        Mk({}, "", d),
                        Rk(new Event("popstate"))
                    }
                } catch (o) {
                    console.warn("Error handling click navigation:", o)
                }
        }
        return t && Tk(document, "click", n), () => {
            Ak(document, "click", n)
        }
    }, [t]), e.jsxs("div", {

function ZY() {
    return f.useEffect(() => {
        Ik(),
        (async () => {
            try {
                const r = await (await fetch("/api/config/chatbot")).json();
                if (r.chatbotCode) {
                    const n = document.getElementById("voiceflow-chatbot");
                    if (n && n.remove(), r.chatbotCode && typeof r.chatbotCode == "string" && r.chatbotCode.trim() !== "")
                        try {
                            const a = document.createElement("script");
                            a.id = "voiceflow-chatbot",
                            a.type = "text/javascript";
                            const i = r.chatbotCode.replace(/<script[^>]*>|<\/script>/gi, "");
                            i.trim() && !i.includes("eval(") && !i.includes("Function(") ? (a.textContent = i, document.body.appendChild(a), console.log("✅ Chatbot Voiceflow cargado correctamente")) : console.warn("⚠️ Código del chatbot contiene contenido inseguro, no se cargará")
                        } catch (a) {
                            console.error("❌ Error al cargar el chatbot:", a)
                        }
                }
            } catch (s) {
                console.error("❌ Error cargando código del chatbot:", s)
            }
        })()
    }, []), e.jsx(d6, {
        client: xa,
        children: e.jsx(B3, {
            children: e.jsx(C6, {
                children: e.jsxs(S6, {
                    children: [e.jsx(vL, {}), e.jsx(YY, {})]
                })
            })
        })
    })
}
DS(document.getElementById("root")).render(e.jsx(ZY, {}));
